anya-e0801n0:65: 1. Dve dvekā-nekesu nāmasmā si yo, aṃ yo, nā hi, sa naṃ, smā hi, sa naṃ, smiṃ su.
anya-e0801n0:323: 8. Ore pari vati pāre majjhe heṭṭhuddhā dhonto vā chaṭṭhiyā.
anya-e0801n0:338: 18. Tattha gahetvā tena paharitvā yuddhe sarūpaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:466: 27. Tamassa sippaṃ sīlaṃ paṇyaṃ paharaṇaṃ payojanaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:468: 29. Tena kataṃ kītaṃ baddhamabhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ hataṃ hanti jitaṃ jayati dibbati khaṇati tarati carati vahati jīvati.
anya-e0801n0:505: 59. Tassa bhāvakammesu tta tā ttana ṇya ṇeyyaṇiya ṇiyā.
anya-e0801n0:512: 66. Tassa vikārāvayavesu ṇa ṇika ṇeyya mayā.
anya-e0801n0:586: 127. Kosajjājjava pārisajja sohajja maddavārissāsabhājañña theyya bāhusaccā.
anya-e0801n0:663: 58. Ṭhā-sa, vasa, silisa, sī, ruha, jara, janīhi.
anya-e0801n0:666: 61. Tuṃ tāye tave bhāve bhavissati kriyāyaṃ tadatthāyaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:729: 124. Disassa passa dassa dasa da dakkhā.
anya-e0801n0:787: 1. Vattamāne ti anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe, e mhe.
anya-e0801n0:788: 2. Bhavissati ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmi ssāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssaṃ ssāmhe.
anya-e0801n0:790: 4. Bhūte ī uṃ, o ttha, iṃ mhā, ā ū, se vhaṃ, a mhe.
anya-e0801n0:791: 5. Anajjatane ā ū, o ttha, a mhā, ttha tthuṃ, se vhaṃ, iṃ muse.
anya-e0801n0:792: 6. Parokkhe a u, e ttha, a mha, ttha re, ttho vho, i mhe.
anya-e0801n0:793: 7. Eyyādo vā tipattiyaṃ ssā ssaṃsu, sse ssatha, ssaṃ ssāmhā, ssatha ssiṃsu, ssase ssavhe, ssiṃ ssāmhase.
anya-e0801n0:794: 8. Hetuphalesveyya eyyuṃ, eyyāsi eyyātha, eyyāmi eyyāma, etha eraṃ, etho eyyāvho, eyyaṃ eyyāmhe.
anya-e0801n0:796: 10. Tu antu, hi tha, mima, taṃ antaṃ, ssu vho, e āmadhasa.
anya-e0801n0:836: 50. Atthiteyyādicchannaṃ sa su sa satha saṃ sāma.
anya-e0801n0:867: 1. Cara dara kara raha jana sana tala sāda sādha kasāsa caṭā ya vāhi ṇu.
anya-e0801n0:868: 2. Bhara mara cara tara ara gara hana tana mana bhama kita dhana baṃha kambamba cakkha bhikkha saṃkindanda yaja paṭāṇāsa vasa pasa paṃsa bandhā u.
anya-e0801n0:871: 5. Tapusa vidha kura putha mudā ku.
anya-e0801n0:876: 10. Vapa vara vasa rasa nabha hara hana paṇā īṇa.
anya-e0801n0:881: 14. I bhī kā karāra vaka saka vāhi ko.
anya-e0801n0:899: 32. Aja vaja muda gada gamā gaka.
anya-e0801n0:911: 43. Asa masa vasa kuca kacā cho.
anya-e0801n0:929: 60. Tija kasa tasa dakkhā kiṇo jassa kho ca.
anya-e0801n0:940: 70. Dhāhisi tana jana jara gama sacā tu.
anya-e0801n0:965: 95. Ruda khuda muda mada chida sūda sapa kamā daka.
anya-e0801n0:971: 101. Varāra kara tara dara yamaajja mithasakā kuno.
anya-e0801n0:987: 116. Khipa supa nī sū pūhi paka.
anya-e0801n0:995: 124. Kara sara sala kala valla vasā abho.
anya-e0801n0:1007: 136. Khī su vī yā gā hi sā lū khu hu mara dhara kara ghara jamā ma sāmā mo.
anya-e0801n0:1015: 143. Khī si sinī sī su vī ku sū hi raka.
anya-e0801n0:1019: 147. Mandaṅka sasā sa ma dha catā uro.
anya-e0801n0:1041: 169. Sara vasa kalā kīro vassuṭa ca.
anya-e0801n0:1054: 182. Maṅga kama samba saba saka vasa visa keva kala palla kaṭha paṭa kuṇḍa maṇḍā alo.
anya-e0801n0:1061: 189. Ana sana kala kuka saṭha mahā ilo.
anya-e0801n0:1085: 213. Sasāsa vasa visa hana vana manāna kamā so.
anya-e0801n0:1089: 217. Ve tā ta yu panā la kala camā aso.
anya-e0801n0:1090: 218. Vaya diva kara kare hya saṇasakapāsa kasā.
anya-e0801n0:1097: 225. Khī mi pī cu mā vā kāhi ḷo ussa vā dīgho ca.
anya-e0801n0:1109_0: Akārādayo niggahītantā tecattālīsa-kkharā vaṇṇā nāma honti. A ā i ī u ū e e o o,
anya-e0801n0:1109_1: ka kha ga gha ṅa ca cha ja jha ñña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba
anya-e0801n0:1109_2: bha ma, ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṃ. Tena kvattho? “E o na mavaṇṇe” 1. 37. Titālīsābhi
anya-e0801n0:1109_3: vacanaṃ katthaci vaṇṇalopaṃ ñāpeti. Tena ‘paṭisaṅkhā yoniso’tiādi siddhaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1111: Tatthādimhi dasa vaṇṇā sarā nāma honti. Tena kvattho? “Saro lopo sare” 1, 26 iccādi.
anya-e0801n0:1112: 3. Dvedve savaṇṇā. Tesu dvedve sarā savaṇṇā nāma honti. Tena kvattho? “Vaṇṇaparena savaṇṇopi” 1, 24.
anya-e0801n0:1114: Tesu dvīsu yo yo pubbo, so so rassasañño hoti. Tesu e.o.saṃyogato pubbāva dissanti. Tena kvattho? “Rasso vā” 2,62 iccādi.
anya-e0801n0:1116: Te sveva dvīsuyo yo paro, so so dīghasañño hoti. Tena kvattho? “Yo lo panisu dīgho” 2,88 iccādi.
anya-e0801n0:1118: Kakārādayo vaṇṇā niggahītapariyantā byañjanasaññāhonti. Tena kvattho? “Byañjane dīgharassā” 1,33 iccādi.
anya-e0801n0:1120: Kādayo pañca pañcakā vagga, nāma honti. Tena kvattho? “Vagge vagganto” 1,41 iccādi.
anya-e0801n0:1122: Yvāyaṃ vaṇṇo bindumatto, so niggahītasañño hoti. Tena kvattho? “Niggahītaṃ” 1,38 icādi. Garusaññākaraṇaṃ anvatthasaññatthaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1124: Nāmaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ, tassaante vattamānā ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā jhalasaññā honti yathākkamaṃ. Tena kvattho? “Jhalā vā” 2,111 iccādi.
anya-e0801n0:1126: Itthiyaṃ vattamānassa nāmassa-nte vattamānā ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā pasaññā honti. Tena kvattho? Ye passivaṇṇassa” 2,116 iccādi.
anya-e0801n0:1128: Itthiyaṃ vattamānassa nāmassa-nte vatthamāno ākāro ghasañño hoti. Tena kvattho? “Ghabrahmādite” 2,60 iccādi.
anya-e0801n0:1134: Yaṃ visesanaṃ, tadantassa vidhi ñātabbo “ato yonaṃ ṭāṭe” 2,41 narānare.
anya-e0801n0:1136: Sattamīniddese pubbasseva kāriyaṃ ñātabbaṃ “saro lopo sare” 1,26 veḷaggaṃ. ‘Tamaha’ntīdha kasmā na hoti?, Saretopasilesikādhāro tatthetāva vuccate ‘pubbasseva hoti na parassā’ti.
anya-e0801n0:1138: Pañcamīniddese parassa kāriyaṃ ñātabbaṃ “atoyonaṃ ṭāṭe” 2,41 narānare. Idha na hotaṃ ‘jantuho anattā’. Idha kasmā na hoti? Osakhyo, anantare katatthatāya na byavahitassa kāriyaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1140: Parassa ssissamānaṃ kāriyamādivaṇṇassa ñātabbaṃ “ra saṅkhyāto vā” 3,103 terasa.
anya-e0801n0:1142: Chaṭṭhīniddiṭṭhassa yaṃ kāriyaṃ, tadantassa vaṇṇassa viññeyyaṃ “rājassi nāmhi” 2,23 rājinā.
anya-e0801n0:1144: Ṅakāro anubandho yassa, so antassa hoti “gossā vaṅa” 1,32 gavāssaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1146: Ṭakāro-nubandho yassa, so-nekakkharo cādeso sabbassa hoti “imassānitthiyaṃ ṭe” 2,128 esu, “nāmha-nimi” 2,126 anena.
anya-e0801n0:1148: Chaṭṭhīniddiṭṭhassa ñānubandhakānubandhā ādyantā honti “brūto tissīña” 6,36 bravīti, “bhūssa vuka” 6,17 babhūva.
anya-e0801n0:1150: Makāro-nubandho yassa, so sarā namantā sarā paro hoti “mañca rudhādīnaṃ” 5-19 rundhati.
anya-e0801n0:1152_0: Dvinnaṃ sāvakāsānamekatthappasaṅge paro hoti. Yathā dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vāpurisānaṃ sahappattiyaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1152_1: paro, so ca (gacchati) tvaṃ ca (gacchasi, tumhe) gacchatha. So ca (gacchati,) tvaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1155: Saṅketaggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? Pakatiyādisamudāyassānubandhatā mā hotūti, anavayavohi samudāyo… samudāyarūpattāyeva.
anya-e0801n0:1156: Anavayavaggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? “Atena” 2-108 janena. Imināva lopassāvagatattā nānubandhalopāya vacanamāraddhaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1158: Vaṇṇasaddo paro yasmā tena savaṇṇopi gayhati saṃca rūpaṃ “yuvaṇṇānameo luttā” 1-29 vākeritaṃ, samonā.
anya-e0801n0:1160: Vantvādisambandhīyevantu gayhati, “ntantūnaṃ nto yomhi paṭhame” 2-215 guṇavanto.
anya-e0801n0:1164: Sare saro lopanīyo hoti. Tatri-me, saddhi-ndriyaṃ, nohe-taṃ, bhikkhuno-vādo, sametā-yasmā, abhibhā-yatanaṃ, puttāma-tthi, asante-ttha.
anya-e0801n0:1166: Saramhā paro saro kvaci lopanīyo hoti. So-pi, sāva, yato-dakaṃ, tato-va. Kvacītikiṃ? Saddhi-ndriyaṃ, ayamadhikāro āparicchedāvasānā, tena nātippasaṅgo.
anya-e0801n0:1168: Pubbaparasarā dvepi vā kvaci na lupyante, latā iva, late-va, latā-va.
anya-e0801n0:1170: Luttā sarā paresaṃ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ eo honti vā yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1171: Tasse-daṃ, vāte-ritaṃ, no-peti, vāmo-rū, ate-vaññehi, vo-dakaṃ. Kathaṃ “paccorasmi”nti? Yogavibhāgā. Vātveva? Tassidaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1174: Sare pare ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ yakāravakārā honti vā yathākkamaṃ. Byākato, iccassa, ajjhiṇamutto, svāgataṃ, svāpanalānilaṃ, vātveva? Iti-ssa. Kvacitveva? Yānī-dha, sū-paṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1176: Eonaṃyavāyonti vā sare yathākkamaṃ. Tyajja te-jja, svāhaṃ so-haṃ. Kvacitveva? Puttāma-tthi, asante-ttha.
anya-e0801n0:1178: Sare gossa avaṅa hoti. Gavā-ssaṃ. ‘Yatharīva, tatharive’ti nipātāva, ‘bhusāmive’ti ivasaddo evattho.
anya-e0801n0:1180: Rassadīghānaṃ kvaci dīgharassā honti byañjane. Tatrā-yaṃ, munīcare, sammadeva, mālabhārī.
anya-e0801n0:1182: Saramhā parassa byañjanassa kvaci dve rūpāni honti. Paggaho. Saramhāti kiṃ? Taṃ khaṇaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1184_0: Catutthadutiyesu paresvesaṃ catutthadutiyānaṃ tabbagge tatiya paṭhamā honti. Paccāsatthyā,
anya-e0801n0:1184_1: nigghoso, akkhanti, bojjhaṅgā, setacchattaṃ, daḍḍho, niṭṭhānaṃ, mahaddhano, yasatthero,
anya-e0801n0:1184_2: apphuṭaṃ, abbhuggato. Esvīti kiṃ? Thero. Esanti kiṃ? Pattho.
anya-e0801n0:1186: Evasadde pare itissa vo hoti vā. Itveva, icceva. Eveti kiṃ? Iccāha.
anya-e0801n0:1188_0: Eonaṃ vaṇṇe kvaci a hoti vā. Disvā yācaka māgate, akaramhasa te, esa attho, esa dhammo,
anya-e0801n0:1188_1: aggamakkhāyati, svātanaṃ, hiyyattanaṃ, karassu. Vātveva? Yācake āgate eso dhammo. Vaṇṇeti kiṃ? So.
anya-e0801n0:1190_0: Niggahītamāgamo hoti vā kvaci. Cakkhuṃ udapādi cakkhuudapādi, purimaṃ jātiṃ purimajātiṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1190_1: kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahuṃ. Avaṃsirotiādīsu niccaṃ… vavatthitavibhāsattā vādhikārassa,
anya-e0801n0:1190_2: sāmattiyenāgamova, sa ca rassa sarasseva hoti… tassa rassānugatattā.
anya-e0801n0:1192: Niggahītassa lopo hoti vā kvaci. Kyāhaṃ kimahaṃsāratto saṃratto. Salle kho-gantukāmo gantumanoti, ādīsu niccaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1194: Niggahītamhā parassa sarassa lopo hoti vā kvaci. Tvaṃ-si tvamasi.
anya-e0801n0:1196_0: Niggahītassa kho vagge vagganto vā hoti paccāsattyā. Taṅkaroti taṃ karoti, tañcarati
anya-e0801n0:1196_1: taṃ carati, taṇṭhānaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ, tandhanaṃ taṃ dhanaṃ, tampāti taṃ pāti. Niccaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1198: Ya eva hi saddesu niggahītassa vā ño hoti. Yaññadeva, taññeva, tañhi, vātveva? Yaṃ yadeva.
anya-e0801n0:1200: Saṃsaddassa yaṃ niggahītaṃ tassa vā ño hoti yakāre. Saññamo saṃyamo.
anya-e0801n0:1202: Niggahītassa mayadā honti vā sare kvaci. Tamahaṃ, tayidaṃ, tadalaṃ. Vā tveva? Taṃ ahaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1204_0: Ete mayadā ca āgamā honti sare vā kvaci. Tivaṅgikaṃ, ito nāyati, cinitvā, tasmātiha,
anya-e0801n0:1204_1: nirojaṃ, puthageva, idhamāhu, yathayidaṃ, attadatthaṃ. Vā tveva? Attatthaṃ. ‘Atippago
anya-e0801n0:1206: Chasaddā parassa sarassa ḷakāro āgamo hoti vā. Chaḷaṅgaṃ, chaḷāyatanaṃ. Vātveva? Chaabhiññā.
anya-e0801n0:1208_0: Tadaminādīni sādhūni bhavanti. Taṃ iminā tadaminā, sakiṃ āgāmī sakadāgāmī, ekaṃ idha
anya-e0801n0:1208_1: ahaṃ ekamidāhaṃ, saṃvidhāya avahāro saṃvidāvahāro, vārino vāhako valāhako, jīvanassa
anya-e0801n0:1208_2: mūto jīmūto, chavassa sayanaṃ susānaṃ, uddhaṃ khamassa udukkhalaṃ, pisitāso pisāco,
anya-e0801n0:1208_3: mahiyaṃ ravatīti mayūro, evamaññepi payogato-nugantabbā, paresaṃ pisodarādimivedaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1210: Tavaggavaraṇānaṃ kvaci cavaggabayañā honti yathākkamaṃ yakāre. Apuccaṇḍatāya, tacchaṃ, yajjevaṃ, ajjhattaṃ, thaññaṃ, dibbaṃ, payyosanā, pokkharañño. Kvacitveva? Rattyā
anya-e0801n0:1212: Vaggalasehi parassa yakārassa kvaci te vaggalasā honti.
anya-e0801n0:1213: Sakkate, paccate, aṭṭate, kuppate, phallate, assate. Kvacitveva? Kyāhaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1217: Hassa vipallāso hoti vā vakāre. Bavhābādho bavhābādho.
anya-e0801n0:1219: Tathanarānaṃ ṭaṭhaṇalā honti vā. Dukkaṭaṃ, aṭṭhakathā, gahaṇaṃ, paligho, palāyati. Vātveva? Dukkataṃ. Kvacitveva? Sugato.
anya-e0801n0:1221: Saṃyogassa yo ādībhūto-vayavo tassa vā kvaci lopo hoti. Pupphaṃ-sā jāyate-gini.
anya-e0801n0:1223_0: Vicchāyamābhikkhaññe ca yaṃ vattate, tassa dve rūpāni honti. Kriyāya guṇena dabbena
anya-e0801n0:1223_1: vā bhinne atthe byāpitumicchā vicchā. Rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ siñcati, gāmo gāmo ramaṇīyo,
anya-e0801n0:1223_2: gāme gāme pānīyaṃ, gehe gehe issaro, rasaṃ rasaṃ bhakkhayati, kiriyaṃ kiriyamārabhate.
anya-e0801n0:1224_0: Atthiyevā-nupubbiyepi vicchā mūle mūle thūlā, agge agge sukhumā, yadi hi ettha mūlaggabhedo
anya-e0801n0:1224_1: na siyā, ānupubbiyampi na bhaveyya. Māsakaṃ māsakaṃ imamhā kahāpaṇā bhavanthānaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1224_2: dvinnaṃ dehīti māsakaṃ māsakamiccetasmā vicchāgamyate, saddantarato pana imamhā kahāpaṇāti
anya-e0801n0:1224_3: avadhāraṇaṃ. Pubbaṃ pubbaṃ pupphanti, paṭhamaṃ paṭhamaṃ paccantītyatrāpi vicchāva.
anya-e0801n0:1224_4: Ime ubho aḍḍhā katarā katarā esaṃ dvinnamaḍḍhatā, sabbe ime aḍḍhā katamā katamā imesaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1224_5: aḍḍhutā ihāpi vicchāva. Ābhikkhaññaṃ ponopuññaṃ pacati pacati, papacati papacati,
anya-e0801n0:1224_6: lunāhi lunāhitvevāyaṃ lunāti, bhutvā bhutvā gacchati, paṭapaṭā karoti, paṭapaṭāyati.
anya-e0801n0:1226: Vicchāyamekassa dvitte pubbassa syādilopo hoti. Ekekassa. Kathaṃ matthakamatthakenāti? ‘Syādilopo pubbassā’ti yogavibhāgā, nācātippasaṅgo yogavibhāgā iṭṭhappasiddhīti.
anya-e0801n0:1228: Sabbādīnaṃ vītihāre dve bhavanti pubbassa syādilopo ca. Aññamaññassa bhojakā, itarītarassa bhojakā.
anya-e0801n0:1230_0: Turitenāpāyahetupadassanaṃ sambhamo, tasmiṃsati vatthu yāvantehi saddehi so-ttho
anya-e0801n0:1230_1: viññāyate, tāvanto saddā payujjante. Sappo sappo sappo, bujjhassu bujjhassu bujjhassu,
anya-e0801n0:1232: Ayamadhikāro āsatthaparisamattiyā. Tena nātippasaṅgo iṭṭhappasiddhi ca.
anya-e0801n0:1236: 1. Dve dve-kānekesu nāmasmā si yo, aṃ yo, nā hi, sa naṃ, smā hi, sa naṃ, smiṃ su.
anya-e0801n0:1237_0: Etesaṃ dve dve honti ekānekatthesu vattamānato nāmasmā. Muni munayo, muniṃ munayo,
anya-e0801n0:1237_1: muninā munīhi, munissa munīnaṃ, munismā munīhi, munissa munīnaṃ, munismiṃ munīsu,
anya-e0801n0:1237_2: evaṃ kumārī kumāriyo, kaññā kaññāyoti. Etāni satta dukāni satta vibhattiyo vibhāgo
anya-e0801n0:1237_3: vibhatīti katvā, ettha siamitī-kārā-kārā “kimaṃ sisu” 2,200 ti saṃketatthā.
anya-e0801n0:1239: Karīyati kattu kiriyāyā-bhisambandhīyatīti kammaṃ, tasmiṃ dutiyāvibhatti hotaṃ. Kaṭaṃ karoti, odanaṃ pacati, ādiccaṃ passati.
anya-e0801n0:1240_0: ‘Odano paccatī’ti odanasaddato kammatā nappatīyate, kiñcarahi? Ākhyātato. ‘Kaṭaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1240_1: karoti vipulaṃ dassanīya’nti attheva guṇayuttassa kammatā, icchitepi kammattāva dutiyā
anya-e0801n0:1240_2: siddhā gāvuṃ payo dohati, gomantaṃ gāvaṃ yācati, gāvamavarundhati vajaṃ, māṇavakaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1240_3: maggaṃ pucchati, gomantaṃ gāvaṃ bhikkhate, rukkhamavacināti phalāni, sissaṃ dhammaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1240_4: brūte, sissaṃ dhammamanusāsatīti. Evaṃ anicchitepi ahiṃ laṅghayati, visaṃ bhakkheti.
anya-e0801n0:1240_5: Yaṃnevicchitaṃ nāpi anicchitaṃ, tatthāpi dutiyā siddhā. Gāmaṃ gacchanto rukkhamūlamupasappati.
anya-e0801n0:1241_1: kammavacanicchā, vatticchāto hi kārakāni honti. Taṃ yathā-valāhakā vijjotate, valāhakassa
anya-e0801n0:1241_2: vijjotate, valāhako vijjotate, valāhake vijjotate, valāhakena vijjotateti. Evamabhinivisassa
anya-e0801n0:1242_0: Tathā upanvajjhāvasassābhojana nivuttivacanassa gāmamupavasati, ga, mamanuvasati,
anya-e0801n0:1242_1: pabbatamadhivasati, gharamāvasati. Abhojananivutti vacanassāti kiṃ? Gāme upavasati,
anya-e0801n0:1242_2: bhojananivuttiṃ karotīti attho. Tappānācārepi kammattāva dutiyā siyā nadimpivati,
anya-e0801n0:1242_3: gāmaṃ carati, evaṃ ‘sace maṃ ālapissatī’tiādīsupi. Vihitāva patidhayoge dutiyā –
anya-e0801n0:1242_4: ‘paṭibhantu taṃ cunda bojjhaṅgā’ti. Taṃ pati bojjhaṅgā bhāsantūti attho, yadātu dhātunāyutto
anya-e0801n0:1242_5: pati, tadā tenā-yogā sambandhe chaṭṭhīva ‘tassa nappaṭibhātī’ti. Akkhe dibbati, akkhehi
anya-e0801n0:1244_0: Kiriyā, guṇa, dabbehi sākallena kāladdhānaṃ sambandho accantasaṃyogo. Tasmiṃ viññāyamāne
anya-e0801n0:1244_1: kālasaddehi addhaaddehi ca dutiyā hoti. Māsamadhīte, māsaṃ kalyāṇi, māsaṃ guḷadhānā,
anya-e0801n0:1244_2: kosamadhīte, kosaṃ kuṭilā nadī, kosaṃ pabbato. Acantasaṃyogeti kiṃ? Māsassa dvīhamadhīte,
anya-e0801n0:1245: Pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā, imaṃ rattiṃ cattāro mahārājāti evamādīsu kālavācī hi accantasaṃyogattāva dutiyā siddhā. Vibhattivipallāsenapi vā bahulaṃvidhānā.
anya-e0801n0:1246_0: Phalappattiyaṃ kiriyāparisamattyapavaggo, tasmiṃ viññāyamāne kāladdhānaṃ kiriyāyāccantasaṃyoge
anya-e0801n0:1246_2: Anapavaggetu asādhakatamattākaraṇattābhāve dutiyāva ‘māsamadhīto-nuvāko, na cāne na gahito’ti.
anya-e0801n0:1247_0: Kārakamajjhe ye kāladdhānavācino, tato sattamīpañcamiyo abhimatā ‘ajja bhutvā devadatto
anya-e0801n0:1247_1: dvihe bhuñjissati, dvīhā bhuñjissati, atraṭṭho-yamissāso kose lakkhaṃ vijjhati, kosā
anya-e0801n0:1249_0: Gamanatthānaṃ bodhatthānaṃ āhāratthānaṃ saddatthānamakammakānaṃ bhajjādīnañca payojje
anya-e0801n0:1249_1: kattari dutiyā hoti. Sāmatthiyā ca payojakabyāpārena kammatāvassa hotīti patīyate.
anya-e0801n0:1249_2: Gamayati māṇavakaṃ gāmaṃ, yāpayati māṇavakaṃ gāmaṃ, bodhayati māṇavakaṃ dhammaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1249_3: vedayati māṇavakaṃ dhammaṃ, bhojayati māṇa-vakaṃ modakaṃ, āsayati māṇavakaṃ modakaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1249_4: ajjhāpayati māṇavakaṃ vedaṃ, pāṭhayati māṇavakaṃ vedaṃ, āsayati devadattaṃ, sāyayati
anya-e0801n0:1249_5: devadattaṃ, aññaṃ bhajjāpeti, aññaṃ koṭṭāpeti, aññaṃ santharāpeti. Etesamevāti kiṃ?
anya-e0801n0:1249_6: Pāceti odanaṃ devadattena yaññadatto. Payojjeti kiṃ? Gacchati devadatto. Yadā carahi
anya-e0801n0:1249_7: gamayati devadattaṃ yaññadatto, tamaparo payojeti, tadā gamayati devadattaṃ yaññadatteneti
anya-e0801n0:1251_0: Harādīnaṃ payojje kattari dutiyā hoti vā. Hāreti bhāraṃ devadattaṃ devadatteneti
anya-e0801n0:1251_1: vā, ajjhohāreti sattuṃ devadattaṃ devadatteneti vā, kāreti kaṭaṃ devadattaṃ devadatteneti
anya-e0801n0:1251_2: vā dassayate janaṃ rājaṃ janeneti vā, abhivādayate guruṃ devadattaṃ devadatteneti vā.
anya-e0801n0:1253_0: Khādādīnaṃ payojje kattari dutiyā na hoti. Khādayati devadattena, ādayati devadattena,
anya-e0801n0:1253_1: avha, payati devadattena, saddāyayati devadattena, kandayati devadattena, nāyayati devadattena.
anya-e0801n0:1254: (1) Vahissāniyantuke. Vāhayati bhāraṃ devadattena aniyantuketi kiṃ? Vāha-yati bhāraṃ balībadde.
anya-e0801n0:1255: (2) Bhakkhissāhiṃ sāyaṃ. Bhakkhayati modake devadattena. Ahiṃsāyanti kiṃ? Bhakkhayati balībadde sassaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1257: Dhīādīhi yuttato dutiyā hoti. Dhiratthu maṃ pūtikāyaṃ, antarā ca rājagahaṃ antarā ca nālandaṃ, samādhānamantarena, mucalindamabhito saramiccādi, chaṭṭhiyāpavādo-yaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1259: Lakkhaṇādīsvatthesvabhinā yuttamhā dutiyā mahāti. Rukkhamabhi vijjotate vijju, sādhu devadatto mātaramabhi, rukkhaṃ rukkhamabhitiṭṭhati.
anya-e0801n0:1261_0: Patiparīhi yuttamhā lakkhaṇādīsu bhāge catthe dutiyā hoti. Rukkhaṃ pati vijjotate
anya-e0801n0:1261_1: vijju, sādhu devadatto mātaraṃ pati, rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ pati tiṭṭhati, yadettha maṃ
anya-e0801n0:1261_2: pati siyā. Rukkhaṃ pari vijjotate vijju, sādhu devadatto mātaraṃ pari, rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1261_3: pari tiṭṭhati, yadettha maṃ pari siyā.
anya-e0801n0:1263_0: Lakkhaṇādīsvatthesvanunā yuttamhā dutiyā hoti. Rukkhamanu vijjotate vijju, saccakiriyamanu
anya-e0801n0:1263_1: vuṭṭhi pāvassi, hetu ca lakkhaṇaṃ bhavati, sādhu devadatto mātaramanu, rukkhaṃ rukkhamanu
anya-e0801n0:1265: Sahatthe-nunā yuttamhā dutiyā hoti. Pabbatamanu senā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0801n0:1267: Hīnatthe-nunā yuttamhā dutiyā hoti. Anu sāriputtaṃ paññavanto.
anya-e0801n0:1269: Hīnatthe upena yuttamhā dutiyā hoti. Upa sāriputtaṃ paññavantho.
anya-e0801n0:1271: Ādhikyatthe upena yuttamhā sattamī hoti. Upa khāriyaṃ doṇo.
anya-e0801n0:1273: Sāmibhāvatthe-dhinā yuttamhā sattamī hoti. Adhi brahmadatte pañcālā, adhi pañcālesu brahmadatto.
anya-e0801n0:1275_0: Kattari karaṇe ca kārake tatiyā hoti. Purisena kataṃ, asinā chindati. Pakatiyā-bhirūpo,
anya-e0801n0:1275_1: gotthena gotamo, sumedho nāma nāmena, jātiyā sattavassikoti bhūdhātussa sambhavā
anya-e0801n0:1275_2: karaṇe eva tatiyā. Evaṃ samena dhāvati visamena dhāvati, dvidoṇena dhaññaṃ kiṇāti,
anya-e0801n0:1277: Sahatthena yoge tatiyā siyā. Puttena saha gato, puttena saddhiṃ āgato, tatiyāpi chaṭṭhīva appadhāne eva bhavati.
anya-e0801n0:1279: Lakkhaṇe vattamānato tatiyā siyā. Tidaṇḍakena paribbājakamaddakkhī, akkhinā kāṇo, tena hi aṅgena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate.
anya-e0801n0:1281: Takkiriyā yogge tatiyā siyā. Annena vasati, vijjāya yaso.
anya-e0801n0:1283: Iṇe hetumhi pañcamī hoti vā. Satasmā baddho, satena vā.
anya-e0801n0:1285: Paraṅgabhūte hetumhi pañcamī hoti vā. Jaḷattā baddho jaḷattena vā, paññāya mutto, hutvā abhāvatoaniccā, saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho.
anya-e0801n0:1287: Hetvatthavācīhi yoge hetumhi chaṭṭhī siyā. Udarassa hetu, udarassa kāraṇā.
anya-e0801n0:1289_0: Hetvatthehi yoge sabbādīhi sabbā vibhattiyo honti. Ko hetu, kaṃ hetuṃ, kena hetunā,
anya-e0801n0:1289_1: kassa hetussa, kasmā hetusmā, kassa hetussa, kasmiṃ hetusmiṃ, kiṃ kāraṇaṃ, kena kāraṇena,
anya-e0801n0:1289_2: kiṃ nimittaṃ, kena nimittena, kiṃ payojanaṃ, kena payojanena iccevamādi. Hetvatthehītveva? Kena kataṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1291: Yassa sammā padīyate tasmiṃ catutthī siyā. Saṅghassa dadāti. Ādhāravivakkhāyaṃ sattamīpi siyā saṅghe dehi.
anya-e0801n0:1293_0: Tasse-daṃ tadatthaṃ, tadatthabhāve jotanīye nāmasmā catutthī siyā. Sītassa paṭighātāya,
anya-e0801n0:1293_1: atthāya hitāya (sukhāya) devamanussānaṃ, nālaṃ dārabharaṇāya, yūpāya dāru, pākāya vajatītvevamādi.
anya-e0801n0:1294_0: Kassa sāduṃ na ruccabhi, mā-yasmantānampi saṅghabhedo ruccittha, khamati saṅghassa,
anya-e0801n0:1294_1: bhattamassa nacchādesīti chaṭṭhī sambandhavacanicchāyaṃ, na cevaṃ virodho siyā sadisarūpattā,
anya-e0801n0:1294_2: evaṃvidhesu ca sambandhassa saddikānumatattā, kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesīti atthamatte paṭhamā.
anya-e0801n0:1296_0: Rañño sataṃ dhāreti, rañño chattaṃ dhāretīti sambandhe chaṭṭhī, evaṃ rañño silāghate,
anya-e0801n0:1296_1: rañño hanute, rañño upatiṭṭhate, rañño sapate, devāpi tassa pihayanti tādino, tassa
anya-e0801n0:1296_2: kujjha mahāvīra, yadihaṃ tassa pakuppeyyaṃ, duhayati disānaṃ megho, yo mittānaṃ na
anya-e0801n0:1296_3: dūbhati, yo appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati, kyāhaṃ ayyānaṃ aparajjhāmi, issayanti
anya-e0801n0:1296_4: samaṇānaṃ titthiyā, dhammena nayamānānaṃ kā usūyā rañño bhāgyamārajjhati, rañño bhāgyamikkhate,
anya-e0801n0:1296_5: tena yācito ayācito vā tassa gāvo paṭisuṇāti, gāvo āsuṇāti, bhagavato paccassosuṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1296_6: hotu patigiṇāti, hotvanugiṇāti, ārocayāmi vo pativedayāmi vo, dhammaṃ te desessāmi,
anya-e0801n0:1296_7: yathā vo bhagavā byākareyya, alaṃ te idha vāsena, kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha, arahati mallo mallassāti.
anya-e0801n0:1297_0: Jīvitaṃ tiṇāyapi na maññamānoti tādatthya catutthī, tiṇena yo attho tadatthāyapīti
anya-e0801n0:1297_1: attho, “yo ca sītañca uṇhañca, tiṇā bhiyyo na maññati” tiṇamiva jīvitaṃ maññamānoti
anya-e0801n0:1297_2: savisayāva vibhattiyo. Saggāya gacchatīti tādatthye catutthī, yo hi saggaṃ gacchati
anya-e0801n0:1297_3: tadatthaṃ tassa gamananti, kammavacanicchāyantu dutiyāva saggaṃ gacchatīti.
anya-e0801n0:1298_0: Āyu bhoto hotu, ciraṃ jīvitaṃ, bhaddaṃ kalyāṇaṃ atthaṃ payojanaṃ, kusalaṃ anāmayaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1298_1: hitaṃ pathyaṃ sukhaṃ sātaṃ bhoto hotu, sādhu sammuti metassa, puttassāvikareyya guyhamatthaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1298_2: tassa me sakko pāturahosi, tassa pahiṇeyya, bhikkhūnaṃ dutaṃ pāhesi, kappati samaṇānaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1298_3: āyogo, ekassa dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā pahoti, upamaṃ te karissāmi, añjaliṃ te paggaṇhāmi,
anya-e0801n0:1298_4: tassa phāsu, lokassattho, namo te purisājañña, sotthi tassa, alaṃ mallo mallassa,
anya-e0801n0:1298_5: samattho mallo mallassa, tassa hitaṃ, tassa sukhaṃ, svāgataṃ te mahārājāti sabbattha
anya-e0801n0:1300_0: Padatthāvadhismā pañcamīvibhatti hoti. Gāmasmā āgacchatu, evaṃ corasmā bhāyati, corasmā
anya-e0801n0:1300_1: uttasati, orasmā tāyati, corasmā rakkhatīti, sace bhāyatha dukkhassa, pamāde bhayadassivā,
anya-e0801n0:1300_2: tasanti daṇḍassāti chaṭṭhī sattamiyopi honteva sambandhādhāravacanicchāyaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1301_0: Ajjhenā parājeti, paṭipakkhe parājetīti savisayāva vibhattiyo. Sace kevaṭṭassa parajjissāmīti
anya-e0801n0:1301_1: chaṭṭhīpi hoti sambandhavacanicchāyaṃ. Yavehi gāvo vāreti, pāpā cittaṃ nivāraye,
anya-e0801n0:1301_2: kāke rakkhati taṇḍulāti savisayeva pañcamī. Cittaṃ rakkhetha medhāvīti dutiyāva dissati
anya-e0801n0:1301_3: kammatthe. Upajjhāyā antaradhāyati, upajjhāyā adhite, kāmato jāyate sokoti savisaye pañcamī.
anya-e0801n0:1302_0: Tattheva-ntaradhāyi su, naṭassa suṇoti, padumaṃ tattha jāyethāti sattamīchaṭṭhiyopi
anya-e0801n0:1302_1: honteva savisaye. Himavantā pabhavati gaṅgā, pāṇātipātā viramassu khippaṃ, añño devadattā,
anya-e0801n0:1302_2: bhinno devadattāti savisayeva pañcamī. Evaṃ ārā so āsavakkhayā, itaro devadattā,
anya-e0801n0:1302_3: uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā, pubbo gāmā, pubbeva sambodhā, tato paraṃ, tato
anya-e0801n0:1302_4: aparena samayena, tatuttarinti. Sambandhavacanicchāyaṃ chaṭṭhīpi purato gāmassa,
anya-e0801n0:1302_5: dakkhiṇato gāmassa, upari pabbatassa, heṭṭhā pāsādassāti. Pāsādamāruyha pekkhati
anya-e0801n0:1302_6: pāsādā pekkhati, āsane upavisitvā pekkhati āsanā pekkhatīti avadhivacanicchāyaṃ pañcamī.
anya-e0801n0:1303_0: Pucchānākhyānesu kuto bhavaṃ? Pātaṭaliputtasmāti. Tathā desakālamānepi pāṭaliputtasmā
anya-e0801n0:1303_1: rājagahaṃ satta yojanāni, sattasu yojanesūti vā. Evaṃ ito tiṇṇaṃ māsāna-maccayenāti,
anya-e0801n0:1303_2: kicchāladdhanti guṇe pañcamī. Kicchena me adhigatanti hetumhi karaṇe vā tatiyā. Evaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1303_3: thokā mutto, thokena muttoti. Thokaṃ calatīti kiriyāvisesane kammani dutiyā.
anya-e0801n0:1304_0: Dūranti katthayogepi savisayeva pañcamīchaṭṭhiyo siyuṃ, dūraṃ gāmasmā, antikaṃ gāmasmā,
anya-e0801n0:1304_1: dūraṃ gāmassa, antikaṃ gāmassāti, dūranti katthehi tu sabbāva savisaye siyuṃ bādhakābhāvā
anya-e0801n0:1305_1: tu sabbāva savisaye’ti, te panaññeheva paṭikkhittā. Dūraṃ maggo, antikaṃ maggoti
anya-e0801n0:1305_2: kiriyāvisesanaṃ… bhūdhātussa gammamānattā. Visuddho lobhanīyehi dhammehi, parimutto
anya-e0801n0:1305_3: so dukkhasmā vivicceva kāmehi, gambhīrato ca puthulato ca yojanaṃ, āyāmena yojanaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1305_4: tato pabhuti, yato sarāmi attānanti savisayeva vibhattiyo.
anya-e0801n0:1307_0: Vajjane vattamānehi apaparīhi yoge pañcamī hoti. Apa sālāya āyanti vāṇijā, pari sālāya
anya-e0801n0:1307_1: āyanti vāṇijā, sālaṃ vajjetvāti attho. Vajjaneti kiṃ? Rukkhaṃ parivijjotate vijju.
anya-e0801n0:1307_2: Āpāṭaliputtasmā vassi devoti mariyādā-bhividhīsvavadhi visayeva pañcamī, vinā pāṭaliputtena
anya-e0801n0:1307_3: saha veti viseso, evaṃ yāva pāṭaliputtasmā vassi devoti.
anya-e0801n0:1309_0: Paṭinidhimhi paṭidāne ca vattamānena patinā yoge nāmasmā pañcamī vibhatti hoti. Buddhasmā
anya-e0801n0:1309_1: pati sāriputto, ghatamassa tesasmā pati dadāti, paṭinidhipaṭidānesūti kiṃ? Rukkhaṃ pati vijjotate.
anya-e0801n0:1311: Ritesaddena yoge nāmasmā dutiyā hoti pañcamī ca. Rite saddhammaṃ, rite saddhammā.
anya-e0801n0:1313: Vinā-ññatrasaddehi yoge nāmasmā tatiyā ca hoti dutiyā pañcamiyo ca. Vinā vātena, vinā vātaṃ, vinā vātasmā, aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakena, aññatra dhammaṃ, aññatra dhammā.
anya-e0801n0:1315: Etehi yoge tatiyā hoti pañcamī ca. Puthageva janena, puthageva janasmā, janena nānā, janasmā nānā.
anya-e0801n0:1317_0: Kiriyādhāra bhūta kattu kammānaṃ dhāraṇena yo kiriyāyādhāro tasmiṃ kārake nāmasmā
anya-e0801n0:1317_1: sattamī hoti. Kaṭe nisīdati (devadatto), thāliyaṃ odanaṃ pacati, ākāse sakunā, bhilesu
anya-e0801n0:1319: Nimittatthe sattamī hoti. Ajinamhi haññate dīpi, musāvāde pācitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1321_0: Yassa bhāvo bhāvantarassa lakkhaṇaṃ bhavati, tato sattamī hoti. Gāvīsu duyhamānāsu
anya-e0801n0:1321_1: gato, duddhāsu āgato. Bhāvoti kiṃ? Yo jaṭāhi so bhuñjati. Bhāvalakkhaṇanti kiṃ? Yo
anya-e0801n0:1321_2: bhuñjati so devadatto, “akāle vassati tassa, tāle tassa na vassatī”ti visayasattamī.
anya-e0801n0:1323_0: Yassa bhāvo bhāvantarassa lakkhaṇaṃ bhavati, tato chaṭṭhī bhavati sattamī ca anādare
anya-e0801n0:1323_1: gamyamāne. “Ākoṭayanto so neti, sivirājassa pekkhato”, “maccu gacchati ādāya, pekkhamāne mahājane”.
anya-e0801n0:1324_0: Gunnaṃ sāmīti sambandhe chaṭṭhī, gosu sāmīti visayasattamī, evaṃ gunnamissaro, gosvissaro,
anya-e0801n0:1324_1: gunnaṃ adhipati, gosu adhipati, gunnaṃ dāyādo, gosu dāhādo, dunnaṃ sakkhi, gosu sakkhi,
anya-e0801n0:1324_2: gunnaṃ patibhū, gosu patibhū, gunnaṃ pasūto, gosu pasūto, kusalā naccagītassa, kusalā
anya-e0801n0:1325_0: Tathādhāravacanicchāyaṃ sattamī, bhikkhūsu abhivādenti, muddhani dhumbitvā, bāhāsu
anya-e0801n0:1325_1: gahetvā, hatthesu piṇḍāya caranti, pathesu gacchanti, kadalīsu gaje rakkhantīti.
anya-e0801n0:1325_2: Ñāṇasmiṃ pasannoti visayasattamī, ñāṇena pasannoti karaṇe tatiyā, evaṃ ñāṇasmiṃ ussukko ñāṇena ussukkoti.
anya-e0801n0:1327_0: Jātiguṇakiriyāhi samudāyatekadesassa puthakkaraṇaṃ niddhāraṇaṃ. Yato taṃ karīyati,
anya-e0801n0:1327_1: tato chaṭṭhīsattamiyo honti. Sālayo sūkadhaññānaṃ pathyatamā, sālayo sūkadhaññesu
anya-e0801n0:1327_2: pathyatamā, kaṇhā gāvīnaṃ sampannakhīratamā, kaṇhā gāvīsu sampannakhīratamā, gacchataṃ
anya-e0801n0:1327_3: dhāvanto sīghatamo, gacchantesu dhāvanto sīghatamo. Sīlameva sutā seyyoti avadhimhiyeva pañcamī.
anya-e0801n0:1329_0: Nāmassābhidheyyamatte paṭhamāvibhatti hoti. Rukkho. Itthi pumā napuṃsakanti liṅgampi
anya-e0801n0:1329_1: saddatthova, tathā doṇo khārī āḷhakanti parimāṇampi saddatthova, eko dve bahavoti
anya-e0801n0:1331: Sato saddenābhimukhīkaraṇamāmantaṇaṃ. Tasmiṃ visaye paṭhamā vibhatti hoti. Bhopurisa, bhokkatthi, bho napuṃsaka.
anya-e0801n0:1333_0: Kiriyākārakasañjāto assedambhāvahetuko sambandho nāma. Tasmiṃ chaṭṭhī vibhatti hoti.
anya-e0801n0:1333_1: Rañño puriso, sarati rajjassāti sambandhe chaṭṭhī, rajjasambandhiniṃ satiṃ karotīti
anya-e0801n0:1333_2: attho, kammavacanicchārantu dutiyāva sarati rajjaṃ. Tathā rajakassa vatthaṃ dadāti,
anya-e0801n0:1333_3: paharato piṭṭhiṃ dadāti, bālo pūrati pāpassa, amacce tāta jānāhi, dhīre atthassa
anya-e0801n0:1333_4: kovide, divasassa tikkhattuṃ, sakiṃ pakkhassa, pūraṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇassa kumbhantvevamādi.
anya-e0801n0:1334_0: Kitakappayoge kaktukammesu bahulaṃ sambandhavacanicchāyaṃ chaṭṭhī, sādhu sammato
anya-e0801n0:1334_1: bahujanassa, suppaṭividdhā buddhānaṃ dhammadhātu, dhammassa gutto medhāvī, amataṃ
anya-e0801n0:1334_2: tesaṃ paribhuttaṃ, tassa bhavanti vattāro, avisaṃvādako lokassa, alajjīnaṃ nissāya,
anya-e0801n0:1335: Kattukammavacanicchāyantu tatiyā dutiyāyo ca, sañcatto pitarā ahaṃ, sarasi tvaṃ evarūpiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā, bhagavantaṃ dassanāyatvevamādi.
anya-e0801n0:1337_0: Tulyatthena yoge chaṭṭhī hoti tatiyā vā, tulyo pitu, tulyo pitarā, sadiso pitu, sadiso
anya-e0801n0:1337_1: pitarā, iha kathaṃ tatiyā na hoti? Ajjunassa tulā natthi, kesavassupamā na ceti,
anya-e0801n0:1339: Akāranthato nāmasmā yonaṃ ṭāṭe honti yathākkamaṃ, ṭakārā sabbadesatthā, buddhā buddhe, atoti kiṃ? Kaññāyo, itthiyo, vadhuyo, idha kasmā na bhavati aggayo. Avidhānasāmatthiyā.
anya-e0801n0:1341: Akārantato nāmasmā ninaṃ ṭāṭe vā honti yathākkamaṃ. Rūpā, rūpe, rūpāni, atotveva aṭṭhīni.
anya-e0801n0:1343: Akārantato nāmasmā smāsminnaṃ ṭāṭe vā honti yathākkamaṃ. Buddhā buddhasmā, buddhe buddhasmiṃ, atotveva aggismā aggismiṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1345_0: Akārantato parassa sassa catutthiyā āyo hoti vā. Buddhāya buddhassa, bhiyyo tādatthyeyevāyamāyo
anya-e0801n0:1345_1: dissate, kvacidevaññattha, atotveva isissa, catutthiyāti kiṃ? Buddhassa mukhaṃ, attatthanti
anya-e0801n0:1346_0: Sabbāditopi smāsmiṃsānaṃ ṭāṭeāyā honteva… niruttikārānumatattā buddhavacane sandassanavato
anya-e0801n0:1346_1: ca, tatrodamudāharaṇaṃ ‘asmā lokā paramhā ca, ubhayā dhaṃsate naro’, ‘tyāhaṃ mante
anya-e0801n0:1346_2: paratthaddho’, ‘yāyeva kho panatthāya āgaccheyyātho tamevatthaṃ sādhukaṃ manasikareyyātho’ti.
anya-e0801n0:1348: Ghapato nādīnamekasmiṃ yayā honi yathākkamaṃ. Kaññāya, rattiyā, itthiyā, dhenuyā, vadhuyā, ekasminti kiṃ? Kaññāhi, rattīhi.
anya-e0801n0:1350_0: Ghapasaññehi tetimāmūhi nādīnamekasmiṃssā vā hoti, tassā kataṃ, tassā dīyate, tassā
anya-e0801n0:1350_1: nissaṭaṃ, tassā pariggaho, tassā patiṭṭhitaṃ, tāya vā, evaṃ etissā etāya, imissā
anya-e0801n0:1350_2: imāya, amussā amuyā, etehīti kiṃ? Sabbāya, nādīnaṃ tveva? Sā, ghapatotveva? Tāhi amūhi.
anya-e0801n0:1352_0: Dvādīnaṃ sattarasannaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ nuka hoti naṃmhi vibhattamhi, dvinnaṃ catunnaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1352_1: pañcannaṃ, evaṃ yāva aṭṭhārasannaṃ, ukāro uccāraṇattho, kakāro antāvayavattho, tena naṃmhi na dīgho.
anya-e0801n0:1354: Naṃmhi bahuno katissa ca nuka hoti, bahunnaṃ, katinnaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1356: Jhasaññā tito naṃvacanassa ṇṇaṃṇṇannaṃ hoti, tiṇṇaṃ, tiṇṇannaṃ, jhāti kiṃ tissannaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1360: Nāmasmā sassa suña hoti, buddhassa, dvisakārapāṭhena siddhe lāghavatthamidaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1362_0: Ssamādīsvitarādīnami hoti, itarissaṃ, itarissā, ekissaṃ, ekissā, aññissaṃ, aññissā,
anya-e0801n0:1362_1: etissaṃ, etissā, etissāya, imissaṃ, imissā, imissāya, esviti kiṃ? Itarāya, esanti
anya-e0801n0:1364: Ssamādīsu tassā vā i hoti, tissaṃ tassaṃ, tissā tassā, tissāya tassāya, ssaṃssāssāyesvitveva? Tāya.
anya-e0801n0:1366: Tāetāimāto sassa ssāyo hoti vā. Tassāya tāya, etissāya etāya, imissāya imāya.
anya-e0801n0:1368: Ratyādīhi smino ṭo hoti vā, ratto rattiyaṃ, ādo ādismiṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1372: Ltuppaccayantānaṃ pitādīnaṃ ca ā hoti simhi. Kattā, pitā. Pitu, mātu, bhāvu, mītu, duhitu, jāmātu, nattu, hotu, potu.
anya-e0801n0:1374: Ltupitādīnaṃ a hoti ge ā ca, bho katta, bho kattā, bho pita, bho pitā.
anya-e0801n0:1376: A i u iccesaṃ vā dīgho hoti ge pare tiliṅge. Bho purisā, bho purisa, bho aggī, bho aggi, bho bhikkhū, bho bhikkhū.
anya-e0801n0:1378_0: Ghato brahmādito ca gasse vā hoti. Bhoti kaññe, bhoti kaññā, bho brahme, bho brahma,
anya-e0801n0:1378_1: bho khatte, bho khatta, bho ise, bho isi, bho sakhe, bho sakha. Sakhi sakhīti itthiyaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1380: Ammādīhi gasse na hoti. Bhoti ammā, bhoti annā, bhoti ambā.
anya-e0801n0:1382: Ammādīnaṃ ge rasso hoti vā. Bhoti amma, bhoti ammā.
anya-e0801n0:1384: Ssamādīsu gho rasso hoti. Tassaṃ, tassā, tassāya, taṃ, sabhatiṃ, esviti kiṃ? Tāya, sabhāya.
anya-e0801n0:1386_0: Ekavacane yosu ca ghaokārantavajjitā naṃ nāmānaṃ rasso hoti tiliṅge. Itthiṃ, itthiyā,
anya-e0801n0:1386_1: itthiyo, vadhuṃ vadhuyā, vadhuyo, daṇḍiṃ, daṇḍinā, daṇḍino, sayambhuṃ, sayambhunā,
anya-e0801n0:1386_2: sayambhuvo, agho nanti kiṃ? Kaññāya, kaññāyo, oggahaṇamuttaratthaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1388: Aghonaṃ ge vā rasso hoti tiliṅge, itthi, itthī, vadhu, vadhū, daṇḍi, daṇḍī, sayambhu, sayambhū. Aghonaṃtveva? Bhoti kaññā, bho go.
anya-e0801n0:1390: Napuṃsakavajjitassa nāmassa sismiṃ rasso na hoti. Itthī, daṇḍī, vadhū, sayambhū. Sisminti kiṃ? Itthiṃ, anapuṃsakassāti kiṃ? Daṇḍi kulaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1392_0: Gasihinaṃvajjitāsu vibhattīsu gosaddassa gāvagavā honti. (Gāvaṃ, gavaṃ), gāvo, gavo,
anya-e0801n0:1392_1: gāvena, gavena, gāvassa, gavassa, gāvasmā, gavasmā, gāve, gave. Agasihinaṃsūti kiṃ?
anya-e0801n0:1392_2: Bho go, go tiṭṭhati, gohi, gonaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1394: Gossa sumhi gāvagavā honti vā. Gāvesu, gavesu, gosu.
anya-e0801n0:1396: Gossa se vā gavaṃ hoti saha sena. Gavaṃ, gāvassa, gavassa.
anya-e0801n0:1398: Naṃvacanena saha gossa gunnaṃ hoti gavaṃca vā. Gunnaṃ, gavaṃ, gonaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1400: Goto nāssa ā hoti vā. Gāvā, gavā, gāvena, gavena.
anya-e0801n0:1402: Aṃvacane gossa gāvha vā hoti. Vāvhaṃ, gāvaṃ, gavaṃ. Gossa goṇādeso na kato… saddantarattā.
anya-e0801n0:1404: Pasaññīto aṃvacanassa yaṃ vā hoti. Itthiyaṃ, itthiṃ. Pītoti kiṃ? Daṇḍiṃ, rattiṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1406: Jhasaññīto aṃvacanassa naṃ vā hoti. Daṇḍinaṃ, daṇḍiṃ. Kathaṃ ‘buddhaṃ ādiccabandhuna’nti? Yogavibhāvā. Jhāti kiṃ? Itthiṃ. Īti kiṃ? Aggiṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1408: Jhīto yonaṃ none vā honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge. Daṇḍīno, daṇḍine, daṇḍī, jhīto tveva? Itthiyo, pumeti kiṃ? Daṇḍīni kulāni.
anya-e0801n0:1410: Jhīto yonaṃ no vā hoti pulliṅge. Daṇḍino tiṭṭhanti, daṇḍino passa, daṇḍī vā.
anya-e0801n0:1412: Jhīto smiṃvacanassa ni hoti vā, daṇḍini, daṇḍismiṃ, jhīto tveva? Aggismiṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1414: Ambuādīhi sminoni hoti vā, phalaṃ patati ambuni, pupphaṃ yathā paṃsuni ātape kataṃ, vātveva? Ambumhi, paṃsumhi.
anya-e0801n0:1416: Kammādito smino ni hoti vā. Kammani kamme. Kamma, camma, vesma, bhasma (asma), brahma, atta, ātuma, ghamma, muddha. Kammāditoti kiṃ? Buddhe.
anya-e0801n0:1418: Kammādito nāvacanassa eno vā hoti. Kammena, kammanā, cammena, cammanā, kammāditotveva? Buddhena.
anya-e0801n0:1420: Jhalato sassa no vā hoti. Aggino aggissa, daṇḍino daṇḍissa, bhikkhuno bhikkhussa, sayambhuno sayambhussa,
anya-e0801n0:1421: Kathaṃ ‘yo ca sisso mahāmune’ ti? (3) “Ito kvaci sassa ṭānubandho”ti brahmādīsu pāṭhā sassa e ṭānubandho.
anya-e0801n0:1423: Jhalato smāssa nā hoti vā. Agginā aggismā, daṇḍinā daṇḍismā, bhikkhunā bhikkhusmā, sayambhunā sayambhusmā.
anya-e0801n0:1425: Lato yonaṃ vo hoti vā pulliṅge. Bhikkhavo bhikkhū, sayambhuvo sayambhūpumeti kiṃ? Āyūni.
anya-e0801n0:1427: Jantvādito yonaṃ no hoti vo ca vā pulliṅge. Jantuno, jantavo jantuyo, gotrabhuno, gotrabhuvo gotrabhū. Sahabhuno, sahabhuvo sahabhū.
anya-e0801n0:1429: Kūpaccayantato yonaṃ no vā hoti pulliṅge, viduno vidū, viññuno viññū, sabbaññuno sabbaññū.
anya-e0801n0:1431: Amusaddato yonaṃ lopova hoti pulliṅge, amū, pumetveva? Amuyo amūni. Vopavādoyaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1433: Amusmā sassa no na hoti, amussa, noti kiṃ? Amuyā.
anya-e0801n0:1435: Yonaṃ lope nisu ca dīgho hoti, aṭṭhī aṭṭhīni, yolopanisūti kiṃ? Rattiyo.
anya-e0801n0:1437: Esu nāmassa dīgho hoti. Aggīsu, aggīnaṃ, aggīhi.
anya-e0801n0:1439: Pañcādīnaṃ cuddasannaṃ sunaṃhisva hoti. Pañcasu, pañcannaṃ, pañcahi, chasu, channaṃ, chahi, evaṃ yāva aṭṭharasā.
anya-e0801n0:1441: Yvādīsu ntussa a hoti. Guṇavantā, guṇavantaṃ, guṇavante, guṇavantena iccādi, yvā-doti kiṃ? Guṇavā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0801n0:1443_0: Aṃsesu ntappaccayassa ṭa hoti vā ntussa ca. Yaṃ yaṃ hi rāja bhajati santaṃvāyadi
anya-e0801n0:1443_1: vā asaṃ, kiccā-nakubbassa kareyya kiccaṃ, himavaṃva pabbataṃ, sujātimantopi ajātimassa.
anya-e0801n0:1443_2: Yogavibhāgenāññatrāpi. Cakkhumā andhitā honti, vaggumudātīriyā pana bhikkhū vaṇṇavā honti.
anya-e0801n0:1445: Jhasaññassa issa yosu vā ṭa hoti pulliṅge. Aggayo aggī, jhaggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? Ikārantasamudāyassa ṭa mā siyābhi, rattiyo, iggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? Daṇḍino, pumeti kiṃ? Aṭṭhīni.
anya-e0801n0:1447: Lasaññassa ussa vevosu ṭa hoti. Bhikkhave, bhikkhavo, vevosūti kiṃ? Jantuyo, uggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? Sayambhuvo.
anya-e0801n0:1449: Yomhi kvaci lasaññassa ussa vā ṭa hoti. Hetayo, nandanti taṃ kurayo dassanena, ajjeva taṃ kurayo pāpayatu. Vāti kiṃ? Hetuyo.
anya-e0801n0:1451: Lasaññato uto yossālapane vevo honti vā pulliṅge. Bhikkhave, bhikkhavo bhikkhū, pumeti kiṃ āyūni, ālapaneti kiṃ? Jantuyo tiṭṭhanti, lutotveva? Dhenuyo, sayambhuvo.
anya-e0801n0:1453: Nāmasmā paresaṃ smāhisminnaṃ mhā bhimhi vā honti yathākkamaṃ. Buddhamhā buddhasmā, buddhebhi buddhehi, buddhamhi buddhasmiṃ, bahulādhikārāapavādavisayepi, dasasahassimhi dhātuyā.
anya-e0801n0:1457_0: Akārantānaṃ sabbādīnaṃ e hoti naṃmhi suhisu ca. Sabbesaṃ, sabbesu, sabbehi, sabbādīnanti
anya-e0801n0:1457_1: kiṃ? Buddhānaṃ, assetveva? Amūsaṃ. Sabba katara katama ubhaya itara añña aññatara
anya-e0801n0:1457_3: ya tya ta eta ima amu kiṃ eka tumha amha.
anya-e0801n0:1459: Sabbādito naṃvacanassa saṃsānaṃ honti. Sabbesaṃ, sabbesānaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1461: Sabbādīnaṃ ghapato sassa ssā vā hoti, sabbassā sabbāya, paggahaṇamuttaratthaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1463: Sabbādīnaṃ ghapato smino ssaṃ vā hoti, sabbassaṃ sabbāya, amussaṃ amuyā.
anya-e0801n0:1465: Ghapato smino yaṃ vā hoti, kaññāyaṃ kaññāya, rattiyaṃ rattiyā, vadhuyaṃ vadhuyā, sabbāyaṃ sabbāya, amuyaṃ amuyā.
anya-e0801n0:1467: Sabhāparisāhi smino tiṃ vā hoti, sabhatiṃ sabhāya, parisatiṃ parisāya.
anya-e0801n0:1469: Ehi smino si hoti vā, padasi padasmiṃ, bilasi bilasmiṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1471: Padādīhi nāssa sā hoti vā, padasā padena, bilasā bilena.
anya-e0801n0:1473: Ehi nāssa sā hoti vā, kodhasā kodhena, atthasā atthena.
anya-e0801n0:1475: Akārantato parassa nāvacanassa enādeso hoti, buddhena, atoti kiṃ? Agginā.
anya-e0801n0:1477: Akārantato nāmasmā sissa o hoti, buddho, atotveva? Aggi.
anya-e0801n0:1479: Akārantato nāmasmā sissa e hoti vā kvaci, vanappagumbe yathā phussitagge. Apavādavisayepi bahulaṃvīdhānā-sukhe dukkhe. Vāti kiṃ? Vanappagumbo kvacīti kiṃ? Pakkhe sabbattha mā hotu.
anya-e0801n0:1481: Akārantato nāmasmā sissa aṃ hoti napuṃsakaliṅge. Rūpaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1483: Akārantato nāmasmā yonaṃ ni hoti napuṃsake. Sabbāni rūpāni, niccavidhāne phalaṃ ekaccādisabbādīnaṃ paṭhamāyaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1485: Jhalato yonaṃ ni hoti vā napuṃsake, aṭṭhīni aṭṭhī, āyūni āyū.
anya-e0801n0:1487: Jhalato yonaṃ lopo hoti, aṭṭhī, āyū, aggī, bhikkhū, jhalātveva? Aggayo. Pageva kasmā na hoti? Antaraṅgattā akārassa.
anya-e0801n0:1489_0: Jantuhetūhi īkārantehi ghapa saññehi ca paresaṃ yonaṃ vā lopo hoti, jantū jantuyo,
anya-e0801n0:1489_1: hetū hetuyo, daṇḍī daṇḍiyo, kaññā kaññāyo, rattī rattiyo, itthī itthiyo, dhenū dhenuyo, vadhū vadhuyo.
anya-e0801n0:1491_0: Pasaññassa ivaṇṇassa lopo hoti vā yakāre, ratyo ratyā, ratyaṃ, pokkharañño, pokkharaññā,
anya-e0801n0:1491_1: pokkharaññaṃ, vā tveva? Rattiyo, passāti kiṃ? Daṇḍiyo, ivaṇṇassāti kiṃ? Dhenuyo vadhuyo.
anya-e0801n0:1493: Nāmasmā gasīnaṃ lopo hoti vijjhantarābhāve, bho purisa, ayaṃ, daṇḍī.
anya-e0801n0:1495: Avijjamānasaṅkhyehi parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti, ca vā eva evaṃ, etasmāyeva liṅgā asaṅkhyehi syādyuppatti anumīyate.
anya-e0801n0:1497_0: Ekatthībhāve sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti bahulaṃ, puttīyati, rājapuriso, vāsiṭṭho,
anya-e0801n0:1497_1: kvaci na hoti bahulaṃ vidhānā-parantapo, bhagandaro, parassapadaṃ, attanopadaṃ, gavampati,
anya-e0801n0:1499: Amādekatthā pubbaṃ yadekatthaṃ tato parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti. Adhitthi. Idha na hoti bahulaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1500: Vidhānā yathāpatthīyā, yathāparisāya, pubbasmāti kiṃ? Gāmagato.
anya-e0801n0:1502: Amādekatthā pubbaṃ yadekatthamakārantaṃ, tato parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo na hoti, antu, bhavatyapañcamyā, upakumbhaṃ, apañcamiyāti kiṃ? Upakumbhā ānaya.
anya-e0801n0:1504: Amādekatthā pubbaṃ yadekatthamakārantaṃ, tato parāsaṃ tatiyāsatthamīnaṃ vā aṃ hoti, upakumbhena kataṃ, upakumbhaṃ kataṃ, upakumte nidhehi, upakumbhaṃ nidhehi.
anya-e0801n0:1506: Nāmhi rājassi vā hoti, sabbadattena rājinā, vātveva? Raññā.
anya-e0801n0:1508: Rājassa ū hoti vā sunaṃhisu, rājūsu rājesu, rājūnaṃ raññaṃ, rājūhi rājehi.
anya-e0801n0:1510: Imasaddassānitthiyaṃ ṭe hoti vā sunaṃhisu, esu imesu, esaṃ imesaṃ, esi imehi, anitthiyanti kiṃ? Imāsu, imāsaṃ, imāhi.
anya-e0801n0:1512: Imasaddassānitthiyaṃ nāmhi anaimiiccādesā honti, anena imīnā, anitthiyaṃtveva? Imāya.
anya-e0801n0:1514: Imasaddassānapuṃsakassa ayaṃ hoti simhi, ayaṃ puriso, ayaṃ itthī, anapuṃsakassāti kiṃ? Imaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1516: Tyatetānamanapuṃsakānaṃ tassa so hoti simhi, syo puriso, syā itthī, evaṃ so, sā, eso, esā, anapuṃsakassetveva? Tyaṃ, taṃ, etaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1518: Anapuṃsakassāmussa makārassa so hoti simhi, asu puriso, asu itthī.
anya-e0801n0:1520: Amussa massa ke vā so hoti, asuko amuko, asukā amukā, asukaṃ amukaṃ, asukāni amukāni.
anya-e0801n0:1522: Tasaddassa tassa no vā hoti sabbāsu vibhattīsu, ne te nāyo tāyo, naṃ taṃ, nāni tāni iccādi.
anya-e0801n0:1524_0: Sādīsvimassa tatassa ca ṭo vā hoti, assa imassa, asmā imasmā, asmiṃ imasmiṃ, assāya
anya-e0801n0:1524_1: imissāya, assaṃ imissaṃ, assā imissā, āsaṃ imāsaṃ, amhā imamhā, amhi imamhi, assa
anya-e0801n0:1524_2: tassa, asmā tasmā, asmiṃ tasmiṃ, assāya tassāya, assaṃ tassaṃ, assā tassā, āsaṃ tāsaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1524_3: amhā tamhā, amhi tamhi, ssāyādiggahaṇamādesantare mā hotūti.
anya-e0801n0:1526: Isismā sissa ṭe vā hoti, ‘yo nvajja vinaye kaṅkhaṃ, atthadhammavidū ise’, vātveva? Isi.
anya-e0801n0:1528: Isismā parassa dutiyāyossa ṭe vā hoti, ‘samaṇe brāhmaṇe vande, sampannacaraṇe ise’, vātveva? Isayo passa, dutiyassāti kiṃ? Isayo tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0801n0:1530: Akārantehi ekaccādīhi yonaṃ ṭe hoti, ekacce tiṭṭhanti, ekace passa, atoti kiṃ? Ekaccāyo, evaṃ esa sa paṭhama.
anya-e0801n0:1532: Ekaccādīhi parassa nissa ṭā na hoti, ekaccāni.
anya-e0801n0:1534: Sabbādīhi parassa nissa ṭā na hoti, sabbāni.
anya-e0801n0:1536: Akārantehi sabbādīhi yonameṭa hoti, sabbe tiṭṭhanti, sabbe passa, atotveva? Sabbāyo.
anya-e0801n0:1538: Nāmabhūtehī appadhānehi ca sabbādīhi yaṃ vuttaṃ, yañcāññaṃ sabbādikāriyaṃ, taṃ na hoti, te sabbā, te piyasabbā, te atisabbā.
anya-e0801n0:1540: Tatiyatthena yoge sabbādīhi yaṃ vuttaṃ, yañcāññaṃ sabbādi kāriyaṃ, taṃ na hoti, māsena pubbānaṃ māsapubbānaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1542: Catthasamāsavisaye sabbādīhi yaṃ vuttaṃ, yañcāññaṃ sabbādikāriyaṃ, taṃ na hoti, ikkhiṇuttarapubbānaṃ, samāseti kiṃ? Amusañca tesañca dehi.
anya-e0801n0:1544: Etthasamāsavisadhaya sabbādīhi yadhassaṭa vutto, tassa vā hoti, pugguttare, pubbuttarā.
anya-e0801n0:1546: Etehi pubbādīhi chahi savisaye eṭa vā hoti, pubbe pubbā, pare parā, apare aparā, dakkhiṇe dakkhiṇā, uttare uttarā, adhare adharā, chahitikiṃ? Ye.
anya-e0801n0:1548_0: Manādīhi smimādīnaṃ sisoosāsā vā honti yathākkamaṃ, manasi manasmiṃ, manaso manassa,
anya-e0801n0:1548_1: mano manaṃ, manasā manena, manasā manasmā, kathaṃ ‘putto jāto acetaso, hitvā yāti
anya-e0801n0:1548_2: sumedhaso, suddhuttaravāsasā, hemakappanavāsase’ti? Sakattheṇatthā. Manatama tapa
anya-e0801n0:1548_3: teja sira ura vaca oja rajayasa paya (6) “saravayā-yavāsacetā jalāsayākkhayalohapaṭamanesu”.
anya-e0801n0:1552_0: Bhavantasaddassa bhontādeso vā hoti gayonāse, bhonta bhavaṃ, bhonto bhavanto, bhotā
anya-e0801n0:1552_1: bhavatā, bhoto bhavato, bho iti āmantaṇe nipāto ‘kuto nu āgacchatha bho tayo janā’,
anya-e0801n0:1552_2: evaṃ bhavantati, bhaddeti saddantharena siddhaṃ, saddhanthaiti dassa dvibhāvena.
anya-e0801n0:1554: Aggismā sissa ni yoti vā, aggini aggi.
anya-e0801n0:1556: Simhi ntappaccayassa aṃ hoti vā, gacchaṃ gacchanto.
anya-e0801n0:1558: Bhūdhātuto ntassa aṃ hoti simhi niccaṃ punabbidhānā, bhavaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1560: Simhi mahantārahantānaṃ ntassa ṭā vā hoti, mahā mahaṃ, arahā arahaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1564: Ntussa aṃṅaṃ honti simhi napuṃsake, guṇavaṃ kulaṃ, guṇavantaṃ kulaṃ, napuṃsaketiṃ kiṃ? Sīlavā bhikkhu.
anya-e0801n0:1566: Himavato simhī ntussa o vā hoti, himavanto himavā.
anya-e0801n0:1568_0: Rājādīhiyuvādīhi ca sissa ā hoti, rājā, yuvā. Rāja brahma sakha atta ātuma (7) “dhammo
anya-e0801n0:1568_1: vāññatthe” daḷhadhammā, asma, (8) “imo bhāve” aṇimā, (mahimā, garimā) laghimā, yuva
anya-e0801n0:1570: Rājādīnaṃ yuvādīnaṃ ca ānaṅa hoti vā aṃmhi, rājānaṃ rājaṃ, yuvānaṃ yuvaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1572: Rājādīhi yuvādīhi ca yonaṃ āno vā hoti, rājāno yuvāno, vā tveva? Rājā rāje, yuvā yuve.
anya-e0801n0:1574: Sakhato yona māyo no honti vā āno ca, sakhāyo, sakhino, sakhāno, vā tveva? Sakhā, sakhe.
anya-e0801n0:1576: Sakhato smino ṭe hoti, sakhe, niccattho-yamārambho.
anya-e0801n0:1578: Sakhassa i hoti nonāsesu, sakhino, sakhinā, sakhissa.
anya-e0801n0:1580: Sakhassa i vā hoti smānaṃsu, sakhismā sakhasmā, sakhīnaṃ sakhānaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1582: Sakhassa āraṅa vā hoti yosvaṃhisu smānaṃsu ca, sakhāro sakhāyo, sakhāresu sakhesu, sakhāraṃ sakhaṃ, sakhārehi sakhehi, sakhārā sakhā, sakhasmā, sakhārānaṃ sakhānaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1584: Ltuppaccayantānaṃ pitādīnaṃ ca āraṅa hotī sato-ññatra, kattāro, pitaro, kattāraṃ, pitaraṃ, kattārā, pitarā, kattari, pitari, aseti kiṃ? Kattuno, pituno.
anya-e0801n0:1586: Namhi ltupitādīnumānaṅa vā hoti, kattārānaṃ kattūnaṃ, ditarānaṃ pitunnaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1588: Namhi ltupitādīnamā vā hotī, kattānaṃ kattūnaṃ, pītānaṃ pitunnaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1590: Ltupitādihi sassa lopo vā hoti, katthu katthuno, sakamantātu sakamandhātuno, pītu pituno.
anya-e0801n0:1592: Suhisu ltupitādīnamāraṅa vā hoti, kattāresu kattūsu, pitaresu pitūsu, kattārehi kattūhi, pitarehi pītūhī.
anya-e0801n0:1594: Yosu nadisaddassa āma vā hoti, najjāyo nadiyo.
anya-e0801n0:1596: Katimhā dhayānaṃ ṭi hoti, kati tiṭṭhanti, kati passa.
anya-e0801n0:1598: Pañcādīhi cuddasahi saṃkhyāhi yonaṃ ṭo hoti pañca, pañca, evaṃ yāva aṭṭhārasā. Pañcādīhīti kiṃ? Dve, tayo, cattāro, cuddhasahīti kiṃ? Dve visatiyo.
anya-e0801n0:1600: Ubhagohi yonaṃ ṭo hoti, ubho, ubho, gāvo, gāvo, kathaṃ ‘imekaratthiṃ ubhayo vasāmā’ti? Ṭomhi yakārāgamo.
anya-e0801n0:1602: Āravādesato yonaṃ ṭo hoti, sakhāro, kattāro, pitaro.
anya-e0801n0:1604: Āravādesamhā yonaṃ ṭoṭe vā honti yathākkamaṃ, sakhāro, sakhāre sakhāyo, ṭoggahaṇaṃ lāghavatthaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1606: Āravādesamhā nāsmānaṃ ṭā hoti, kattārā, kattarā. Kūci vā hoti bayulādhikārā, etādisā sakhāramhā.
anya-e0801n0:1608: Āravādesamhā smino ṭi hoti, kattari, vitari.
anya-e0801n0:1610: Divādīhi nāmehi smino ṭi hoti, divi, bhuvi. Niccaṃ vakārāgamo.
anya-e0801n0:1612: Smimhi āro rasso hoti, kattari, nattari.
anya-e0801n0:1614: Natvādivajjitānaṃ pitādīnamāro rasso hoti sabbāsu vibhattīsu, pitaro, pitaraṃ, anutvādīnanti kiṃ? Nattāro.
anya-e0801n0:1616: Suhisu yuvādīnaṃ ānaṅa hoti, yuvānesu, yuvānehi.
anya-e0801n0:1618: Esu yuvādīnamā hoti, yuvāno, yuvānā, yuvāne.
anya-e0801n0:1620: Yuvādīhi smāsminnaṃ nāne honti yathākkamaṃ, yuvānā, yuvāne.
anya-e0801n0:1622: Yuvādīhi yonaṃ none vā honti yathākkamaṃ, yuvāno, yuvāne, vāti kiṃ? Yuve passa, noggahaṇaṃ lāghavatthaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1624: Aññapadatthe vattamānā ikārantato nāmasmā yonaṃ none vā honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge, tomaraṅkusapāṇino, tomaraṅkusapāṇine, vātveva? Tomaraṅkusapāṇayo, aññattheti kiṃ? Pāṇayo.
anya-e0801n0:1626: Aññapadatthe vatthamānā ikārantato nāmasmā smino ne hoti vā kvaci pulliṅge, kataññumhi ca posamhi, sīlavante ariya vuttine, vātveva? Ariyavuttimhi, pumetveva? Ariyavuttiyā.
anya-e0801n0:1628: Pumasaddato smino yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ vā hoti, pumāne pume.
anya-e0801n0:1630: Pumassa nāmhi yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ vā hoti, pumānā pumena.
anya-e0801n0:1632: Pumassa sumhi yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ ā ca vā hoti, pumānesu, pumāsu pumesuṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1634: Pumasaddato gassa aṃ vā hoti, bho pumaṃ bho puma, bho ittipumaṃ bho itthipuma.
anya-e0801n0:1636: Sāsaddassa ānaṅa hoti aṃse ge ca, sānaṃ, sānassa, cabhā sāna.
anya-e0801n0:1638: Vattahā sanaṃnaṃ nonānaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ, vattahāno, vattahānānaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1640: Brahmassa u vā hoti sanaṃsu, brahmuno brahmassa, brahmūnaṃ brahmānaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1644_0: Pumādinamu hoti vā sasmāsu nāmhi ca, pumuno pumassa, pumunā pumānā, pumunā pumānā,
anya-e0801n0:1644_1: kammuno kammassa, kammunā kammasmā, kammunā kammanā, thāmuno thāmassa, thāmunā thāmasmā,
anya-e0801n0:1644_2: thāmunā thāmena, addhuno addhassa, addhunā addhasmā, addhunā addhanā.
anya-e0801n0:1646: Yuvā sassa vā ino hoti, yuvino yuvassa.
anya-e0801n0:1648: Attātumehi sassa no hoti vā, attano attassa, ātumano ātumassa.
anya-e0801n0:1650: Attaātumānaṃ suhisu vā naka hoti, attanesu attesu ātumanesu ātumesu, attanehi attehi ātumanehi ātumehi, kathaṃ ‘verinesu’ti? ‘Naka’ iti yogavibhāgā.
anya-e0801n0:1652: Brahmā attaātumehi ca svāssa nā hoti, brahmunā, attanā, ātumanā.
anya-e0801n0:1654_0: Imaetasaddānaṃ kathitānukathanavisaye dutiyāyamenādeso hoti, imaṃ bhikkhuṃ vinayamajjhāpaya,
anya-e0801n0:1654_1: atho enaṃ dhammamajjhāpaya, ime bhikkhū vinayamajjhāpaya, atho ene dhammamajjhāpaya,
anya-e0801n0:1656: Sabbāsu vibhattisu kissa ko hoti, ko, eka, kā, kāyo, kaṃ, kāni, keneccāmi.
anya-e0801n0:1658: Anitthiyaṃ kissa ki vā hoti sasmiṃsu, kissa kassa, kismiṃ kasmiṃ, anitthiyanti kiṃ? Kassā, kassaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1660: Aṃsisu saha tehi kiṃsaddassa kiṃ hoti napuṃsake. Kiṃ, kiṃ, napuṃsaketi kiṃ? Ko, kaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1662: Aṃsisu saha teti imassa idaṃ hoti vā napuṃsake, idaṃ imaṃ, idaṃ imaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1664: Aṃsisu saha tehi amussa aduṃ hoti vā napuṃsake, aduṃ amuṃ, aduṃ amuṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1666: Amhassa asmā hoti vā sumhi, bhattirasmāsu yā tava, vā tveva? Amhesu.
anya-e0801n0:1668: Naṃmhi ticatunnaṃ tissacatassā honti itthiyaṃ yathākkamaṃ, tissannaṃ catassannaṃ, itthiyanti kiṃ? Tiṇṇaṃ catunnaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1670: Vibhattisahitānaṃ ticatunnaṃ yomhi tisso catasso honti itthiyaṃ yathākkamaṃ, tisso catasso.
anya-e0801n0:1672: Yomhi savibhattīnaṃ ticatunnaṃ yathākkamaṃ tīṇicattāri honti napuṃsake, tīṇi. Cattāri.
anya-e0801n0:1674: Yomhi savibhattīnaṃ ticatunnaṃ tayocattāro honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge, tayo, cattāro.
anya-e0801n0:1676: Catusaddassa savibhattissa yomhi caturo vā hoti pulliṅge, caturo janā saṃvidhāya, kathaṃ ‘caturo nimitte nāddassāsi’nti? Liṅgavipallāsā.
anya-e0801n0:1678: Yosvamhassa savibhattissa mayamasmā vā honti yathākkamaṃ, mayaṃ, asmā, amhe.
anya-e0801n0:1680: Naṃsesvamussa savibhattissa asmākaṃ mamaṃ honti vā yathākkamaṃ, asmākaṃ, amhākaṃ, mamaṃ mama.
anya-e0801n0:1682: Simhi amhassa savibhattissa ahaṃ hoti, ahaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1684: Aṃmhi simhi ca tumhassa savibhattissa tuvaṃtvaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ, tuvaṃ, tvaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1686: Tumhassa tayātayīnaṃ takārassa tva hoti vā, tvayā tayā, tvayi tayi.
anya-e0801n0:1688: Svāmhi tumhassa savibhattissa tvamhā hoti vā, pattā nissaṃ sayaṃ tvamhā, vā tveva? Tvayā.
anya-e0801n0:1690: Paṭhame yomhi ntantūnaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ntoiccādeso vā hoti, gacchanto, gacchantā, guṇavanto guṇavantā.
anya-e0801n0:1692: Naṃmhi ntantūnaṃ savibhatthīnaṃ taṃ vā hoti, gacchataṃ gacchantānaṃ, guṇavataṃ guṇavantānaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1694_0: Sādīsu ntantūnaṃ savibhattīnaṃ totātitā honti vā yathākkamaṃ, gacchato gacchantassa,
anya-e0801n0:1694_1: guṇavato guṇavantassa, gacchatā gacchantamhā, guṇavatā guṇavanthamhā, gacchati gacchante,
anya-e0801n0:1694_2: guṇavati guṇavante, gacchatā gacchantena, guṇavatā guṇavantena.
anya-e0801n0:1696: Ge pare ntantūnaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ṭaṭāaṃ iccādesā honti, bho gaccha, bho gacchā, bho gacchaṃ, to guṇava, bho guṇavā, bho guṇavaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1698: Yomhī dvīssa savibhattissa duvedve honti paccekaṃ, duve, dve.
anya-e0801n0:1699: 220. Duvinnaṃ naṃmhi vā. Naṃmhi dvissa savibhattissa duvinnaṃ hoti vā, duvinnaṃ, dvinnaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1700: 221. Rājassa raññaṃ. Naṃmhi rājassa savibhattissa raññaṃ hoti vā, raññaṃ rājānaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1701: 222. Nāsmāsu raññā. Nāsmāsu rājassa savibhattissa raññā hoti, raññā kataṃ, raññā nissaṭaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1702: 223. Rañño raññassa rājino se. Se rājassa savibhattissa rañño raññassa rājino honti, rañño, raññassa, rājino.
anya-e0801n0:1703: 224. Smimhi raññerājini. Smimhi rājassa savibhattissa raññe rājini honti, raññe, rājini.
anya-e0801n0:1704: 225. Samāse vā. Samāsavisaye ete ādesā rājassa vā honti, kāsiraññā kāsirājena, kāsiraññā kāsirājasmā, kāsirañño kāsirājassa, kāsiraññe kāsirāje.
anya-e0801n0:1705: 226. Smimhi tumhāmhānaṃ tayimayi. Smimhi tumhaamusaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tayimayi honti yathākkamaṃ, tayi, mayi.
anya-e0801n0:1707: Aṃmhi tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ taṃ maṃ tavaṃ mamaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ, taṃ, maṃ, tavaṃ, mamaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1709: Nāsmāsu tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tayāmayā honti yathākkamaṃ, tayā kataṃ, mayā kataṃ, tayā nissaṭaṃ, mayā nissaṭaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1711: Se tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tava mama tuyhaṃ mayhaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ, tava, tuyhaṃ, mama, mayhaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1713: Naṃmhi tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ṅaṃṅākaṃ honti paccekaṃ, tumhaṃ, tumhākaṃ, amhaṃ, amhākaṃ, yathāsaṅkhyamatra na vivacchate.
anya-e0801n0:1715: Tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ paccekaṃ ṅaṃṅākaṃ vā honti yomhi dutiye, tumhaṃ, tumhākaṃ, tumhe, amhaṃ, amhākaṃ, amhe.
anya-e0801n0:1717: Idamadhikataṃ veditabbaṃ. Pajjate-nenatthoti padaṃ-syādyantaṃ tyādyantaṃ ca, padasamūho vākyaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1719_0: Apañcamiyā yonaṃhisvapādādo vattamānānaṃ padasmā paresaṃ ekavākye ṭhitānaṃ tumhāmhasaddānaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1719_1: savibhattīnaṃ vono honti vā yathākkamaṃ, tiṭṭhatha vo, tiṭṭhatha tumhe, tiṭṭhāma
anya-e0801n0:1719_2: no, tiṭṭhāma mayaṃ, passati vo, passati tumhe, passati no, passati amhe, dīyate vo,
anya-e0801n0:1719_3: dīyate tumhaṃ, dīyate no, dīyate amhaṃ, dhanaṃ vo, dhanaṃ tumhaṃ, dhanaṃ no dhanaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1719_4: amhaṃ, kataṃ vo, kataṃ tumhehi, kataṃ no, kataṃ amhehi, apañcamyāti kiṃ? Nissaṭaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1719_5: tumhehi, nissaṭaṃ amhehi, apādādotveva? ‘Balañca bhikkhūnamanuppadinnaṃ, tumhehi
anya-e0801n0:1719_6: puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappakaṃ’, padatotveva? Tumhe tiṭṭhatha, ekavākyetveva? Devadatto
anya-e0801n0:1719_7: tiṭṭhati gāme, tumhe tiṭṭhatha nagare, savibhattīnaṃtveva? Arahati dhammo tumhādisānaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1721_0: Nāmhi se ca apādādo vattamānānaṃ padasmā paresaṃ ekavākye ṭhitānaṃ tumhāmhasaddānaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1721_1: savibhattīnaṃ teme vā honti yathākkamaṃ, kataṃ te, kataṃ tayā, kataṃ me, kataṃ mayā,
anya-e0801n0:1721_2: dīyate te, dīyate tava dīyate me, dīyate mama, dhanaṃ te, dhanaṃ tava, dhanaṃ me, dhanaṃ mama.
anya-e0801n0:1723: Kathitānukathanavisaye tumhaamha-saddānamādesā niccaṃ bhavanti punabbidhānā, gāmo tumhaṃ pariggaho, atho janapado vo pariggaho.
anya-e0801n0:1725_0: Vijjamānapubbasmā paṭhamantā paresaṃ tumhaamhasaddānamādesā vā honti anvādesepi,
anya-e0801n0:1725_1: gāme paṭo tumhākaṃ, atho nagare kambalo vo, atho nagare kambalo tumhākaṃ, sapubbāti
anya-e0801n0:1725_2: kiṃ? Paṭo tumhākaṃ, atho kambalo vo, paṭhamantāti ki? Paṭo nāgare tumhākaṃ, atho kambalo gāme vo.
anya-e0801n0:1727_0: Cādīhi yoge tumhaamhasaddānamādesā na honti, gāmo tava ca pariggaho, mama ca pariggaho,
anya-e0801n0:1727_1: gāmo tava vā pariggaho, mama vā pariggaho, gāmo tava ha pariggaho, mama ha pariggaho,
anya-e0801n0:1727_2: gāmo tavāha pariggaho, mamāha pariggaho, gāmo taveva pariggaho, mameva pariggaho,
anya-e0801n0:1727_3: evaṃ sabbattha udāharitabbaṃ, yogeti kiṃ? Gāmo ca te pariggaho, nagarañca me pariggaho.
anya-e0801n0:1729: Dassanatthesu ālocanavajjitesu payujjamānesu tumhaamhasaddānamādesā na honti, gāmo tumhe uddissāgato, gāmo amhe uddissāgato, anālocaneti kiṃ? Gāmo vo āloceti, gāmo no āloceti.
anya-e0801n0:1730_0: 293. Āmantaṇaṃ pubbamasantaṃva. Āmantaṇaṃ pubbamavijjamānaṃ viya hoti tumhāmhasaddānamādesavisaye,
anya-e0801n0:1730_1: devadatta tava pariggaho, āmantaṇanti kiṃ? Kambalo te pariggaho, pubbamiti kiṃ? ‘Mayetaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1730_2: sabbamakkhātaṃ, tumhākaṃ dvijapuṅgavā, parassa hi avijjamānatte ‘apādādo’ti paṭisedho
anya-e0801n0:1730_3: na siyā. Ivāti kiṃ? Savanaṃ yathā siyā.
anya-e0801n0:1732_0: Samānādhikaraṇe parato sāmaññavacanamāmantaṇamasantaṃ viya na hoti, māṇavaka jaṭilaka
anya-e0801n0:1732_1: te pariggaho. Parassāvijjamānattepi pubbarūpamupādāyādeso hoti, sāmaññavacananti
anya-e0801n0:1732_2: kiṃ? Devadatta māṇavaka tava pariggaho, ekattheti kiṃ? Devadatta yaññadatta tumhaṃ pariggaho.
anya-e0801n0:1734: Bahūsu vattamānamāmantaṇaṃ sāmaññavacanamekatthe avijjamānaṃ viya vā na hoti, brāhmaṇā guṇavanto tumhākaṃ pariggaho, brāhmaṇā guṇavanto vo pariggaho.
anya-e0801n0:1739: Syādyantaṃ syādyantena sahekatthaṃ hotīti idamadhikataṃ veditabbaṃ, so ca bhinnatthānamekatthībhāvo samāsoti vuccate.
anya-e0801n0:1740: 2. Asaṅkhyaṃvibhatti sampatti samīpa sākalyābhāva yathā pacchāyugapadatthe.
anya-e0801n0:1741_0: Asaṅkhyaṃ, syādyantaṃ vibhatyādīnamatthe vattamānaṃ syādyantena sahekatthaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0801n0:1741_1: tattha vibhatyatthe tāva itthīsu kathā pavattā adhitthi. Sampatti dvidhā attasampatti
anya-e0801n0:1741_2: samiddhi ca, sampannaṃ brahmaṃ sabrahmaṃ licchavīnaṃ, samiddhi bhikkhānaṃ subhikkhaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1741_3: Samīpe kumbhassa samīpamupakumbhaṃ. Sākalyesatiṇamajjhoharati, sāgyadhīte. Abhāvo
anya-e0801n0:1741_4: sambandhibhedā bahuvidho, tatra iddhābhāve-vigatā iddhi saddikānaṃ dussaddikaṃ, atthābhāve-abhāvo
anya-e0801n0:1741_5: makkhikānaṃ nimmakkhikaṃ, ahikkamābhāve-atigatāni tiṇāni nittiṇaṃ, sampatyābhāve-atigataṃ
anya-e0801n0:1741_6: lahupāvuraṇaṃ atilahupāvuraṇaṃ, lahupāvuraṇassa nāyamupabhogakāloti attho. Yathā
anya-e0801n0:1741_8: atthānativattiyaṃ-yathāsatti, sadisatte, sadiso kikhiyā sakikhi, ānupubbiye-anujeṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1743: Yathāsaddo tulyatthe vattamāno syādyantena sahekattho na bhavati, yathā devadatto tathā yaññadatto.
anya-e0801n0:1745_0: Yāvasaddo-vadhāraṇe vattamāno syādyantena sahekattho bhavati, avadhāraṇa mettakatā
anya-e0801n0:1745_1: paricchedo, yāvāmattaṃ brāhmaṇe āmantaya, yāvajīvaṃ, avadhāraṇeti kiṃ? Yāva dinnaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1745_2: tāva bhuttaṃ, nāvadhārayāmi kittakaṃ mayā bhuttanti.
anya-e0801n0:1746: 5. Payyapā bahi tiro pure pacchā vā pañcamyā.
anya-e0801n0:1747_0: Pariādayo pañcamyantena sahekatthā honti vā, paripabbataṃ vassi devo paripabbatā,
anya-e0801n0:1747_1: apapabbataṃ vassi devo apapabbatā, āpāṭaliputtaṃ vassi devo āpāṭaliputtā, bahigāmaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1747_2: bahi gāmā, tiropabbataṃ tiropabbatā, purebhattaṃ purebhattā, pacchābhattaṃ pacchābhattā, vetādhikāro.
anya-e0801n0:1749: Anusaddo sāmīpye āyāme ca vattamāno syādyantena sahekattho hoti vā, anuvanamasani gatā, anugaṅgaṃ bārāṇasī, samīpāyāmesvīti kiṃ? Rakkhamanuvijjotate vijju.
anya-e0801n0:1751_0: Tiṭṭhaguppabhutīni ekatthībhāvavisaye nipātīyante, tiṭṭhantī gāvo yasmiṃ kāle tiṭṭhagu
anya-e0801n0:1751_1: kālo, vahaggu kālo. Āyatīgavaṃ, khaleyavaṃ, lūnayavaṃ lūyamānayavamiccādi, cyanto
anya-e0801n0:1751_2: pettha kesā kesi, daṇḍā daṇḍi, tathā velāppabhāvanatthopi, pāto nahānaṃ pātarahānaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1751_3: sāyaṃ nayānaṃ sāyanahānaṃ, pātakālaṃ sāyakālaṃ, pātameghaṃ sāyameghaṃ, pātamaggaṃ sāyamaggaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1752_0: 8. Ore pari paṭi pāre majjhe heṭṭhuddhādho-ntovāchaṭṭhiyā. Orādayo saddā chaṭṭhiyantena
anya-e0801n0:1752_1: sahekatthā vā honti, ekārantattaṃ nipātanato, oregaṅgaṃ, parisikharaṃ, paṭisotaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1752_2: pāreyamunaṃ, majjhegaṅgaṃ, heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ, uddhagaṅgaṃ, adhogaṅgaṃ, anthopāsādaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1754: Yadetamatikkantamekatthaṃ, taṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ veditabbaṃ, tathā cevodāhaṭaṃ, vā kvaci bahulādhikārā, yathāparisaṃ yathāparisāya, sakāya sakāya parisāyāti attho.
anya-e0801n0:1756_0: Amādi syādyantaṃ syādyantena saha bahulamekatthaṃ hoti gāmaṃ gato gāmagato, muhuttaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1756_1: sukhaṃ muhuttasukhaṃ, vuttiyevopapadasamāse kumbhakāro, sapāko, tantavāyo, varāharo.
anya-e0801n0:1756_2: Ntamānaktavantūti vākyameva, dhammaṃ suṇanto, dhammaṃ suṇamāno, odanaṃ bhuttavā.
anya-e0801n0:1757_0: Raññā hato rājahato, asinā chinno asicchinno, pitusadiso, pitusamo, sukhasahagataṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1757_1: dadhinā upasittaṃ bhojanaṃ dadhibhojanaṃ, guḷena misso odano guḷodano, vuttipadenevopasittādikiriyāyākhyāpanato
anya-e0801n0:1757_2: natthāyuttatthatā. Kvaci vuttiyeva urago, pādapo. Kvaci vākyameva pharasunā chinnavā,
anya-e0801n0:1758: Buddhassa deyyaṃ buddhadeyyaṃ, yūpāya dāru yūpādāru, rajanāya doṇi rajanadoṇi. Idha na hoti saṅghassa dātabbaṃ. Kathaṃ ‘etadattho etadatthā etadattha’nti? Aññapadatthe bhavissati.
anya-e0801n0:1759: Savarehi bhayaṃ savarabhayaṃ, gāmaniggato, methunāpeto, kvaci vuttiyeva kammajaṃ, cittajaṃ, idha na hoti rukkhā patito.
anya-e0801n0:1760_0: Rañño puriso rājapuriso. Bahulādhikārā ntamānaniddhāriyapūraṇabhāvatittatthehi na
anya-e0801n0:1760_1: hoti-mamānukubbaṃ, mamānukurumāno, gunnaṃ kaṇhā sampannakhīratamā, sissānaṃ pañcamo,
anya-e0801n0:1760_2: paṭassa sukkatā, kvaci hoteva-vattamānasāmīpyaṃ, kathaṃ ‘brāhmaṇassa sukkā dantā’ti?
anya-e0801n0:1760_3: Sāpekkhatāya na hoti. Idha pana hoteva ‘candanagandho, nadighoso, kaññārūpaṃ, kāyasamphasso,
anya-e0801n0:1760_4: phalaraso’ti, phalānaṃ titto, phalānamāsito, phasānaṃ suhito.
anya-e0801n0:1761_0: Brāhmaṇassa uccaṃ gehanti sāpekkhatāya na hoti, ‘rañño pāṭaliputtakassa dhana’nti
anya-e0801n0:1761_1: dhanasambandhe chaṭṭhīti pāṭaliputtakena sambandhābhāvā na hessati, ‘rañño go ca
anya-e0801n0:1761_2: asso ca puriso cā’ti bhinnatthatāya vākyameva, ‘rañño gavāssapurisā rājagavāssapurisā’ti
anya-e0801n0:1762_0: Dāne soṇḍo dānasoṇḍo, dhammarato, dānābhirato. Kvaci vuttiyeva kucchisayo, thalaṭṭho,
anya-e0801n0:1762_1: paṅkajaṃ, saroruhaṃ. Idha na hoti bhojane mattaññutā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, āsane
anya-e0801n0:1764_0: Visesanaṃ syāntaṃ visessena syādyantena samānādhikaraṇena sahekatthaṃ hoti, nīlañca
anya-e0801n0:1764_1: taṃ uppalañceti nīluppalaṃ, chinnañca taṃ paruḷhañceti chinnaparaḷhaṃ, satthīva satthī,
anya-e0801n0:1764_2: satthī ca sā sāmā ceti satthisāmā, sīhova sīho, muni ca so sīho ceti munisīho, sīlameva dhanaṃ sīladhanaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1765_0: Kvaci vākyameva puṇṇo mantāṇiputto, citto gahapati. Kvaci vuttiyeva kaṇhasappo, lohitasāli,
anya-e0801n0:1765_1: visesananti kiṃ? Tacchako sappo, ekattheneti kiṃ? Kāḷamhā añño. Kathaṃ ‘pattajīviko,
anya-e0801n0:1767_0: Nañiccetaṃ syādyantaṃ syādyantena sahekatthaṃ hoti, na brāhmaṇo abrāhmaṇo, bahulādhikārato
anya-e0801n0:1767_1: asamatthatthehi, kehici hoti ‘apunageyyā gāthā, anokāsaṃ kāretvā, amūlā mūlaṃ gantvā.
anya-e0801n0:1767_2: Īsaṃkaḷāro, īsaṃpiṅgaloti ‘syādi syādine’ti samāso, vākyameva vātippasaṅgābhāvā.
anya-e0801n0:1769_0: Kusaddo pādayo ca syādyantena sahekatthā honti niccaṃ syādividhivisayato-ñattha,
anya-e0801n0:1769_1: kucchito brāhmaṇo kubrāhmaṇo, īsakaṃ uṇhaṃ kaduṇhaṃ, panāyako, abhiseko, pakaritvā,
anya-e0801n0:1769_2: pakataṃ, duppuriso, dukkaṭaṃ, supuriso, sukataṃ, abhitthutaṃ, atitthutaṃ, ākaḷāro, ābaddho.
anya-e0801n0:1770: (9) “Pādayo gatādyatthe paṭhamāya”. Pagato ācariyo pācariyo, pantevāsī.
anya-e0801n0:1772: (11) “Avādayo kuṭṭhādyatthe tatiyāya”. Avakuṭṭhaṃ kokilāya vanaṃ avakokilaṃ, avamayūraṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1775: Nikkhanto kosambiyā nikkosampi, asyādividhimhīti kiṃ? Rukkhaṃ pati vijjotate.
anya-e0801n0:1777: Cīppaccayanto kiriyatthehi syādyantehi sahekattho hoti, malinīkariya.
anya-e0801n0:1779_0: Bhūsanādisvatthe svalamādayo saddā kiriyatthehi syādyantehi sahekatthā honti, alaṃkariya,
anya-e0801n0:1779_1: sakkacca, asakkacca. Bhūsanādīsūti kiṃ? Alaṃbhutvā gato, sakkatvā gato, asakkatvā
anya-e0801n0:1781: Aññe ca saddā kiriyatthehi syādyantehi saha bahulamekatthā bhavanti, purobhūya, tirobhūya, tirokariya, urasikariya, manasikariya, majjhekariya, tuṇhībhūya.
anya-e0801n0:1783_0: Anekaṃ syādyantamaññassa padassatthe ekatthaṃ vā hoti, bahūni dhanāni yassa so bahudhano,
anya-e0801n0:1783_1: lambā kaṇṇā yassa so lambakaṇṇo, vajiraṃ pāṇimhi yassa soyaṃ vajirapāṇi, mattā bahavo
anya-e0801n0:1783_2: mātaṅgā ettha mattabahumātaṅgaṃ vanaṃ, āruḷho vānaro yaṃ rukkhaṃ so āruḷhavānaro,
anya-e0801n0:1783_3: jitāni indriyāni yena so jitindriyo, dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ yassa so dinnabhojano, apagataṃ
anya-e0801n0:1783_4: kāḷakaṃ yasmā paṭā so-yamapagatakāḷako, upagatā dasa yesaṃ te upadasā, āsannadasā,
anya-e0801n0:1783_5: adūradasā, adhikadasā, tayo dasa parimāṇamesaṃ tidasā, kathaṃ dasasaddo saṅkhyāne
anya-e0801n0:1783_6: vattate? Parimāṇasaddasannidhānā, yathā pañca parimāṇamesaṃ pañcakā sakunāti, dve
anya-e0801n0:1783_7: vā tayo vā parimāṇamesaṃ dvattayo vāsaddatthe vā dve vā tayo vā dvattayo.
anya-e0801n0:1784_0: Dakkhiṇassā ca pubbassā ca disāya yadantarāḷaṃ dakkhiṇapubbā disā, dakkhiṇā ca sā
anya-e0801n0:1784_1: pubbā cāti vā, saha puttenāgato saputto, salomako vijjamānalomakoti attho, evaṃ sapakkhako,
anya-e0801n0:1784_2: atthī khīrā brāhmaṇīti atthisaddo vijjamānatthe nipāto, kvaci gatatthatāya padantarānamappayogo,
anya-e0801n0:1784_3: kaṇṭhaṭṭhā kāḷā assa kaṇṭhekāḷo, oṭṭhassa mukhamiva mukhamassa oṭṭhamukho, kesasaṅghāto
anya-e0801n0:1784_4: cūḷā assa kesacūḷo, suvaṇṇavikāro alaṅkāro assa suvaṇṇālaṅkāro, papatitaṃ paṇṇamassa
anya-e0801n0:1784_5: papatitapaṇṇo, papaṇṇo, avijjamānā puttā assa avijjamānaputto, na santi puttā assa
anya-e0801n0:1784_6: aputte, kvaci na hoti pañca bhuttavanto assa bhātuno putto assa atthīti bahulādhikārato.
anya-e0801n0:1785: 18. Tattha gahetvā tena paharitvā yuddhe sarūpaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1786_0: Sattamyantaṃ tatiyantañca sarūpamanekaṃ tattha gahetvā tena paharitvā yuddhe-ññapadatthe
anya-e0801n0:1786_1: ekatthaṃ vā hoti, kesesu ca kesesu ca gahetvā yuddhaṃ pavattaṃ kesākesi, daṇḍehi
anya-e0801n0:1786_2: ca daṇḍehi ca paharitvā yuddhaṃ pavattaṃ daṇḍādaṇḍi, muṭṭhāmuṭṭhi, “ci vītiyāre”
anya-e0801n0:1786_3: (3-51) ti ci samāsanto, “cismiṃ” (3.66) ti akāro. Tattha teneti kiṃ? Kāyañca kāyañca
anya-e0801n0:1786_4: gahetvā yuddhaṃ pavattaṃ. Gahetvā paharitvāti kiṃ? Rathe ca rathe ca ṭhatvā yuddhaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1786_5: pavatti. Yuddheti kiṃ? Hatthe ca hatthe ca gahetvā sakhyaṃ pavattaṃ. Sarūpanti kiṃ?
anya-e0801n0:1786_6: Daṇḍehi ca musalehi ca paharitvā yuddha pavattaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1788_0: Anekaṃ syādyantaṃ catthe ekatthaṃ vā bhavati. Samuccayonvācayo itarītarayogo samāhāro
anya-e0801n0:1788_1: ca ca saddatthā, tattha samuccayānvācayesu nekatthībhāvo sambhavati, tesu hi samuccayo
anya-e0801n0:1788_2: aññamaññanirapekkhā namattappadhānānaṃ katthaci kiriyāvisese cīyamānatā, yathā ‘dhave
anya-e0801n0:1788_3: ca khadire ca palāse ca chindā’ti. Anvācayo ca yattheko padhānabhāvena vidhīyate
anya-e0801n0:1788_4: aparo ca guṇabhāvena, yathā ‘bhikkhañcara gāvo cānaye’ti. Itaradvaye tu sambhavati,
anya-e0801n0:1788_7: samudāyappadhāno samāhāro, yathā ‘chattupāhana’nti, assa pana samudāyappadhānattā ekavacanameva.
anya-e0801n0:1789_0: Te ca samāhārītarītarayogā bahulaṃ vidhānā niyatavisayāyeva honti, tatrāyaṃ visayavibhāgo
anya-e0801n0:1789_3: vividhaviruddhānaṃ disānaṃ, nadīnañca niccaṃ samāhārekattaṃ bhavati, tiṇarukkhapasusakunadhanadhaññabyañjanajanappadānaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1790_0: Pāṇyaṅgānaṃ-cakkhusotaṃ, mukhanāsikaṃ, hanugīvaṃ, chavimaṃsalohitaṃ, nāmarūpaṃ, jarāmaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1790_2: gītavāditaṃ, sammatālaṃ. Yoggaṅgānaṃ phālapācanaṃ, yuganaṅgalaṃ. Senaṅgānaṃ-asisattitomarapiṇḍaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1790_4: kākolūkaṃ, nāgasupaṇṇaṃ. Saṅkhyāparimāṇa saññānaṃ-ekakadukaṃ, dukatikaṃ, tikacatukkaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1790_12: Vividhaviruddhānaṃ kusalākusalaṃ, sāvajjānavajjaṃ, hīnappaṇītaṃ, kaṇhasukkaṃ, chekapāpakaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1790_13: Disānaṃ pubbāparaṃ, dakkhiṇuttaraṃ, pubbadakkhiṇaṃ, pubbuttaraṃ, adharuttaraṃ, aparadakkhiṇaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1791_0: Tiṇavisesānaṃ-kāsakusaṃ kāsakusā, usīrabīraṇaṃ usīrabīraṇā, muñjapabbajaṃ muñjapabbajaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1791_1: muñjapabbajā. Rukkhavisesānaṃ khadirapalāsaṃ khadirapalāsā, vossakaṇṇaṃ dhavāssakaṇṇā,
anya-e0801n0:1791_3: sākasālā. Pasuvisesānaṃ-gajagavajaṃ gajagavajā, gomahisaṃ gomahisā, eṇeyyagomahisaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1791_4: eṇeyyagomahisā, eṇeyyavarāhaṃ eṇeyyavarāhā, ajeḷakaṃ ajeḷakā, kukkurasūkaraṃ kukkurasūkarā,
anya-e0801n0:1791_8: jātarūparajatā. Dhaññānaṃ-sāliyavakaṃ sāliyavakā, tilamuggamāsaṃ tilamuggamāsā, nipphāvakulatthaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1791_9: nipphāvakulatthā. Byañjanānaṃ-sākasuvaṃ sākasuvā, gabyamāhisaṃ gabyamāhisā, eṇeyyavārāhaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1791_10: eṇeyyavārāhā, migamāyūraṃ migamāyūrā. Janapadānaṃ-kāsikosalaṃ kāsikosalā, vajjimallaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1791_11: vajjimallā, cetivaṃsaṃ cetivaṃsā, macchasūrasenaṃ macchasūrasenā, kurupañcālaṃ kurupañcālā.
anya-e0801n0:1792_0: Etasmiṃ ekatthībhāvakaṇḍe yaṃ vuttaṃ pubbaṃ, tadeva pubbaṃ nipatati kamātikkame payojanābhāvā.
anya-e0801n0:1792_1: Kvaci vipallāsopi hoti bahulādhikārato, dantānaṃ rājā rājadanto, katthaci kamaṃ paccānādarā
anya-e0801n0:1792_2: pubbakālassāpi paranipāto, littavāsito, naggamusito, sittasammaṭṭho, bhaṭṭhaluñcito.
anya-e0801n0:1792_3: Catthe yadekatthaṃ tattha keci pubbapadaṃ bahudhā niyamenti, tadiha byabhicāradassāna
anya-e0801n0:1794: Catthe samāhāre yadekatthaṃ, taṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ bhavati, tathācevodāhaṭaṃ, katthaci na hoti ‘sabhāparisāyā’ti ñāpakā, ādhipaccaparivāro, chandapārisuddhi, paṭisandhipavattiyaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1796: Ekatthe samāhāre saṅkhyādi napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ bhavati, pañcagavaṃ, catuppathaṃ, samāhārassekattā ekavacanameva hoti, samāhāretveva pañcakāpālo pūvo, tiputto.
anya-e0801n0:1798_0: Chaṭṭhiyekatthe kvaci napuṃsakattaṃ hotekatthañca, salabhānaṃ chāyā salabhacchāyaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1798_1: evaṃ sakuntānaṃ chāyā sakuntacchāyaṃ, pāsādacchāyaṃ pāsādacchāyā, gharacchāyaṃ gharacchāyā,
anya-e0801n0:1798_2: amanussasabhāya napuṃsakekattaṃ bhavati brahmasabhaṃ, devasabhaṃ, indasabhaṃ, yakkhasabhaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1798_3: sarabhasabhaṃ, manussasabhāyaṃ pana khattiyasabhā, rājasabhā iccevamādi, kvacīti kiṃ rājapuriso.
anya-e0801n0:1800: Napuṃsake vattamānassa rasso hoti syādīsu. Salabhacchāyaṃ, syādīsūti kiṃ? Salabhacchāye.
anya-e0801n0:1802: Antabhūtassa appadhānassa ghapassa syādīsu rasso hoti. Bahumālo poso, nikkosambi, ativāmoru, antassāti kiṃ? Rājā kaññāpiyo, appadhānassāti kiṃ? Rājakumārī brahmabandhū.
anya-e0801n0:1804: Antabhūtassa appadhānassa gossa syādīsu u hoti. Cittagu, appadhānassātveva? Sugo, antassātveva? Gokulaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1806: Itthiyaṃ vattamānato akārantato nāmasmā āpaccayo hoti. Dhammadinnā.
anya-e0801n0:1808: Nadādīhi itthiyaṃ vīppaccayo hoti. Nadī, mahī, kumārī, taruṇī, vāruṇī, gotamī. (14) “Gotovā” gāvī go, ākatigaṇo-yaṃ, koro “ntantūnaṃ vīmhi to vā” (3-36) ti visesanattho.
anya-e0801n0:1810: Yakkhādito itthiyaṃ inī hoti vīca. Yakkhinī yakkhī, nāginī nāgī, sīhinī sīhī.
anya-e0801n0:1812: Ārāmikādito inī hotitthiyaṃ. Ārāmikinī, anantarāyikinī, rājinī (15) “saññāyaṃ mānuso” mānusinī, aññatra mānusī.
anya-e0801n0:1814: Itthiyamivaṇṇuvaṇṇantehi nī hoti bahulaṃ. Sadāpayatapāṇinī, daṇḍinī, bhikkhunī, khattabandhunī, paracittavidunī, mātuādito kasmā na hoti? Itthippaccayaṃ vināpi itthattābhidhānato.
anya-e0801n0:1816: Ktimhāññattheyeva itthiyaṃ nī hoti bahulaṃ. Sāhaṃ ahiṃ sāratinī, tassā muṭṭhassatiniyā, sā gāvī vacchagiddhinī, aññattheti kiṃ? Dhammarati.
anya-e0801n0:1818: Gharaṇippabhutayo nīppaccantāsādhavo bhavanti. Gharaṇī, pokkharaṇī, īssa-ttaṃ nipātanā, (16) “ācariyā vā ya-lopo ca” ācarinī, ācariyā.
anya-e0801n0:1820: Mātulādito bhariyāyamānī hoti. Mātulānī, vāruṇānī, gahapatānī, ācariyānī, (17) “abhariyāyaṃ khattiyā vā” khattiyānī khattiyā, nadādipāṭhā bhariyāyantu khattiyī.
anya-e0801n0:1821: 34. Upamāsaṃhita sahita saññata saha saphavāma lakkhaṇāditūrutū.
anya-e0801n0:1822: Ūrusaddā upamānādipubbā ittiyamū hoti. Karabhorū, saṃhitorū, sahitorū, saññatorū, sahorū, saphorū, vāmorū, lakkhaṇorū, ūtiyogavibhāgā ū brahmabandhū.
anya-e0801n0:1826: Vīmhi ntantūnaṃ to vā hoti. Gacchatī gacchantī, sīlavatī sīlavantī.
anya-e0801n0:1828: Vīmhi bhavato bhotādeso hoti vā. Bhotī bhavantī.
anya-e0801n0:1832: Vīmhi puthussa pathavaputhavā honti. Pathavī, puthavī, ṭhe pathavī.
anya-e0801n0:1836: Pāpādīhī parā yā bhūmi tassā samāsanto a hoti. Pāpabhūmaṃ, jātibhūmaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1838: Saṅkhyāhi parā yā bhūmi tassā samāsanto a hoti. Dvibhūmaṃ, tibhūmaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1840: Saṅkhyāhi parāsaṃ nadīgodāvarīnaṃ samāsanto a hoti, pañcanadaṃ, sattagodāvaraṃ, saṅkhyāhitveva? Mahānadī, nadīgodāvarīnanti kiṃ? Dasitthi.
anya-e0801n0:1842_0: Asaṅkhyehi saṅkhyāhi ca parāya aṅgulyā samāsanto a hoti no ce aññapadatthe asaṅkhyatthe
anya-e0801n0:1842_1: ca samāso vattate. Niggatamaṅgulīhi niraṅgulaṃ, accaṅgulaṃ, dve aṅguliyo samāhaṭā
anya-e0801n0:1842_2: dvaṅgulaṃ, anaññāsaṅkhyatthesūti kiṃ? Pañcaṅguli hattho, upaṅguli, kathaṃ ‘dve aṅgulīmānamassāti
anya-e0801n0:1842_3: dvaṅgula’nti? Nātra samāsoññapadatthe vihito mattādīnaṃ lope kate tattha vattate.
anya-e0801n0:1842_4: Aṅgulasaddo vā pamāṇavāci saddantaraṃ, yathā ‘senaṅgulappamāṇena aṅgulānaṃ sataṃ
anya-e0801n0:1844_0: Dīghādīhi asaṅkhyehi saṅkhyāhi ca paramasmā rattiyā samāsanto a hoti. Dīgharattaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1844_1: ahorattaṃ (tto), vassārattaṃ (tto), pubbarattaṃ, apararattaṃ, aḍḍhurattaṃ, atikkanto
anya-e0801n0:1844_2: rattiṃ atiratto, dverattī samāhaṭā dirattaṃ (tto), vā kvaci bahulādhikārā ekarattaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1844_3: (tto), ekaratti, anaññāsaṅkhyatthesutveva? Dīgharattihemanto, uparatti, kvaci hoteva
anya-e0801n0:1846_0: Gosaddā alopavisayā samāsanto a hoti na ce catthe samāso aññapadatthe asaṅkhyatthe
anya-e0801n0:1846_1: ca, rājagavo, paramagavo, pañcagavadhano, dasagavaṃ, alopeti kiṃ? Pañcahi gohi kīto
anya-e0801n0:1846_2: pañcagu, acattheti ki? Ajassagāvo, anaññāsaṅkhyatthesutveva? Cittagu, upagu.
anya-e0801n0:1848: Ete saddā aantā nipaccante. Ratto ca divā ca rattindivaṃ, ratti ca divā ca rattindivaṃ, dārā ca gāvo ca dāragavaṃ, catasso assiyo assa caturasso.
anya-e0801n0:1850: Anugavanti nipaccate āyāme gamyamāne. Anugavaṃ sakaṭaṃ, āyāmeti kiṃ? Gunnaṃ pañchā anugu.
anya-e0801n0:1851: 49. Akkhismāññatthe. Akkhismā samāsanto a hoti aññatthe ce samādhasā. Visālakkho, visālakkhī.
anya-e0801n0:1853_0: Aṅgulantā aññapadatthe dārumhi samāsanto a hoti. Dvaṅgulaṃdāru, pañcaṅgulaṃ, aṅgulisadisāvayavaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1853_1: dhaññādīnaṃ vikkhepakaṃ dāruṃ vuccate, pamāṇe tu pubbe viya siddhaṃ sakharājasaddā
anya-e0801n0:1853_2: akārantāva, sissopi na dissati, gāṇḍī vadhanvāti pakatantarena siddhaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1855: Oghābyatihāre gamyamāne aññapadatthe vattamānato ci hoti. Kesākesi daṇḍādaṇḍi, cakāro “cismi”nti (3.66) visesanattho, sugandhi, duggantīti payogo na dissate.
anya-e0801n0:1857: Ltuppaccayantehi, itthiyamīkārūkārantehi ca bahulaṃ kappaccayo hoti aññapadatthe. Bahukattuko, bahukumāriko, bahubrahmabandhuko, bahulaṃtveva? Subbhū.
anya-e0801n0:1859: Aññehi aññapadatthe ko vā bahulaṃ hoti. Bahumālako, bahumālo.
anya-e0801n0:1862: Uttarapade parato imassa idaṃ hoti. Idamaṭṭhitā, idappaccayatā, niggahītalopo passa ca dvibhāvo.
anya-e0801n0:1863: 56. Puṃ pumassa vā. Pumassa puṃ hotuttarapade vibhāsā. Pulliṅgaṃ, pumaliṅgaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1865: Esaṃ ṭa hotuttarapade kvaci vā. Bhavampatiṭṭhāmayaṃ, bhagavaṃmūlakā no dhammā, bahulādhikārā tarādīsu ca pageva mahattarī, rattaññumahattaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1867: 59. Manādyāpādīnamo maye ca. Manādīnamāpādīnaṃ ca o hotuttarapade maye ca. Manoseṭṭhā, manomayā, rajojallaṃ, rajomayaṃ, āpogataṃ, āpomayaṃ, anuyanti disodisaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1869: Saṅkhyāsuttarapadesu parassa o hoti. Parosataṃ, parosahassaṃ, saṅkhyāsūti kiṃ? Paradattūpajīvino.
anya-e0801n0:1871: Jane uttarapade puthassa u hoti. Ariyehi puthagevāyaṃ janoti puthujjano.
anya-e0801n0:1873: Ahe āyatane cuttarapade chassa so vā hoti. Sāhaṃ chāhaṃ, saḷāyatanaṃ, chaḷāyatanaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1875: Ltuppaccayantānaṃ pitādīnañca yathākkamamāraṅaraṅa vā hontuttarapade, satthāradassanaṃ, kattāraniddeso, mātarapitaro, vātveva? Satthudassanaṃ, mātāpitaro.
anya-e0801n0:1877_0: Ltupitādīnaṃ vijjāsambandhīnaṃ yonisambandhīnaṃ ca tesveva ltupitādīsu vijjāyonisambandhisuttarapadesu
anya-e0801n0:1877_1: catthavisaye ā hoti. Hotāpotaro mātāpitaro, ltupitādīnaṃ tveva? Puttabhātaro, tatreti
anya-e0801n0:1877_2: kiṃ? Pitupitāmahā, cattheti kiṃ? Mātubhātā, vijjāyonisambandhānanti kiṃ? Dātubhattāro.
anya-e0801n0:1879: Putte uttarapade catthavisaye ltupitādīnaṃ vijjāyoni sambandhānamā hoti. Pitāputtā, mātāputtā.
anya-e0801n0:1881: Cippaccayante uttarapade ā hoti. Kesākesi, muṭṭhāmuṭṭhi.
anya-e0801n0:1883_0: Itthiyaṃ vattamāne ekatthe samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade pare bhāsitapumā itthī pumeva
anya-e0801n0:1883_1: hoti. Kumārabhariyo, dīghajaṅgho, yuvajāyo, itthiyanti kiṃ? Kalyāṇī padhānamesaṃ
anya-e0801n0:1883_2: kalyāṇippadhānā, bhāsitapumeti kiṃ? Kaññābhariyo, itthīti kiṃ? Gāmaṇikulaṃ diṭṭhi
anya-e0801n0:1883_3: assa gāmaṇidiṭṭhi, ekattheti kiṃ? Kalyāṇiyā mātā kalyāṇimātā.
anya-e0801n0:1885: Bhāsitapumitthī paccaye kvaci pumeva moti. Byattatarā, byattatamā.
anya-e0801n0:1887: Itthivācakā sabbādayo vuttimatte pumeva honti. Tassā mukhaṃ tammukhaṃ, tassaṃ tatra, tāya tato, tassaṃ velāyaṃ tadā.
anya-e0801n0:1889: Patimhi pare jāyāya jayaṃ hoti, jayampatī, ‘jānipatī’ti pakatantarena siddhaṃ, tathā ‘dampatī, jampatī’ti.
anya-e0801n0:1893: Kumbhādīsuttarapadesu udakassa udādeso vā hoti. Udakumbho udakakumbho, udapatto udakapatto, udabindhu udakabindhu, ākatigaṇo-yaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1895: Sotādīsuttarapadesu udakassa ussa lopo hoti. Dakasotaṃ, dakarakkhaso.
anya-e0801n0:1897: Uttarapade naña saddassa ṭa hoti. Abrāhmaṇo, ñakāro kiṃ? Kevalassa mā hotu pāmanaputto.
anya-e0801n0:1899: Sarādo uttarapade naña saddassa ana hoti. Anakkhātaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1901_0: Nakhādayo saddā anana ṭādesā nipaccante. Nāssa khamatthīti nakho, akhamaññaṃ, saññāsaddesu
anya-e0801n0:1901_1: ca nipphattimattaṃ yathākathañci kattabbaṃnāssa kulamathīti nakulo, akulamaññaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1903: Nagaiccappāṇini vā nipaccate. Nago rukkho, nago pabbato, ago rukkho, ago pabbato, appāṇinīti kiṃ? Ago vasalo sītena.
anya-e0801n0:1905: Aññapadatthavutthimhi samāse uttarapade pare sahassa so vā hoti. Saputto, sahaputto, aññattheti kiṃ? Saha katvā, saha yujjhitvā.
anya-e0801n0:1907: Sahassuttarapade so hoti saññāyaṃ. Sāssatthaṃ, sapalāsaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1909: Appaccakkhe gamyamāne sahassa so hotuttarapade, sāggi kapoto, sapisācā vātamaṇḍalikā.
anya-e0801n0:1911: Sakatthappadhānassa sahasaddassa akāle uttarapade so hoti. Sampannaṃ brahmaṃ sabrahmaṃ, sacakkaṃ nidhehi, sadhuraṃ pājehi, akāleti kiṃ? Saha pubbaṇhaṃ, sahāparaṇhaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1913: Ganthante ādhikye ca vattamānassa sahassa so hotuttarapade. Sakalaṃ jotimadhīte samuhuttaṃ, kālattho ārambho, ādhikye-sadoṇā khārī, samāsako kahāpaṇo, niccatthoyamārambho.
anya-e0801n0:1915_0: Pakkhādīsuttarapadesu samānassa so hoti vā. Sapakkho samānapakkho, sajoti samānajoti,
anya-e0801n0:1915_1: pakkhādīsūti kiṃ? Samānasīlo, pakkha, joti, janapada, ratti, pattinī, pattī, nābhi,
anya-e0801n0:1915_2: bandhu brahmacārī, nāma, gotta, rūpa, ṭhāna, vaṇṇa, vayo, vacana, dhamma, jātiya, ghacca.
anya-e0801n0:1917: Udare iye pare parato samānassa so vā hoti. Sodariyo, samānodariyo, iyeti kiṃ? Samānodaratā.
anya-e0801n0:1919: Etesu samānassa so hoti. Sarī, sarikkho, sariso.
anya-e0801n0:1921: Rīrikkhakesu sabbādīnamā hoti. Yādī, yādikkho, yādiso.
anya-e0801n0:1923: Rīrikkhakesu ntasadda kiṃsadda imasaddānaṃ ṭākīṭī honti yathākkamaṃ. Bhavādī, bhavādikkho, bhavādiso, kīdī, kīdikkho, kīdiso, īdī, īdikkho, īdiso.
anya-e0801n0:1925: Rīrikkhakesu tumhāmhānaṃ tāmā hontekasmiṃ yathākkamaṃ. Tādī, tādikkho, tādiso, mādī, mādikkho, mādiso. Ekasminti kiṃ? Tumhādī, amhādī, tumhādikkho, amhādikkho, tumhādiso, amhādiso.
