anya-e0801n0:1927: Rīrikkhakantato aññasmiṃ uttarapade tumhāmhānamekasmiṃ taṃmaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ, tandīpā, mandīpā, taṃsaraṇā, maṃsaraṇā, tayyogo, mayyogoti bindulopo.
anya-e0801n0:1929: Rīrikkhakesvetasseṭa vā hoti, edī, etādī, edikkho, etādikkho, ediso, etādiso.
anya-e0801n0:1931: Dvissa du hoti vidhādīsu, duvidho, dupaṭṭaṃ evamādi.
anya-e0801n0:1933: Guṇādīsu dvissa di hoti, dviguṇaṃ, diratti, digu evamādi.
anya-e0801n0:1937: Saṅkhyāyamuttarapade dvissa ā hoti asatādo anaññadhattha. Dvādasa, dvāvīsati dvattiṃsa, saṅkhyāyanti kiṃ? Dirattaṃ, asatādoti kiṃ? Disataṃ, disahassaṃ. Anaññattheti kiṃ? Dvidasā.
anya-e0801n0:1939: Saṅkhyāyamuttarapade tissa e hoti asatādo anaññatthe, terasa, tevīsa, tettiṃsa, saṅkhyāyaṃtveva? Tirattaṃ, asatādotveva? Tisataṃ, anaññatthetveva? Ticatukā.
anya-e0801n0:1941: Tisse vā hoti cattālīsādo, tecattālāsaṃ ticattālīsaṃ, tepaññāsaṃ tipaññāsaṃ, tesaṭṭhi tisaṭṭhi, tesattati tisattati, teasīti tiyāsīti, tenavuti tinavuti, asatādotveva? Tisataṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1943: Asatādo-naññatthe cattālīsādo dvisse vā hoti ā ca. Dvecattālīsaṃ, dvācattālīsaṃ dvicattālīsaṃ, dvepaññāsaṃ, dvāpaññāsaṃ dvipaññāsaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0801n0:1945: Dvissa bā vā hoti acattālīsādo-naññatthe. Bārasa dvādasa, bāvīsati dvāvīsati, battiṃsa dvattiṃsa, acattālīsādoti kiṃ? Dvicattālīsaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1947: Vīsatidasesu paresu pañcassa paṇṇapannā honti vā yathākkamaṃ. Paṇṇavīsati pañcavīsati, pannarasva pañcadasa.
anya-e0801n0:1949: Catussa cuco honti vā dasasadde pare. Cuddasa, coddasa, catuddasa.
anya-e0801n0:1951: Chassa soiccayamādeso hoti dasasadde pare. Soḷasa.
anya-e0801n0:1953: Ekaaṭṭhānaṃ ā hoti dase pare. Ekādasa, aṭṭhārasa.
anya-e0801n0:1955_0: Saṅkhyāto parassa dasassa ra hoti vibhāsā. Ekārasa ekādasa, bārasa dvādasa, pannarasa
anya-e0801n0:1955_1: pañcadasa, sattarasa sattadasa, aṭṭhārasa aṭṭhādasa, pannabādesesu niccaṃ, idha na hoti catuddasa.
anya-e0801n0:1957: Chatīhi parassa dasassa ḷo hoti ro ca, soḷasa sorasa, teḷasa terasa.
anya-e0801n0:1959: Aḍḍhā paresaṃ catutthatatiyānaṃ uḍḍhatiyā honti yathākkamaṃ. Aḍḍhena catuttho aḍḍhuḍḍho, aḍḍhena tatiyo aḍḍhatiyo, kathaṃ aḍḍhateyyoti? Sakatthe ṇye uttarapadavuḍḍhi.
anya-e0801n0:1961: Aḍḍhā parassa dutiyassa saha aḍḍhasaddena diyaḍḍhadivaḍḍhā honti. Aḍḍhena dutiyo diyaḍḍho, divaḍḍho vā.
anya-e0801n0:1963: Kussuttarapadatthe vattamānassa sarādo uttarapade kadādeso hoti. Kadannaṃ, kadasanaṃ, sareti kiṃ? Kuputto, uttarattheti kiṃ? Kuoḍḍho rājā.
anya-e0801n0:1965: Appatthe vattamānassa kussa kā hoti uttarapadatthe, appakaṃ lavaṇaṃ kālavaṇaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1967: Kussa purise kā hoti vā. Kāpuriso kupuriso, ayamappattavibhāsā, appatthe tu pubbena niccaṃ hoti īsaṃ puriso kāpuriso.
anya-e0801n0:1969: Pubbādīhuttarapadassa ahassa ṇhādeso hoti, pubbaṇho, aparaṇho, ajjaṇho, sāyaṇho, majjhaṇho (paṇho).
anya-e0801n0:1974_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā nāmasmā vā ṇappaccayo hoti apacce-bhidheyye, ṇakāro vuddhyattho, evamaññattāpi,
anya-e0801n0:1974_1: vasiṭṭhassāpaccaṃ vāsiṭṭho, vāsiṭṭhī vā, opagavo, opagavī vā, veti vākyasamāsavikappanatthaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1976_0: Vacchādīhi apaccappaccayantehi gottādīhi ca saddehi ṇānaṇāyanappaccayā vā honti apacce,
anya-e0801n0:1976_1: vacchāno vacchāyano, kaccāno kaccāyano, yāgame kātiyāno, moggallāno moggallāyano,
anya-e0801n0:1978: Kattikādīhi vidhavādīhi ca ṇeyyaṇerā vā yathākkamaṃ honti apacce, kattikeyyo, venateyyo, bhāgineyyo iccādi, vedhavero, bandhakero, nālikero, sāmaṇero iccādi.
anya-e0801n0:1980: Ditippabhutihi ṇyo vā hoti apacce, decco, ādicco, koṇḍañño, gaggyo, bhātabbo iccādi.
anya-e0801n0:1982: Akārantato ṇi vā hoti apacce, dakkhi, datthi, doṇi. Vāsavi, vāruṇi iccādi.
anya-e0801n0:1984: Rājasaddato ñño vā hoti apacce jātiyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ, rājañño, jātiyanti kiṃ? Rājāpaccaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:1986: Khattasaddā yaiyā honti apacce jātiyaṃ, khatyo, khattiyo, jātiyaṃtveva? Khatti.
anya-e0801n0:1988: Manusaddato jātiyaṃ ssasaṇa honti apacce, manusso, mānuso, itthiyaṃ manussā, mānusī, jātiyaṃtveva? Mānavo.
anya-e0801n0:1990_0: Janapadassa yaṃ nāmaṃ, tannāmasmā khattiyā apacce raññe ca ṇo hoti, pañcālo, kosalo,
anya-e0801n0:1990_1: māgadho, okkāko, janapadanāmasmāti kiṃ? Dāsarathi, khattiyāti kiṃ? Pañcālassa brāhmaṇassa apaccaṃ pañcāli.
anya-e0801n0:1992: Kurusivīhi apacce raññe ca ṇyo hoti. Korabyo, sebyo.
anya-e0801n0:1994_0: Rāgavācitatiyantato rattamicchetasmiṃ atthe ṇo hoti, kasāvena rattaṃ kāsāvaṃ, kosumbhaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:1994_1: yāliddaṃ, rāgāti kiṃ? Devadattena rattaṃ vatthaṃ, idha kasmā na hoti? ‘Nīlaṃ pīta’nti,
anya-e0801n0:1996_0: Tatiyantato nakkhattā tena lakkhite kāle ṇo hoti, tañce nakkhattaminduyuttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0801n0:1996_1: phussī ratti, phussaṃ ahaṃ, nakkhatteneti kiṃ? Gurunā lakkhitā ratti. Induyutteneti
anya-e0801n0:1996_2: kiṃ? Katthikāya lakkhito muhutto, kāleti kiṃ? Phussena lakkhitā atthasiddhi, ajjakattikāti
anya-e0801n0:1998_0: Seti paṭhamantā assāti chaṭṭhyatthe ṇo bhavati, yaṃ paṭhamantaṃ, sā ce devatā puṇṇamāsīvā,
anya-e0801n0:1998_1: sugato devatā assābhi sogato, māhindo, yāmo, vāruṇo, phussī puṇṇamāsī assa sambandhinīti
anya-e0801n0:1998_2: phusso, māso, māyo, phagguno, citto, vesākho. Jeṭṭhamūlo, āsaḷho, sāvaṇo, poṭṭhapādo,
anya-e0801n0:1998_3: assayujo, kattiko, māgasiro, puṇṇamāsīti kiṃ? Phussī pañcamī assa, puṇṇamāsī ca bhatakamāsasambandhinī
anya-e0801n0:1998_4: na hoti… puṇṇo mā assanti nibbacanā, ato eva nipātanā ṇo sāgamo ca, māsasutiyāva
anya-e0801n0:2000_0: Dutiyantato tamadhīte taṃ jānātīti etesvatthesu ṇo hoti ṇo ṇiko ca, byākaraṇamadhīte
anya-e0801n0:2000_1: jānāti vā veyyākaraṇo, chandaso, kamako, padako, venayiko, suttantiko, dvitaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2000_2: puthageva vidhānatthaṃ jānanassa ca ajjhenavisayabhāvadassanatthaṃ pasiddhūpasaṅgahatthaṃ ca.
anya-e0801n0:2002: Chaṭṭhiyantā visaye desarūpe ṇo hoti, vasātīnaṃ visayo deso vāsāto, deseti kiṃ? Cakkhussa visayo rūpaṃ, devadattassa visayo-nuvāko.
anya-e0801n0:2004: Chaṭṭhiyantā nivāse dese tannāme ṇo hoti, sivīnaṃ nivāso deso sebyo, vāsāto.
anya-e0801n0:2006: Chaṭṭhiyantā adūrabhave dese tannāme ṇo hoti, vidisāya adūrabhavaṃ vedisaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2008: Tatiyantā nibbatte dese tannāme ṇo hoti, kusambena nibbattā kosambhī nagarī, kākandī, mākandī, sahassena nibbattā sāhassī parīkhā, hotumhi kattari karaṇe ca yathāyogaṃ tatiyā.
anya-e0801n0:2010: Tanti paṭhamantā idhāti sattamyatthe dese tannāme ṇo hoti, yantaṃ paṭhamantamatthi ce, udumbarā asmiṃ dese santīti odumbaro, bādaro, babbajo.
anya-e0801n0:2012: Sattamyantā bhavatthe ṇo hoti, udake bhavo odako, oraso, jānapado, māgadho, kāpilavatthavo, kosambo.
anya-e0801n0:2014: Bhavatthe ajjādīhi tano hoti, ajja bhavo ajjatano, svātano, hiyyattano.
anya-e0801n0:2016: Purāiccasmā bhavatthe ṇo hoti tano ca, purāṇo, purātano.
anya-e0801n0:2020: Majjhādīhi sattamyantehi bhavatte imo hoti, majjhimo, antimo. Majjha, anta, heṭṭhā, upari, ora, pāra, pacchā, abbhantara, paccanta (puratthā, bāhira).
anya-e0801n0:2022_0: Sattamyantā ete paccayā honti bhavatthe, kaṇa-kusinā rāyaṃ bhavo kosinārako, māgadhako,
anya-e0801n0:2022_1: āraññako vihāro. Ṇeyya-gaṅgeyyo, pabbateyyo, vāneyyo. Ṇeyyaka-koleyyako, bārāṇaseyyako,
anya-e0801n0:2022_2: campeyyako, mithileyyakoti eyyako. Ya-gammo, dibbo. Iyagāmiyo, udari-yo, diviyo,
anya-e0801n0:2024: Sattamyantā bhavatthe ṇiko hoti, sāradiko divaso, sāradikā ratti.
anya-e0801n0:2025: 27. Tamassa sippaṃ sīlaṃ paṇyaṃ paharaṇaṃ payojanaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2026_0: Paṭhamantā sippādivācakā assetichaṭṭhiyattheṇiko hoti, vīṇāvādanaṃ sippamassa veṇiko,
anya-e0801n0:2026_1: modaṅgiko, vaṃsiko, paṃsukū- ladhāraṇaṃ sīlamassa paṃsukūliko, tecīvarikeva, gandhopaṇyamassa
anya-e0801n0:2026_2: gandhiko, teliko, goḷiko, cāpo paharaṇamassa cāpiko, tomariko, muggariko, upadhippayojanamassa
anya-e0801n0:2028_0: Dutiyantā hantīti evamādīsvatthesu ṇīko hoti. Pakkhīhipakkhino hantīti pakkhiko,
anya-e0801n0:2028_1: sākuniko, māyūriko. Macchehi-macchiko, meniko. Migehi-māgaviko hāriṇiko, ‘sūkariko’ti
anya-e0801n0:2028_2: iko. Satamarahatīti sātikaṃ, sandiṭṭhiko, ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko, sāhassiko,
anya-e0801n0:2028_3: ‘sahassiyo’ti iyo. Paradāraṃ gacchatīti pāradāriko, maggiko, paññāsayojaniko. Badare
anya-e0801n0:2028_4: uñchatīti bādariko, sāmākiko. Dhammaṃ caratīti dhammiko, adhammiko.
anya-e0801n0:2029: 29. Tena kataṃ kītaṃ baddhamabhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ hataṃ hanti jitaṃ jayati dibbati khaṇati tarati carati vahati jīvati.
anya-e0801n0:2030_0: Tatiyantā katādisvatthesu ṇiko hoti. Kāyena kataṃ kāyikaṃ, vācasikaṃ, mānasikaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2030_1: vātena kato ābādho vātiko. Satena kītaṃ sātikaṃ, sāhassikaṃ, mūlatova, devadatena
anya-e0801n0:2030_2: kītanti na hoti tadatthāppatītiyā. Varattāya baddho vārattiko, āyasiko, pāsiko. Ghatena
anya-e0801n0:2030_3: abhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ vā ghātikaṃ, goḷikaṃ, dādhikaṃ, māricikaṃ. Jālena hato hantīti
anya-e0801n0:2030_4: vā jāliko, bālīsiko. Akkhehi jitamakkhikaṃ, sālākikaṃ. Akkhehi jayati dibbatīti vā
anya-e0801n0:2030_5: akkhiko. Khaṇittiyā khaṇatīti khāṇittiko, kuddāliko, devadattena jitaṃ, aṅgulyā khaṇatīti
anya-e0801n0:2030_6: na hoti tadatthānavagamā. Uḷumpena taratīti oḷumpiko, ‘uḷumpiko’ti iko gopucchiko,
anya-e0801n0:2030_7: nāviko. Sakaṭena caratīti sākaṭiko, ‘rathiko, parappiko’ti iko. Khandhena vahatīti
anya-e0801n0:2030_8: khandhiko, aṃsiko, ‘sīsiko’ti iko. Vetanena jīvatīti vetaniko, ‘bhatiko, kayiko,
anya-e0801n0:2032_0: Catutthiyantā saṃvattatīti asmiṃ atthe ṇiko hoti, punabbhavāya saṃvattatīti ponobhaviko,
anya-e0801n0:2032_1: itthiyaṃ pono bhavikā, lokāya saṃvattatīti lokiko suṭṭhu aggoti saggo, saggāya saṃvattatīti
anya-e0801n0:2032_2: sovaggiko, sassovaka tadaminādipāṭhā, dhanāya saṃvattatīti dhaññaṃ, yo.
anya-e0801n0:2034_0: Pañcamyantā sambhūtamāgatanti etesvatthesu ṇiko hoti, mātiko sambhūtamāgataṃ vā mattikaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2034_1: pettikaṃ, ṇyariyaṇa -yāpi dissanti, surabhito sambhūtaṃ sorabhyaṃ, thanato sambhūtaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2034_2: thaññaṃ, pitito sambhūto pettiyo, mātiyo, mattiyo, macco vā.
anya-e0801n0:2036_0: Sattamyantā tattha vasatītvevamādīsvatthesu ṇiko hoti. Rukkhamūle vasatīti rukkhamūliko,
anya-e0801n0:2036_1: āraññiko, sosāniko. Loke vidito lokiko. Catumahārājesu bhattā cātummahārājikā. Dvāre
anya-e0801n0:2036_2: niyutto dovāriko dassoka tadaminādipāṭhā, bhaṇḍāgāriko, iko-navakammiko, kiyojātikiyo, andhakiyo.
anya-e0801n0:2038_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā idamiccasmiṃ atthe ṇiko hoti, saṅghassa idaṃ saṅghikaṃ, puggalikaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2038_1: sakyaputtiko, nātiputtiko, jenadattiko, kiye-sakiyo, parakiyo, niye-attaniyaṃ, ke-
anya-e0801n0:2040: Chaṭṭhiyantā idamiccasmiṃ atthe ṇo hoti, kaccāyanassa idaṃ kaccāyanaṃ byākaraṇaṃ, sogataṃ sāsanaṃ, māhisaṃ maṃsādi.
anya-e0801n0:2042: Gavādīhi chaṭṭhiyantehi idamiccasmiṃ atthe yo hoti, gunnaṃ idaṃ gabyaṃ maṃsādi, kabyaṃ, dabbaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2044: Pitusaddā tassa bhātari reyyaṇa hoti, pitu bhātā petteyyo.
anya-e0801n0:2046: Mātito pitito ca tesaṃ bhaginiyaṃ cho hoti, mātu bhaginī mātucchā, pitu bhaginī pitucchā, kathaṃ ‘mātulo’ti “mātulāditvānī”ti nipātanā.
anya-e0801n0:2048: Mātāpitūhi tesaṃ mātāpitūsu āmaho hoti, mātu mātā mātāmahī, mātu pitā mātāmaho, pitu mātā pitāmahī, pitu pitā pitāmaho, na yathāsaṅkhyaṃ, paccekābhi sambandhā.
anya-e0801n0:2050: Mātāpitūhi hite reyyaṇa hoti, matteyyo, petteyyo.
anya-e0801n0:2052_0: Nindādīsvattheyu nāmasmā ko hoti, nindāyaṃ-muṇḍako, samaṇako. Aññāte-kassāyaṃ assoti
anya-e0801n0:2052_2: Paṭibhāgatthe-hatthī viya hatthiko, assako, balībaddako. Rasse-mānusako, rukkhako,
anya-e0801n0:2052_3: pilakkhako. Dayāyaṃ-puttako, vacchako. Saññāyaṃ-moro viya morako.
anya-e0801n0:2054_0: Paṭhamantā asseti asmiṃ atthe ṇiko hoti ko ca tañce paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0801n0:2054_1: parimīyate neneti parimāṇaṃ, doṇo parimāṇamassa doṇiko vīhi, khārasatiko, khārasahassiko
anya-e0801n0:2054_2: āsītiko vayo, upaḍḍhakāyikaṃ bimbohanaṃ, pañcakaṃ, chakkaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2056: Yādīhi paṭhamantehī asseti chaṭṭhiyatthe ttako hoti, tañce paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇaṃ bhavati, yaṃ parimāṇamassa yattakaṃ, tattakaṃ, ettakaṃ, āvatake yāvatako, tāvatako (etāvatako).
anya-e0801n0:2058: Sabbato paṭhamantehi yādīhi ca asseti chaṭṭhiyatthe āvantu hoti, tañce paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇaṃ bhavati. Sabbaṃ parimāṇamassa sabbāvantaṃ, yāvantaṃ, tāvantaṃ, etāvantaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2060_0: Kimhā paṭhamantā asseti chaṭṭhiyatthe ratirīvarīvatakarittakā honti, tañce paṭhamantaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2060_1: parimāṇaṃ bhavati, kiṃ saṅkhyānaṃ parimāṇamesaṃ kati ete, kīva, kīvatakaṃ, kittakaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2062: Tārakādīhi paṭhamantehi asseti chaṭṭhiyatthe ito hoti, te ce sañjātā honti, tārakā sañjātā assa tārakitaṃ gaganaṃ, pupphito rukkho, pallavitā latā.
anya-e0801n0:2064_0: Paṭhamantā mānavuttito asseti asmiṃatthe matto hoti, palaṃ ummānamassa palamattaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2064_1: hattho pamāṇamassa hatthamattaṃ sataṃ mānamassa satamattaṃ, doṇo parimāṇamassa doṇamattaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2066: Uddhamānavuttiho asseti chaṭṭhiyatthe taggho hoti matto ca, jaṇṇutagghaṃ, jaṇṇumattaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2068: Purisā paṭhamantā uddhamānavuttito ṇo hoti mattādayo ca, porisaṃ, purisamattaṃ, purisatagghaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2070: Ubhadvitīhi avayavavuttīti paṭhamantehi asseti chaṭṭhiyatthe ayo hoti. Ubho aṃsā assa ubhayaṃ, dvayaṃ, tayaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2072_0: Satyantāya utyantāya īsantāya āsantāya dasantāya ca saṅkhyāya paṭhamantāya asminti
anya-e0801n0:2072_1: sattamyatthe ḍo hoti, sā ce saṅkhyā adhikā hoti, yadasminti tañce sataṃ sahassaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2072_2: satasahassaṃ vā hoti, vīsati adhikā asmiṃ sateti vīsaṃ sataṃ, ekavīsaṃ sataṃ, sahassaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2072_3: satasahassaṃ vā, tiṃsaṃ sataṃ, ekatiṃsaṃ sataṃ. Utyantāya-navutaṃ sataṃ sahassaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2072_4: satasahassaṃ vā. Īsantāya cattālīsaṃ sataṃ, sahassaṃ, satasahassaṃ vā. Āsantāya paññāsaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2072_5: sataṃ, sahassaṃ, satasahassaṃ vā. Dasantāyaekādasaṃ sataṃ, sahassaṃ, satasahassaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2072_6: vā. Saccutīsāsadasantāyāti kiṃ? Chādhikā asmiṃsate. Adhiketi kiṃ? Pañcadasahīnā asmiṃsate,
anya-e0801n0:2072_7: asminti kiṃ? Vīsatyadhikā etasmā satā, satasahasseti kiṃ? Ekādasa adhikā assaṃ vīsatiyaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2074_0: Chaṭṭhiyanthāyekādasādikāya saṅkhyāya ḍo hoti (tassa) pūraṇatthe vibhāsā, sā saṅkhyā
anya-e0801n0:2074_1: pūrīyate yena taṃ pūraṇaṃ, ekādasannaṃ pūraṇo ekādaso. Ekādasamo, vīso, vīsatimo,
anya-e0801n0:2076: Chaṭṭhiyantāya pañcādikāya saṅkhyāya katismā ca mo hoti (tassa) pūraṇatthe, pañcamo, sattamo, aṭṭhamo, katimo, katimī.
anya-e0801n0:2077: 53. Satādīnamica. Satādikāya saṅkhyāya chaṭṭhiyantāya (tassa) pūraṇatthe mohoti satādīnamicāntādeso, satimo, sahassimo.
anya-e0801n0:2079: Chasaddā ṭṭhaṭṭhamā honti tassa pūraṇatthe, chaṭṭho, chaṭṭhamo, itthiyaṃ chaṭṭhī, chaṭṭhamī, kathaṃ ‘dutiyaṃ catuttha’nti? “Dutiyassa, catuttha tatiyāna”nti nipātanā.
anya-e0801n0:2081: Ekasmā asahāyatthe kaākī honti vā, ekako, ekākī, eko.
anya-e0801n0:2083_0: Vacchādīnaṃ sabhāvassa tanutte gamyamāne taro hoti, susuttassa tanutte vacchataro,
anya-e0801n0:2083_1: itthiyaṃ vacchatarī, yobbanassa tanutte okkhataro, assabhāvassa tanutte assataro,
anya-e0801n0:2084_0: 57. Kimhā niddhāraṇe ratara ratamā. Kiṃsaddā niddhāraṇe ratara ratamā honti, kataro
anya-e0801n0:2084_1: bhavataṃ devadatto, kataro bhavataṃ kaṭho, katamo bhavataṃ devadatto, katamo bhavataṃ
anya-e0801n0:2086: Tatiyantā datte-bhidheyye laiyā honti, devena datto devalo, deviyo, brahmalo, brahmiyo, sivā sīvalo, sīviyo, sissa dīgho.
anya-e0801n0:2088_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā bhāve kamme ca ttādayo honti bahulaṃ, na ca sabbe sabbato honti aññatra
anya-e0801n0:2088_1: ttatāhi, bhavanti etasmā buddhisaddābhi bhāvo saddassa pavattinimittaṃ, nīlassa paṭassa
anya-e0801n0:2088_2: bhāvo nīlattaṃ nīlatābhi guṇo bhāvo, nīlassa guṇassa bhāvo nīlattaṃ nīlatābhi nīlaguṇajāti,
anya-e0801n0:2088_3: gottaṃ gotāti gojāti, pācakattaṃ, daṇḍittaṃ, visāṇittaṃ, rājapurisattanti kriyādisambandhittaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2088_4: devadattattaṃ, candattaṃ, sūriyattanti tadavatthāvisesasāmaññaṃ, ākāsattaṃ, abhāvattanti
anya-e0801n0:2088_6: Ṇya-ālasyaṃ, brahmaññaṃ, cāpalyaṃ, nepuññaṃ, pesuññaṃ, rajjaṃ, ādhipaccaṃ, dāyajjaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2088_7: vesammaṃ ‘vesama’nti, keci, sakhyaṃ, vāṇijjaṃ. Ṇeyya-soceyyaṃ, ādhipateyyaṃ. Ṇagāravaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2088_8: pāṭavaṃ, ajjavaṃ, maddavaṃ. Iya-adhipatiyaṃ, paṇḍitiyaṃ, bahussutiyaṃ, naggiyaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2088_9: sūriyaṃ. Ṇiya-ālasiyaṃ, kāḷusiyaṃ, mandiyaṃdakkhiyaṃ, porohitiyaṃ, veyyattiyaṃ. Kathaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2088_10: ‘rāmaṇīyaka’nti? Sakatthe kantā ṇena siddhaṃ. Kammaṃ kiriyā, tattha alasassa kammaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2088_11: alasattaṃ’ alasatā, alasattanaṃ, ālasyaṃ, ālasiyaṃ vā, “sakatthe’ (4.122) ti sakatthepi,
anya-e0801n0:2090: Chaṭṭhiyantā vaddhā dāsā ca byo vā hoti bhāvakammesu, vaddhabyaṃ vaddhatā, dāsabyaṃ dāsatā, kathaṃ ‘vaddhava’nti? Ṇe vāgamo.
anya-e0801n0:2092: Chaṭṭhiyantā yuvasaddā bhāvakammesu naṇa vā hoti tassa bo ca, yobbanaṃ, vātveva? Yuvattaṃ, yuvatā.
anya-e0801n0:2094: Aṇuādīhi chaṭṭhiyantehi bhāve vā imo hoti, aṇimā, laghimā, mahimā, (garimā), kasimā, vātveva? Aṇuttaṃ aṇutā.
anya-e0801n0:2096: Bhāvavācakā saddā tena nibbatte-bhidheyye imo hoti, pākena nibbatta pāṇimaṃ, sekimaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2098_0: Atisaye vattamānato hontete paccayā, atisayena pāpo pāpataro, pāpatamo, pāpissiko,
anya-e0801n0:2098_1: pāpiyo, pāpiṭṭho, itthiyaṃ pāpatarā. Atisayantāpi atisayappaccayo, atisayena pāpiṭṭho pāpiṭṭhataro.
anya-e0801n0:2100: Dutiyantā llappaccayo hoti nissitatthe, vedaṃ nissitaṃ vedallaṃ, duṭṭhu nissitaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ. Ille-saṅkhārillaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2102_0: Pakatiyā uttaramavatthantaraṃ vikāro, chaṭṭhiyantā nāmasmā vikāre-vayave ca ṇādayo
anya-e0801n0:2102_1: honti bahulaṃ, ṇa-āyasaṃ bandhanaṃ, odumbaraṃ, paṇṇaṃ, odumbaraṃ bhasmaṃ, kāpotaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2102_2: maṃsaṃ, kāpotaṃ satthi. Ṇika-kappāsikaṃ vatthaṃ. Ṇeyya-eṇeyyaṃ maṃsaṃ, eṇeyyaṃ satthi.
anya-e0801n0:2102_3: Koseyyaṃ vatthaṃ. Maya-tiṇamayaṃ, dārumayaṃ, naḷamayaṃ, mattikāmayaṃ. “Aññasmi”nti
anya-e0801n0:2104_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā nāmasmā jatuto vikārāvayavesu saṇa vā hoti. Jatuno vikāro jātusaṃ jatumayaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2104_2: phalāni piyālāni, mallikāya pupphāni mallikā, usirassa mūlaṃ usīraṃ, taṃ saddena vā tadabhidhānaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2106_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā samūhe kaṇa ṇa ṇikā honti gottappaccayantā. Kaṇa-rājaññakaṃ, mānussakaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2106_1: ukkhādīhi-okkhakaṃ, oṭṭhakaṃ, orabbhakaṃ, rājakaṃ, rājaputtakaṃ, hatthikaṃ, dhenukaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2108_0: Janādīhi chaṭṭhiyantehi samūhe tā hoti. Janatā, gajatā, bandhutā, gāmatā, sahāyatā,
anya-e0801n0:2108_1: nāgaratā. Tāntā sabhāvato itthiliṅgā, ‘madanīya’nti karaṇe-dhikaraṇe vā anīyena siddhaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2110: Chaṭṭhiyantā hite iyo hoti. Upādāniyaṃ, aññatrāpi samānodare sayito sodariyo.
anya-e0801n0:2112: Chaṭṭhiyantehi cakkhuādīhi hite sso hoti, cakkhussaṃ, āyussaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2114: Sattamyantā tattha sādhūti asmiṃ atthe ṇyo hoti. Sabbho, pārisajjo. Sādhūti kusalo yoggo hito vā. Aññatrāpi rathaṃ vahatīti racchā.
anya-e0801n0:2116: Sattamyantā kammasaddā tattha sādhūbhi asmiṃ atthe niya ññā honti. Kamme sādhu kammaniyaṃ, kammaññaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2118: Kathādīhi sattamyantehi tattha sādhūti asmiṃ atthe iko hoti. Kathiko, dhammakathiko, saṅgāmiko pavāsiko, upavāsiko.
anya-e0801n0:2120: Pathādīhi sattamyantehi tattha sādhūti asmiṃ atthe ṇe-yyo hoti, pātheyyaṃ sāpateyyaṃ (ātitheyyaṃ).
anya-e0801n0:2122: Dakkhiṇāsaddato arahatthe ṇeyyo hoti, dakkhiṇaṃ arahatīti dakkhiṇeyyo.
anya-e0801n0:2124: Tumantato arahatthe rāyo hoti. Ghātetāyaṃ vā ghātetuṃ, jāpetāyaṃ vā jāpetuṃ, pabbājetāyaṃ vā pabbājetuṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2126_0: Paṭhamantā ettha assa atthīti etesvatthesu mantu hoti. Gāvo ettha dese, assa vā purisassa
anya-e0801n0:2126_1: santīti gomā. Atthīti vattamānakālopādānato bhūtāhi bhavissantīhi vā gohi na gomā.
anya-e0801n0:2126_2: Kathaṃ ‘gomā āsi, gomā bhavissatī’ti? Tadāpi vattamānāhiyeva gohi gomā, āsi bhavissatīti
anya-e0801n0:2129_0: Go assoti jātisaddānaṃ dabbābhidhānasāmatthiyā mantvādayo na honti, tathā guṇasaddānaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2129_1: ‘seto paṭo’ti, yesantu guṇasaddānaṃ dabbābhidhānasāmatthiyaṃ natthi, tehi honteva
anya-e0801n0:2129_2: ‘buddhimā, rūpavā, rasavā, gandhavā, phassavā, saddavā, rasī, rasiko, rūpī, rūpiko,
anya-e0801n0:2131: Paṭhamantato avaṇṇantā mantvātthe vantu hoti. Sīlavā, paññavā, avaṇṇāti kiṃ? Satimā bandhumā.
anya-e0801n0:2133_0: Daṇḍādīhi ika ī honti vā mantvātthe. Bahulaṃ vidhānā kutoci dve honti, kutocekamekaṃva
anya-e0801n0:2133_1: daṇḍiko daṇḍī daṇḍavā, gandhiko gandhī gandhavā, rūpiko rūpī rūpavā. (28) “Uttamīṇeva
anya-e0801n0:2133_2: dhanā iko”, dhaniko, dhanī dhanavā añño. (29) “Asannihite atthā”, atthiko atthī,
anya-e0801n0:2133_3: aññatra atthavā. (30) “Tadantā ca”, puññatthiko, puññatthī, (31) “vaṇṇantā īyeva”
anya-e0801n0:2133_4: brahmavaṇṇī, devavaṇṇī, (32) “hatthadantehi jātiyaṃ”, hatthī, dantī, aññatra hatthavā
anya-e0801n0:2133_5: dantavā. (33) “Vaṇṇato brahmacārimhi”, vaṇṇī brahmacārī, vaṇṇavā añño. (34) “Pokkharādito
anya-e0801n0:2133_6: dese”, pokkharaṇī, uppalinī, kumudinī, bhisinī, muḷālinī, sālukinī, kvacādesepi padumipi
anya-e0801n0:2133_7: paduminī paṇṇaṃ. Aññatra pokkharavā hatthī, (35) “nāvāyiko”, nāviko. (36) “Sukhadukkhā
anya-e0801n0:2133_8: ī”, sukhī, dukkhī. (37) “Sikhādīhi vā”, sikhī, sikhāvā, mālī, mālāvā, sīlī, sīlavā,
anya-e0801n0:2133_9: balī, balavā. (38) “Balā bāhūrupubbā ca”, bāhubalī, ūrubalī.
anya-e0801n0:2134: 81. Tapādīhi ssī. Tapādito mantvatthe vā ssī hoti. Tapassī, yasassī, tejassī, manassī, payassī. Vātveva? Yasavā.
anya-e0801n0:2135: 82. Mukhādito ro. Mukhādīhi mantvatthero hoti. Mukharo, susiro, ūsaro, madhuro, kharo, kuñjaro, nagaraṃ, (39) “dantassu ca unnabhadante”, danturo.
anya-e0801n0:2137: Tundiādīhi mantvatthe bho vā hoti. Tundibho, vaṭibho, valibho. Vātveva? Tundimā.
anya-e0801n0:2139: Saddhādīhi mantvatthea hoti vā. Saddho, pañño, itthiyaṃ saddhā. Vātveva? Paññavā.
anya-e0801n0:2141: Tapā ṇo hoti mantvatthe. Tāpaso, itthiyaṃ tāpasī.
anya-e0801n0:2143: Abhijjhādīhi ālu hoti mantvatthe, abhijjhālu, sītālu, dhajālu, dayālu. Vātveva? Dayāvā.
anya-e0801n0:2145: Picchādīhi ilo hoti vā mantvatthe. Picchilo picchavā, phenilo phenavā, jaṭilo jaṭāvā. Kathaṃ ‘vācālo’ti? Nindāyamilassādilope “paro kvacī”ti (1-27).
anya-e0801n0:2147: Sīlādīhi vo hoti vā mantvatthe. Sīlavo sīlavā, kesavo kesavā, (40) “aṇṇā niccaṃ” aṇṇavo. (41) Gāṇḍī rājīhi saññāyaṃ” gāṇḍīvaṃ dhanu, rājīvaṃ paṅkajaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2149: Etehi dvīhi vī hoti mantvatthe. Māyāvī, medhāvī.
anya-e0801n0:2150: 90. Sissare āmyuvāmī. Sasaddā āmyuvāmī honti issare-bhidhāyye mantvatthe. Samassatthīti sāmī, suvāmī.
anya-e0801n0:2151: 91. Lakkhyā ṇo a ca. Lakkhīsaddā ṇo hoti mantvatthe a cāntassa. Ṇakārovayavo, lakkhaṇo.
anya-e0801n0:2153: Kalyāṇe gamyamāne aṅgasmā no hoti mantvatthe. Aṅganā.
anya-e0801n0:2155: Lomā so hoti mantvatthe. Lomaso, itthiyaṃ, lomasā.
anya-e0801n0:2157: Mantvatthe ima iyā honti bahulaṃ. Puttimo, kittimo, puttiyo, kappiyo, jaṭiyo, hānabhāgiyo, seniyo.
anya-e0801n0:2158: 95. To pañcamyā. Pañcamyantā bahulaṃ to hoti vā. Gāmato āgacchati gāmasmā āgacchati, corato bhāyati corehi bhāyati, satthato parihīno satthā parihīno.
anya-e0801n0:2160: Tomhi imassa ṭi nipaccate, etassa ṭa eta, kiṃsaddassa kuttañca. Ito imasmā, ato etto etasmā, kuto kasmā.
anya-e0801n0:2161: 97. Abhyādīhi. Abhiādīhi to hoti. Abhito, parito, pacchato heṭṭhato.
anya-e0801n0:2162: 98. Ādyādīhi. Ādippabhutīhi to vā hoti, ādo ādito, majjhato antato, piṭṭhito, passato, mukhato, yatodakaṃ tadādittaṃ, yaṃ udakaṃ tadevādittanti attho.
anya-e0801n0:2163: 99. Sabbādito sattamyā trattā. Sabbādīhi sattamyantehi tratthā vā honti. Sabbatra sabba. Sabbasmiṃ, yatra yattha yasmiṃ. Bahulādhikārā na tumhāmhehi.
anya-e0801n0:2165: Etesaddā nipaccante. Kasmiṃ kattha, kutra, kva, etasmiṃ, ettha, atra, asmiṃ iha, idha.
anya-e0801n0:2166: 101. Dhi sabbā vā. Sattamyantato sabbasmā dhi vā hoti. Sabbadhi, sabbattha.
anya-e0801n0:2167: 102. Yā hiṃ. Sattamyantato yato hiṃ vā hoti. Yahiṃ yatra.
anya-e0801n0:2169: Sattamyantato tato vā haṃ hoti hiṃ ca. Tahaṃ, tahiṃ, tatra.
anya-e0801n0:2171: Kiṃsaddā sattamyantā hiṃ haṃ nipaccante kissa kukā ca. Kuhiṃ, kahaṃ. Kathaṃ ‘kuhiñcana’nti? ‘Canaṃ’ iti nipātantaraṃ ‘kuhiñcī’ti ettha cisaddo viya.
anya-e0801n0:2172: 105. Sabbekaññayatehi kāle dā. Etehi sattamyantehi kāle dā hoti. Sabbasmiṃ kāle sabbadā, ekadā, aññadā, yadā, tadā. Kāleti kiṃ? Sabbattha dese.
anya-e0801n0:2174: Ete saddā nipaccante. Kasmiṃ kāle kadā, kudā, sabbasmiṃ kāle sadā, imasmiṃ kāle adhunā, idāni.
anya-e0801n0:2176_0: Etesaddā nipaccante. Pakatippaccayo ādeso kālavisesoti sabbametaṃ nipātanā labbhati,
anya-e0801n0:2176_1: imassa ṭo jjo jāhani nipaccate, asmiṃ ahani ajja. Samānassa sabhāvo jju cāhani, samāne
anya-e0801n0:2176_2: ahani sajju. Aparasmā jju, aparasmiṃ ahani aparajju. Imasseto kāle rahi ca, imasmiṃ
anya-e0801n0:2176_3: kāle etarahi. Kiṃsaddassa ko raha cānajjatane, kasmiṃ kāle karaha.
anya-e0801n0:2178: Sāmaññassa bhedako viseso pakāro, tattha vattamānehi sabbādīhi thā hoti. Sabbena pakārena sabbathā, yathā, tathā.
anya-e0801n0:2180: Ete saddā nipaccante pakāre. Kimimehi thaṃ paccayo, kaita ca tesaṃ yathākkamaṃ, kathaṃ, itthaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2182_0: Saṅkhyāvācīhi pakāre dhā parā hoti. Dvīhi pakārehi, dve vā pakāre karoti dvidhā karoti,
anya-e0801n0:2182_1: bahudhā karoti, ekaṃ rāsiṃ pañcappakāraṃ karoti pañcadhā karoti, pañcappakāramekappakāraṃ
anya-e0801n0:2184: Ekasmā pakare jjhaṃ vā hoti. Ekajjhaṃ karoti, ekadhā, karoti.
anya-e0801n0:2186: Dvitīhi pakāre edhā vā hoti. Dvedhā, tedhā, dvidhā, tidhā.
anya-e0801n0:2188: Pakāravati taṃsāmaññavācakā saddā jātiyo hoti, paṭujātiyo, mudujātiyo.
anya-e0801n0:2190: Vārasambandhiniyā saṅkhyāya kkhattuṃ hoti. Dve vāre bhuñjati dvikkhattuṃ divasassa bhuñjati. Vāraggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? Pañca bhuñjati. Saṅkhyāyāti kiṃ? Pahūte vāre bhuñjati.
anya-e0801n0:2192: Vārasambandhiniyā katisaṅkhyāya kkhattuṃ hoti, kati vāre, bhuñjathi, katikkhattuṃ bhuñjati.
anya-e0801n0:2194: Vārasambandhiniyā bahusaṅkhyāya dhā hoti kkhatthuṃ ca, vārānañce paccāsatti hoti, bahudhā divasassa bhuñjati bahukkhattuṃ bhuñjati. Paccāsattiyanti kiṃ? Bahuvāre māsassa bhuñjati.
anya-e0801n0:2196: Ekaṃ vāramiccasmiṃ atthe sakinti vā nipaccate. Ekavāraṃ bhuñjati sakiṃ bhuñjati, vāti kiṃ? Ekakkhattuṃ bhuñjati.
anya-e0801n0:2198: Vīcchāyaṃ pakāre ca so hoti bahulaṃ. Vīcchāyaṃ-khaṇḍaso, bilaso. Pakāre-puthuso, sabbaso.
anya-e0801n0:2200_0: Avatthāvato-vatthantarenābhūtassa tāyāvatthāya bhāvekarāsabhūhi sambandhe sati vikāravācakā
anya-e0801n0:2200_1: cī hoti, adhavalaṃ dhavalaṃ karoti dhavalī karoti, adhavalo dhavalo siyā dhavalī
anya-e0801n0:2200_2: siyā, adhavalo dhavalo bhavati dhavalī bhavati. Abhūta tabbhāveti kiṃ? Ghaṭaṃ karoti,
anya-e0801n0:2200_3: dadhi atthi, ghaṭo bhavati. Karāsabhūyogeti kiṃ? Adhavalodhavalo jāyate. Vikārāti
anya-e0801n0:2200_4: kiṃ? Pakatiyā māhotu, suvaṇṇaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ karoti.
anya-e0801n0:2202_0: Vuttato-ññepi paccayā dissanti vuttāvuttatthesu. Vividhā mātaro vimātaro, tāsaṃ puttā
anya-e0801n0:2202_1: vemātikā-rikaṇa. Pathaṃ gacchatīti pathāvino-āvī. Issā assa atthīti issukī-ukī. Dhuraṃ
anya-e0801n0:2204: Vuttato-ññasmimpi atthe vuttappaccayā dissanti. Magadhānaṃ issaro māgadho-dhaṇā. Kāsīti sahassaṃ, tamagghatīti kāsiyo iyo.
anya-e0801n0:2206: Sakatthepi paccayā dissanti. Hīnako, potako, kiccayaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2208: Paccayānaṃ lopopi dissati. Buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ, cakkhuṃ suññaṃ attena vā attariyena vāti bhāvappaccayalopo.
anya-e0801n0:2210: Sarānamādibhūtā ye akārivaṇṇuvaṇṇā, tesaṃ āeo honti yathākkamaṃṇānubandhe. Rāghavo, venateyyo, meniko, oḷumpiko, dobhaggaṃ. Ṇānubandheti kiṃ? Purātano.
anya-e0801n0:2212: Sarānamādibhūtā ye ayuvaṇṇā, tesaṃ āeo honti kvacideva saṃyogavisaye ṇānubandhe. Decco, koṇḍañño. Kvacīti kiṃ? Kattikeyyo.
anya-e0801n0:2214: Majjhe vattamānānampi ayuvaṇṇānaṃ ā e o honti kvaci. Aḍḍhateyyo, vāseṭṭho.
anya-e0801n0:2216_0: Etesaddā nipaccanteṇānubandhe. Kusī tassa bhāvokosajjaṃ, ujuno bhāvo ajjavaṃ, parisāsu
anya-e0801n0:2216_1: sādhu pārisajjo, suhadayova suhajjo, tassa pana bhāvo sohajjaṃ, muduno bhāvo maddavaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2216_2: isino idaṃ bhāvo vā ārissaṃ, usabhassa idaṃ bhāvo vā āsabhaṃ, ājānīyassa bhāvo so
anya-e0801n0:2216_3: eva vā ājaññaṃ, thenassa bhāvo kammaṃ vā theyyaṃ, bahussatassa bhāvo bāhusaccaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2218: Manādīnaṃ saka hoti ṇānubandhe. Manasi bhavaṃ mānasaṃ, dummanaso bhāvo domanassaṃ, somanassaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2220: Sarādo ṇānubandhe uvaṇṇassāvaṅa hoti. Rāghavo, jambavaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2222: Yakārādo paccaye gossuvaṇṇassa ca avaṅa hoti. Gabyaṃ, bhātabyo.
anya-e0801n0:2224: Yakārādo paccaye avaṇṇivaṇṇānaṃ lopo hoti. Dāyajjaṃ, kāruññaṃ, ādhipaccaṃ, deppaṃ. Bahulaṃvidhānā kvaci na hoti kiccayaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2226: Anto saro ādimhi yassāvayavassa, tassa lopo hoti rānubandhe. Kittakaṃ, petteyyaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2228: Kisassa mahato ime kasamahā honti yathākkamaṃ, kasimā, mahimā.
anya-e0801n0:2232: Vuddhassa jo hoti iyaiṭṭhesu, jeyyo, jeṭṭho.
anya-e0801n0:2234: Iyaiṭṭhesu bāḷhantikapasatthānaṃ sādha neda sā honti yathākkamaṃ. Sādhiyo, sādhiṭṭho, nediyo, nediṭṭho, seyyo, seṭṭho.
anya-e0801n0:2236: Iyaiṭṭhesu appayuvānaṃ kaṇa kanā honti yathākkamaṃ. Kaṇiyo kaṇiṭṭho, kaniyo kaniṭṭho.
anya-e0801n0:2238: Vī mantu vantūnaṃ lopo hoti iyaiṭṭhesu. Atisayena medhāvī medhiyo, medhiṭṭho, atisayena satimā satiyo, satiṭṭho, atisayena guṇavā guṇiyo, guṇiṭṭho.
anya-e0801n0:2240: Ḍepare satyantassa tikārassa lopo hoti, vīsaṃ sataṃ, tiṃsaṃ sataṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2242: Ttake pare etassa eṭa hoti. Ettakaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2244: Ṇikassa vā iyo hoti, sakyaputtiyo, sakyaputtiko.
anya-e0801n0:2246_0: Ghe pare adhātussa yo kakāro, tato pubbassa akārassa bahulaṃ i hoti sace gho na syādito
anya-e0801n0:2246_1: paro hoti. Bālikā, kārikā, adhātussāti kiṃ? Sakā, keti kiṃ? Nandanā, asyāditoti kiṃ?
anya-e0801n0:2246_2: Bahuparibbājakā mathurā, bahucammikāti kakārena syādino byavahitattā siddhaṃ, gheti
anya-e0801n0:2246_3: kiṃ? Bālako, assāti kiṃ? Bahukattukā sālā.
anya-e0801n0:2250: 1. Tija mānehi kha sā khamā vīmaṃsāsu.
anya-e0801n0:2251: Khantiyaṃ tijā vīmaṃsāyaṃ mānā ca khasappaccayā honti yathākkamaṃ, titikkhā, vīmaṃsā, titikkhati, vīmaṃsati. Khamāvīmaṃsā, sūti kiṃ? Tejanaṃ, tejo, tejayati, mānanaṃ, mānomāneti.
anya-e0801n0:2253: Tikicchāyaṃ saṃsaye ca vattamānā kitā cho hoti. Tikicchā, vicikicchā, tikicchati, vicikicchati. Aññatra niketo, saṃketo, ketanaṃ, keto, ketayati.
anya-e0801n0:2254: 3. Nindāyaṃ gupa badhā bassa bho ca.
anya-e0801n0:2255: Nindāyaṃ vattamānehi gupa badhehi cho hoti bassa bho ca. Jigucchā, bībhacchā, jigucchati, bībhacchati, aññatra gopanaṃ, gopo, gopeti, badhako.
anya-e0801n0:2257_0: Tumantato icchāyamatthe te khasachā honti bahulaṃ, lopo ca tuṃpaccayassa hoti sutattā,
anya-e0801n0:2257_1: bubhukkhā, jigīsāṃ, jighacchā, bubhukkhati, jigīsati jighacchati. Idha kasmā na hoti
anya-e0801n0:2257_3: kiṃ? Bhuñjituṃ gacchati. Kathaṃ ‘kūlaṃ vipati satī’ti? Yathā kūlaṃ patitu micchatīti
anya-e0801n0:2257_4: vākyaṃ hoti, evaṃ vuttipi hossati. Vākyameva carahi kathaṃ hoti? Lokassa tathā vacanicchāya.
anya-e0801n0:2259_0: Icchākammato icchāyamatthe īyappaccayo hoti. Puttamicchati putthīyati. Kammāti kiṃ?
anya-e0801n0:2259_1: Asinecchati. Idha kasmā na hoti ‘raññoputtamicchatī’ti? Sāpekkhattā, na hi aññamapekkhamāno
anya-e0801n0:2259_2: aññena sahekatthibhāvamanubhavituṃ sakkoti. Idhāpi carahi na siyā ‘attano putta micchatī’ti?
anya-e0801n0:2259_3: Nevettha bhavitabbaṃ, na hi bhavati ‘attano puttīyatī’ti, kathaṃ carahi puttassa
anya-e0801n0:2261: Kammato upamānā ācāratthe īyo hoti. Puttami-vā-carati puttīyati māṇavakaṃ, upamānāti kiṃ? Puttamācarati.
anya-e0801n0:2263: Ādhāratū-pamānā ācāratthe īyo yoti. Kuṭiyamivā-carati kuṭīyatī pāsāde, pāsādīyati kuṭiyaṃ bhikkhu.
anya-e0801n0:2265: Kattutū-pamānā ācāratthe āyo hoti. Pabbato ivācarati pabbatāyati.
anya-e0801n0:2267: Kattuto abhūtatabbhāve āyo hoti bahulaṃ. Bhusāyati, paṭapaṭāyati, lohitāyati, kattutotveva? (Abhusaṃ) bhusaṃ karotīhi, iha kasmā na hoti ‘bhusī bhavatī’ti? Vuttatthatāya.
anya-e0801n0:2269: Saddādīhi dutiyantehi karotīti asmiṃ atthe āyo hoti. Saddāyati, verāyati, kalahāyati, dhūpāyati.
anya-e0801n0:2271: Namoiccasmā karotīti asmiṃ atthe asso hoti. Namassati tathāgtaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2273_0: Nāmasmā dhātvatthe bahulamihoti. Hatthinā atikkamati atihatthayati, vīṇāya upagāyati
anya-e0801n0:2273_1: upavīṇayati, daḷhaṃ karoti vinayaṃ daḷhayati, visuddhā hoti ratti visuddhayati, kusalaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2275: Saccādīhi dhātvatthe āpi hoti. Saccāpeti, atthāpeti, vedāpeti, sukkhāpeti, sukhāpeti, dukkhāpeti.
anya-e0801n0:2277: Ayamadhikāro āsatthaparisamattiyā. Kriyā attho yassa so kriyattho dhātu.
anya-e0801n0:2279: Curādīhi kriyatthehi sakatthe ṇi paro hoti bahulaṃ. Ṇakāro vuddhyattho, evamaññatrāpi, corayati, lāḷayati, kathaṃ ‘rajjaṃ kāretī’ti? Yogavibhāgato.
anya-e0801n0:2281_0: Kattāraṃ yo payojayati, tassa byāpāre kriyatthā ṇiṇāpī honti bahulaṃ, kāreti, kārāpeti.
anya-e0801n0:2281_1: Nanu ca kattāpi karaṇādīnaṃ payojakoti taṃbyāpārepi ṇiṇāpī pāpuṇanti? Payojakaggahaṇasāmatthiyā
anya-e0801n0:2281_2: na bhavissanti curādīhi visuṃ vacanasāmatthiyā ca. Ato bhiyyo ṇāpiyeva, ṇiyevuvaṇṇato, dvayamevaññehi.
anya-e0801n0:2282_0: 17. Kyo bhāvakammesva-parokkhesu māna nta tyādīsu. Bhāvakammavihitesu parokkhāvajjitesu
anya-e0801n0:2282_1: mānantatyādīsu paresu kyo hoti kriyatthā. Ntaggahaṇamuttaratthaṃ, kakāro avuddhyattho
anya-e0801n0:2282_2: evamuttaratrāpi. Ṭhīyamānaṃ, ṭhīyate, sūyamānaṃ, sūyate, aparokkhesu mānantatyādīsūti
anya-e0801n0:2282_3: kiṃ? Babhūva devadattena, bibhida kusulo. Bhijjate kusulo sayamevāti ‘bhijjate’ti
anya-e0801n0:2282_5: kusulo attāna’nti bhavati, evamaññampi yathāgamamanugantabbaṃ. ‘Aparokkhesu mānantatyādīsū’ti
anya-e0801n0:2282_6: ayamadhikāro ā ‘tanāditvo’ti 5.26. Apica ete kyādayo tyādīsu parabhūtesu kattukammabhāva
anya-e0801n0:2282_7: vihitesu kyalādīnaṃ vidhānato tesveva viññāyantīti akammakehi dhātūhi kattubhāvesu,
anya-e0801n0:2282_8: sakammakehi kattukammesu, kammāvacanicchāyaṃ bhāve ca bhavantīti veditabbā. Yassa
anya-e0801n0:2282_9: pana dhātussa kiriyā kammamapekkhate, so sakammako, yassa tu kiriyā kattumattamapekkhate,
anya-e0801n0:2284: Kriyatthato aparokkhesu kattuvihitamāna ntatyādīsu lo hoti. Lakāro, “ñilasse”ti 5-163 visesanattho. Pacamāno, pacanto, pacati.
anya-e0801n0:2286: Rudhādito kattuvihitamānanta tyādīsu lo hoti maṃ ca antasarā paro. Makāro-nubandho, akāro uccāraṇattho. Rundhamāno, rundhanto, rundhati.
anya-e0801n0:2288_0: Ṇiṇāpyāpīhi kattuvihitamānanta tyādīsu lo hoti vibhāsā, orayanto, corento, kārayanto,
anya-e0801n0:2288_1: kārento, kārāpayanto, kārāpento, saccāpayanto, saccāpento, corayati, coreti, kārayati,
anya-e0801n0:2288_2: kāreti, kārāpayati, kārāpeti, saccāpayati, saccāpeti. Vavatthitavibhāsattho-yaṃ vāsaddo,
anya-e0801n0:2288_3: tena māne niccaṃ, corayamāno, kārayamāno, kārāpayamāno, saccāpayamāno.
anya-e0801n0:2290: Divādīhi lavisaye yaka hoti. Dibbanto, dibbati.
anya-e0801n0:2292: Tudādīhi lavisaye ko hoti. Tudamāno, tudanto, tudati.
anya-e0801n0:2294: Jiādīhi lavisaye knā hoti. Jinanto, jināti. Kathaṃ ‘jayanto’ jayatī, ti? Bhūvādipāṭhā.
anya-e0801n0:2296: Kīādīhi lavisaye kṇā hoti. Kiṇanto, kiṇāti.
anya-e0801n0:2298: Suādīhi lavisaye kṇo hoti. Suṇamāno, suṇanto, suṇoti. Kathaṃ suṇātīti? Kyādipāṭhā.
anya-e0801n0:2302_0: Tabbaanīyā kriyatthā pare bhāvakammesu bahulaṃ bhavanti. Kattabbaṃ, karaṇīyaṃ, kattabbo
anya-e0801n0:2302_1: kaṭo, karaṇīyo. Bahulādhikārā karaṇādīsupi bhavanti, sinānīyaṃ cuṇṇaṃ, dānīyo brāhmaṇo,
anya-e0801n0:2302_2: sammāvattanīyo guru, pavacanīyo upajjhāyo, upaṭṭhānīyo sisso.
anya-e0801n0:2304: Bhāvakammesu kriyatthā paro ghyaṇa hoti bahulaṃ. Vākyaṃ, kāriyaṃ, ceyyaṃ, jeyyaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2306: Ātoghyaṇa hoti bhāvakammesu, āssa e ca. Deyyaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2308: Vadādīhi kriyatthehi yo hoti bahulaṃ bhāvakammesu. Vajjaṃ, majjaṃ, gammaṃ. (42) “Bhujānne”, bhojjo odano, bhojjā yāgu, bhoggamaññaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2312_0: Gutādīhi kriyattehi bhāvakammesu yaka hoti. Guyhaṃ, duyhaṃ, sisso. Siddhā evete tabbādayo
anya-e0801n0:2312_1: pesātisaggapattakālesupi gamyamānesu sāmaññenavidhānato, tvayā khalu kaṭo kattabbo,
anya-e0801n0:2312_2: karaṇīyo, kāriyo, kicco, evaṃ tvayā kaṭo kattabbo, bhotā kaṭo kattabbo, bhoto hi
anya-e0801n0:2312_3: patto kālo kaṭakaraṇe. Evaṃ uddhamohuttikepi vattamānato pesādīsu siddhā eva. Tathā
anya-e0801n0:2312_4: arahe kattari sattivisiṭṭhe ca patīyamāne āvassakādhamīṇatāvisiṭṭhe ca bhāvādo siddhā,
anya-e0801n0:2312_5: uddhaṃmuhuttato-bhotā kaṭo kattabbo, bhotā rajjaṃ kattabbaṃ. Bhavaṃ araho, bhotā
anya-e0801n0:2312_6: sāro vahitabbo, bhavaṃ sakko, bhotā avassaṃ kaṭo kattabbo, bhotā nikkho dātabbo.
anya-e0801n0:2314_0: Kattari kārake kriyatthā ltuṇakā honti bahulaṃ. Paṭhitā, pāṭhako. Bahulamitveva?
anya-e0801n0:2314_1: Pādehi harīyatīti pādahā-rako, gale cuppateti galecopako. Siddhova ltu, arahe sīlasādhudhammesu
anya-e0801n0:2314_2: ca sāmaññavihitattā, bhavaṃ khalu kaññāya pariggahitā, bhavametaṃ arahati. Sīlādīsu-khalvapi
anya-e0801n0:2314_3: upādātā kumārake, gantā khelaṃ, muṇḍayitāro sāviṭṭhāyanā vadhuṃ katapariggahaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2316: Kriyatthā āvī hoti bahulaṃ kattari. Bhayadassāvī. Appavisayataññāpanatthaṃ bhinnayogakaraṇaṃ, sāmaññavihitattā sīlā dīsu ca hoteva.
anya-e0801n0:2318: Āsiṃsāyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ kriyatthā ako hoti kattari. Jīvatūti jīvako, nandatūti nandako, bhavatūti bhavako.
anya-e0801n0:2320: Karato kattari ṇano hoti. Karotīti kāraṇaṃ, kattarīti kiṃ? Karaṇaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2322: Hāto vīhismiṃ kāle ca ṇano hoti kattari. Hāyanā nāma vihayo, hāyano saṃvaccharo, vīhikālesūti kiṃ? Hātā.
anya-e0801n0:2324: Vidasmā kū hoti kattari. Vidū, lokavidū.
anya-e0801n0:2326: Vipubbā ñāiccasmā kū hoti kattari. Viññū. Vitoti kiṃ? Paññā.
anya-e0801n0:2328: Kammato parā ñāiccasmā kū hoti kattari. Sabbaññū, kālaññū.
anya-e0801n0:2330_0: Kammato parā kriyatthā kvaci aṇa hoti kattari. Kumbhakāro, saralāvo, mantajjhāyo,
anya-e0801n0:2330_1: bahulādhikārā idha na hoti ādiccaṃ passati, himavantaṃ suṇoti, gāmaṃ gacchati. Kvacīti kiṃ? Kammakaro.
anya-e0801n0:2332: Kammato parā gamā rū hoti kattari. Vedagū pāragū.
anya-e0801n0:2333: 43. Samānañña bhavanta yāditū-pamānā disā kamme rīrikkhakā.
anya-e0801n0:2334_0: Samānādīhi yādīhi copamānehi parā disā kammakārake rīrikkhakā honti. Samāno viya
anya-e0801n0:2334_1: dissatīti sadī sadikkho sadiso. Aññādī aññādikkho aññādiso. Bhavādī bhavādikkho bhavādiso.
anya-e0801n0:2334_2: Yādī yādikkho yādiso. Tyādī tyādikkho tyādiso. Samānādīhīti kiṃ? Rukkho viya dissati.
anya-e0801n0:2334_3: Upamānāti kiṃ? So dissati. Kammeti kiṃ? So viya passati. Rakārā antasarādilopatthā,
anya-e0801n0:2336_0: Bhāve kārake ca kriyatthā a ghaṇa gha kā honti bahulaṃ. A-paggaho, niggaho, karo,
anya-e0801n0:2336_1: garo, cayo, jayo, ravo, bhavo, paco, vaco, annado, purindado, īsakkaro, dukkaro,
anya-e0801n0:2336_2: sukaro. Ghaṇa-bhāve pāko, cāgo, bhāvo, kārakepi saññāyaṃ tāva pajjatenenāti pādo,
anya-e0801n0:2336_3: rujatīti rogo, visatīti veso, sarati kālantaranti sāro thiraṃso, darīyante etehīti
anya-e0801n0:2336_4: dārā, jīrayati etenāti jāro, asaññāyampi dāyo datto, lābho laddho, gha-vako, nipako,
anya-e0801n0:2338: Dādhāhi bahulami hoti bhāvakārakesu. Ādi, nidhi, vālami.
anya-e0801n0:2340: Vamādīhi bhāvakārakesvathu hoti. Vamathu, vepathu, (avathu, sayathu).
anya-e0801n0:2342: Kriyatthā kvi hoti bahulaṃ bhāvakārakesu. Kakāro kānubandhakāriyattho, abhibhū, sayambhū, bhattaggaṃ, (dānaggaṃ) salākaggaṃ, sabhā, pabhā.
anya-e0801n0:2344: Kriyattā bhāvakārakesvano hoti. Gamanaṃ, dānaṃ, sampadānaṃ, apādānaṃ, adhikaraṇaṃ, calano, jalano, kodhano, kopano, maṇḍano, bhūsano.
anya-e0801n0:2345: 49. Itthiyamaṇa tti ka yaka yā ca.
anya-e0801n0:2346_0: Itthiliṅge bhāve kārake ca kriyatthā aādayo honti ano ca bahulaṃ. A titikkhā, vīmaṃsā,
anya-e0801n0:2346_1: jigucchā, pipāsā, puttiyā īhā bhikkhā, āpadā, medhā, godhā, ṇakārā, hārā, tārā, dhārā,
anya-e0801n0:2346_2: ārā, kti-iṭṭhi, siṭṭhi, bhitti, bhatti, tanti bhūti, ka-guhā, rujā, mudā, yaka-vijjā,
anya-e0801n0:2346_3: ijjā, ya-seyyā, samajjā, pabbajjā, paricariyā, jāgariyā, anakāraṇā, hāraṇā, vedanā, vandanā, upāsanā.
anya-e0801n0:2350: Karato ririyo hotitthiyaṃ. Karaṇaṃ kiriyā. Kathaṃ ‘kriyā’ti? “Kriyāyaṃ”ti nipātanā.
anya-e0801n0:2352: Kriyatthassa sarūpe-bhidheyye kriyatthā pare ikitī honti, vaci, yudhi, pacati, ‘akāro kakāro’ti ādīsu kārasaddena samāso, yathā evakāroti.
anya-e0801n0:2354: Kriyatthā ṇī hoti sīlādīsu patīyamānesu, uṇhabhojī, khīrapāyī, avassakārī, satandāyī.
anya-e0801n0:2358: Bhūte-tthe vattamānato kriyatthā ktavantuttāvī honti kattari. Vijitavā, vijitāvī, bhūteti adhikāro yāva “āhāratthā”ti (5-60).
anya-e0801n0:2360: Bhāve kamme ca bhūte kto hoti. Āsitaṃ bhavatā. Kato kaṭo bhavatā.
anya-e0801n0:2362: Kriyārambhe kattari kto hoti yathāpattañca. Pakato bhavaṃ kaṭaṃ, pakato kaṭo bhavatā, pasutto bhavaṃ, pasuttaṃ bhavatā.
anya-e0801n0:2363: 58. Ṭhā-sa vasa silisa sī ruha jara janīhi.
anya-e0801n0:2364_0: Ṭhādīhi kattari kto hoti yathāpattañca. Upaṭṭhito guruṃ bhavaṃ, upaṭṭhito guru bhotā,
anya-e0801n0:2364_1: upāsito guruṃ bhavaṃ, upāsito guru bhotā, anuvusito guruṃ bhavaṃ, anuvusito guru
anya-e0801n0:2364_2: bhotā, āsiliṭṭho guruṃ bhavaṃ, āsiliṭṭho guru bhotā, adhissito khaṭopikaṃ bhavaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2364_3: adhissitā khaṭopikā bhotā, āraḷho rukkhaṃ bhavaṃ, āruḷho rukkho bhotā, anujiṇṇo vasaliṃ
anya-e0801n0:2364_4: devadatto, anujiṇṇā vasalī devadattena, anujāto māṇavako māṇavikaṃ, anujātā māṇavikā māṇavakena.
anya-e0801n0:2366_0: Gamanatthato akammakato ca kriyatthā ādhāre kto hoti kattari ca yathāpattañca, idamesaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2366_1: yātaṃ, iha te yātā, iha tehi yātaṃ, ayaṃ tehi yāto patho, idamesamāsitaṃ, iha te
anya-e0801n0:2366_2: āsitā, ihatehi āsitaṃ, ‘devo ce vuṭṭho sampannā sālayo’ti kāraṇasāmaggīsampatti etthābhimatā.
anya-e0801n0:2368_0: Ajjhohāratthā ādhāre kto hoti yathāpattañca, idamesaṃ bhuttaṃ, idamesaṃ pītaṃ, iha
anya-e0801n0:2368_1: tehi bhuttaṃ, iha tehi pītaṃ, odano tehi bhutto pītamudakaṃ, akattattho yogavibhāgo,
anya-e0801n0:2368_2: kathaṃ ‘pītā gāvo’ti? Pītamesaṃ vijjatīti pītā, bāhulakā vā, ‘passinno’ti yā ettha
anya-e0801n0:2368_3: bhūtakālatā, tatra tto, evaṃ raññaṃ mato raññaṃ iṭṭho, raññaṃ buddho, raññaṃ pūjito,
anya-e0801n0:2368_4: evaṃ sīlito, rakkhito, khanto, ākuṭṭho, ruṭṭho, rusito, abhibyāhaṭo, dayiyo, haṭṭho,
anya-e0801n0:2368_5: kantā, saṃyato, amato, ‘kaṭṭha’nti bhūtatāyameva hetuno, phalaṃ tvatra bhāvi.
anya-e0801n0:2369: 61. Tuṃ tāye tave bhāve bhavissati kriyāyaṃ tadatthāya.
anya-e0801n0:2370_0: Bhavissati atthe vattamānato kriyatthā bhāve tuṃ tāye tave honti kriyāyaṃ tadatthāyaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2370_1: patīyamānāyaṃ. Kātuṃ gacchati, kattāye gacchati, kātave gacchati, icchati bhottuṃ
anya-e0801n0:2370_2: kāmeti bhottunti imīnāva siddhaṃ, punabbidhāne tvihāpi siyā ‘icchanto karotī’ti,
anya-e0801n0:2370_3: evaṃ sakkoti bhottuṃ, jānāti bhottuṃ, gilāyati bhottuṃ, ghaṭate bhottuṃ, ārabhate
anya-e0801n0:2370_4: bhottuṃ, labhate bhottuṃ, pakkamati bhottuṃ, ussahati bhottuṃ, arahati bhottuṃ, atthi
anya-e0801n0:2370_5: bhottuṃ, vijjati bhottuṃ, vaṭṭa tibhottuṃ, kappati bhottunti. Tathā pārayati bhottuṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2370_6: pahu bhottuṃ, samattho bhottuṃ, pariyatto bhottuṃ, alaṃ bhottunti bhavatissa sabbattha
anya-e0801n0:2370_7: sambhavā. Tathā kālo bhottuṃ. Samayo bhotuṃ, velā bhotunti, yathā bhottuṃmano, sottuṃ
anya-e0801n0:2370_8: soto, daṭṭhuṃ cakkhu, yujjhituṃ dhanu, vattuṃ jaḷo, gantumano, kattumalasoti, uccāraṇantu
anya-e0801n0:2370_9: vattāyattaṃ. Bhāveti kiṃ? Karissāmīti gacchati, kriyāyanti kiṃ? Bhikkhissaṃ iccassa
anya-e0801n0:2370_10: jaṭā, tadatthāyanti kiṃ? Gacchissato te bhavissati bhattaṃ bhojanāya.
anya-e0801n0:2372_0: Alaṃ khalusaddānaṃ paṭisedhatthānaṃ payoge tunādayo vā honti bhāve. Alaṃ sotuna,
anya-e0801n0:2372_1: khalu sotuna, alaṃ sutvāna, dhalu sutvāna, alaṃ sutvā, khalu sutvā, alaṃ sutena,
anya-e0801n0:2372_2: khalu sotena, alaṃ khalūnanti kiṃ? Mā hotu, paṭisedheti kiṃ? Alaṅkāro.
anya-e0801n0:2374_0: Eko kattā yesaṃ byāpārānaṃ, tesu yo pubbo, tadatthato kriyatthā tunādayo honti bhāve,
anya-e0801n0:2374_1: sotuna yāti, sutvāna, sutvā vā, ekakattukānantikiṃ? Bhuttasmiṃ devadatte yaññadatto
anya-e0801n0:2374_2: vajati, pubbāti kiṃ? Bhuñjabhi ca pacati ca. ‘Appatvā nadiṃ pabbato atikkamma pabbataṃ
anya-e0801n0:2374_3: nadī’ti bhūdhātussa sabbattha sambhavā ekakattukatā pubbakālatā ca gamyate. ‘Bhutvā
anya-e0801n0:2374_4: bhutvā gacchatīti’ imināva siddhaṃ ābhikkhaññantu dvibbacanāvagamyate. Kathaṃ ‘jīvaggāhaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2374_5: agāhayi, kāyappacālakaṃ gacchantī’ti ādi? Ghaṇantena kriyāvisesanena siddhaṃ yathā
anya-e0801n0:2376: Vattamānatthe vattamānato kriyattā nto ho ti kattari, tiṭṭhanto.
anya-e0801n0:2378: Vattamānatthe vattamānato kriyatthā māno hoti, kattari. Tiṭṭhamāno.
anya-e0801n0:2380: Vattamānatthe vattamānato kriṃyatthā bhāve kammeca māno hoti. Ṭhīyamānaṃ, paccamāno odano.
anya-e0801n0:2382: Anāgatatthe vattamānato kriyatthā tentamānā ssapubbā honti. Ṭhassanto, ṭhassamāno, ṭhīyissamānaṃ, paccissamāno odano.
anya-e0801n0:2384: Kriyatthā pare bahulaṃ ṇvādayo honti. Cāru, dāru.
anya-e0801n0:2386: Khachasappaccayantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ paṭhamekassaraṃ saddarūpaṃ dve bhavati. Titikkhā, jigucchā, vīmaṃsā.
anya-e0801n0:2388_0: Parokkhāyaṃ paṭhamekassaraṃ saddarūpaṃ dve bhavati. Jagāma, cakāro anuttasamuccayattho,
anya-e0801n0:2388_1: tenaññatrāpi yathāgamaṃ, jahāti, jahitabbaṃ, jahituṃ, daddallati, caṅkamati. ‘Lolupo,
anya-e0801n0:2390: Ādibhūtā sarā paramekassaraṃ dve hoti, asisisati, ādismāti kiṃ? Jajagāra, sarāti kiṃ? Papāca.
anya-e0801n0:2392: Yaṃ dvibhūtaṃ, na taṃ puna dvittamāpajjate, titikkhisati, jigucchisati.
anya-e0801n0:2394: Syādyantassa yathiṭṭhamekassaramādibhūtamaññaṃ vā yathāgamaṃ dvittapajjate, puputtīyisati, putittīyisati, puttīyiyisati.
anya-e0801n0:2396: Dvitte pubbassa saro rasso hoti. Dadāti.
anya-e0801n0:2398: Dvitte pubbassādito-ññassa byañjanassa lopo hoti. Asisisati.
anya-e0801n0:2400: Dvitte pubbassa assa i hoti khachasesu. Pipāsati, jighaṃsati, khachasesūti kiṃ? Jahāti, assāti kiṃ? Bubhukkhati.
anya-e0801n0:2402: Dvitte pubbassa gupissa ussa i hoti khachasesu, jigucchati.
anya-e0801n0:2404: Dvitte pubesaṃ catutthadutiyānaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā honti. Bubhukkhati, ciccheda.
anya-e0801n0:2406: Dvitte pubbesaṃ kavaggahānaṃ cavaggajā honti yathākkamaṃ. Cukopa, jahāti.
anya-e0801n0:2408: Dvitte pubbassa mānassa vī hoti parassa ca maṃ, vīmaṃsati.
anya-e0801n0:2410: Saṃsayaso-ññasmiṃ vattamānassa dvitte pubbassa kitassa vā ti hoti. Tikicchati, cikicchati, asaṃsayeti kiṃ? Vicikicchati.
anya-e0801n0:2412: Ivaṇṇuvaṇṇantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ eohonti yathākkamaṃ paccaye. Cetabbaṃ, netabbaṃ, sotabbaṃ, bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2414: Lahubhūtassa upantassa yuvaṇṇassa eo honti yathākkamaṃ. Esitabbaṃ, kositabbaṃ, lahussāti kiṃ? Dhūpitā, upantassāti kiṃ? Rundhati.
anya-e0801n0:2416: Ṇakārānubandhe paccaye pare upantassa akārassa ā hoti. Kārako.
anya-e0801n0:2418_0: Te eoā kānubandhe nāgame ca na honti. Cito, suto, diṭṭho, puṭṭho, nāgame ‘vanā’dinā
anya-e0801n0:2418_1: (1.45) cinitabbaṃ, cinituṃ, suṇitabbaṃ, suṇituṃ pāpuṇitabbaṃ, pāpuṇituṃ, dhunitabbaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2418_2: dhunituṃ, dhunanaṃ, dhunayitabbaṃ, dhunāpetabbaṃ, dhunayituṃ dhunāpetuṃ, dhunayanaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2418_3: dhunāpanaṃ, dhunayati, dhunāpeti, pīnetabbaṃ, pīnayituṃ, pīnanaṃ, pīnituṃ, pīnayati,
anya-e0801n0:2418_4: sunoti, sinoti, dunoti, hinoti, pahiṇithabbaṃ, pahiṇituṃ, pahiṇanaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2420: Te kvaci vā na honti kānubandhanāgamesu. Mudito, ruditaṃ, roditaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2422: Kānubandhanāgamato-ññasmimpi te kvaci, nu honti. Khipako, panūdanaṃ, vadhako.
anya-e0801n0:2426: Sare pare eonaṃ ayaavā honti. Jayo, bhavo, sarati kiṃ? Jeti, anubhoti.
anya-e0801n0:2428: Eonaṃ āyāvā honti sarādo ṇānubandhe. Nāyayati, bhāvayati, ‘sayāpetvā’tiādīsu rassattaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2430: Ākārantassa kriyatthassa yuka hoti ṇāpito-ññasmiṃ ṇānubandhe. Dāyako, ṇānubandhetveva? Dānaṃ, aṇāpimhīti kiṃ? Dāpayati.
anya-e0801n0:2432: Padādīnaṃ yuka hoti kvaci. Nipajjitabbaṃ, nipajjituṃ nipajjanaṃ, pamajjitabbaṃ, pamajjituṃ, pamajjanaṃ, kvacīti kiṃ? Pādo.
anya-e0801n0:2434: Rudhādīnaṃ kvaci maṃ vā hoti. Rundhituṃ, rujjhituṃ, kvacitveva? Nirodho.
anya-e0801n0:2436: Antabyañjanassa lopo hoti kvimhi. Bhattaṃ gasanti gaṇhanti vā etthāti bhattaggaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2438: Kriyatthānamantabyañjanassa pararūpaṃ hoti yakārato-ññasmiṃ byañjane. Bhettabbaṃ, byañjaneti kiṃ? Bhinditabbaṃ, ayakāreti kiṃ? Bhijjati.
anya-e0801n0:2440: Makāranakārantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ niggahītaṃ hoti ayakāre byañjane. Gantabbaṃ, jaṅghā, byañjanetveva? Gamanaṃ, ayakāretveva? Gamyate.
anya-e0801n0:2442: Brūssa o na hoti byañjane. Brūmi, byañjanetveva? Abravi.
anya-e0801n0:2444: Ghānubandhe cakārajakārantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ kagā honti yathākkamaṃ. Vākyaṃ, bhāgyaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2448: Payyādīhi parassa hanassa gho hoti kvimhi. Paligho, paṭigho, aghaṃ rassattaṃ nipātanā, saṅgho, ogho.
anya-e0801n0:2450: Dvitte parassa hanassa ghaṃ hoti se. Jighaṃsā.
anya-e0801n0:2452: Dvitte paresaṃ jitarānaṃ gī hoti se. Vijigīsā, jigīsā.
anya-e0801n0:2454: Dvitte parassa dhāssa ha hoti. Dahati.
anya-e0801n0:2456: Dusassa dīgho hoti ṇimhi. Dusito. Ṇimhīti kiṃ? Duṭṭho.
anya-e0801n0:2458: Guhissa dīgho hoti sare. Nigūhanaṃ sareti kiṃ? Guyhaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2460_0: Muhabahānaṃ guhissa ca dīgho hoti takārādo kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite, mūḷho, bāḷho,
anya-e0801n0:2460_1: gūḷho, teti kiṃ? Muyhati, kānubandheti-kiṃ? Muyhitabbaṃ, atveti kiṃ? Muyhitvāna,
anya-e0801n0:2462: Vahassa ussa dīgho hoti te kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite. Vuṭṭho.
anya-e0801n0:2464: Dhā=dhāraṇetīmassa hi hoti te kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite. Nihito, nihitavā.
anya-e0801n0:2466_0: Gamādīnaṃ rakārantānaṃ ca antassa lopo hoti te kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite. Gato,
anya-e0801n0:2466_1: khato, hato, mato, tato, saññato, rato, kato, tetveva? Gamyate, kānubandhetveva?
anya-e0801n0:2468: Vacādīnaṃ vassa vā uṭa hoti kānubandhe-tve. Uttaṃ, vuttaṃ, uṭṭhaṃ, vuṭṭhaṃ, ‘atvetveva? Vatvāna, vatvā.
anya-e0801n0:2470: Vacādīnamassa u hoti kānubandhe-sve. Vuttaṃ, vuṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2472: Vaddhassa assa vā u hoti kānubandhe tve. Vuddho. Vaddho. Atvetveva? Vaddhitvāna, vaddhitvā, kathaṃ ‘vuttī’ti? “Vuttīmatte”ti 3-69. nipātanā, ‘vattī’ti hoteva yathālakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2474: Yajassa yassa ṭiyī honti kānubandhe-tve. Iṭṭhaṃ, yiṭṭhaṃ, atvetveva? Yajitvāna, yajitvā.
anya-e0801n0:2476: Ṭhāssi hoti kānubandhe-tve. Ṭhito, atvetveva? Ṭhatvāna, ṭhatvā.
anya-e0801n0:2478: Gāpānamī hoti kānabandhe-tve. Gītaṃ, pītaṃ, atvetveva? Gāyitvā niccaṃ yāgamo, pāssa tu pītvāti bahulādhikārā.
anya-e0801n0:2480: Janissa ā hoti kānubandhe-tve. Jāto. Atvetveva? Janitvā.
anya-e0801n0:2482: Sāsassa sisa vā hoti kānubandhe-tve. Siṭṭhaṃ, satthaṃ, sisso, sāsiyo atvetveva? Anusāsitvāna.
anya-e0801n0:2486: Tumādīsu vā karassā hoti. Kātuṃ kattuṃ, kātuna kattuna, kātabbaṃ kattabbaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2488: Ñādhātussa jā hoti nakāre. Jānituṃ, jānanto, neti kiṃ? Ñāto.
anya-e0801n0:2490: Sakaāpānaṃ kukakuiccete āgamā honti ṇakāre. Sakkuṇanto, pāpuṇanto, sakkuṇoti, pāpuṇoti, ṇeti kiṃ? Sakkoti, pāpeti.
anya-e0801n0:2492: Nismā parassa cissa cho hoti. Nicchayo.
anya-e0801n0:2494_0: Jarasadānamantasarā paro īma hoti vibhāsā. Jīraṇaṃ, jīrati, jīrāpeti, nisīditabbaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2494_1: nisīdanaṃ, nisīdituṃ, nisīdati, vāti kiṃ? Jarā, nisajjā, ‘īma vā’ti yogavibhāgā aññesampi,
anya-e0801n0:2495: 124. Disassa passa dassa dasa da dakkhā.
anya-e0801n0:2496_0: Disassa passādayo honti vibhāsā. Vipassanā, vipassituṃ, vipassati, sudassī, piyadassī,
anya-e0801n0:2496_1: dhammadassī, sudassaṃ, dassanaṃ, dasseti, daṭṭhabbaṃ. Daṭṭhā, daṭṭhuṃ, duddaso, addasa,
anya-e0801n0:2496_2: addā, addaṃ, addakkhi, dakkhissati, vātveva? Dissanti bālā.
anya-e0801n0:2498: Samānasaddato parassa disassa ra hoti vā rīvikkhakesu. Sarī, sadī, sarikkho, sadikkho, sariso, sadiso.
anya-e0801n0:2500: Dahassa dassa ḍo hoti vā. Ḍāho, dāho, ḍahati, dahati.
anya-e0801n0:2502: Āparīhi parassa dahassa dassa ḷo hoti anaghaṇasu. Āḷahanaṃ, pariḷāho.
anya-e0801n0:2504_0: Tyādintavajjitesu paccayesu ‘asa=bhuvi’iccassa bhū hoti. Bhavitabbaṃ. Ādesavidhānamasassāppayogatthametasmiṃ
anya-e0801n0:2504_1: visaye, etena katthaci kassaci dhātussa appayogāpi ñāpito hoti. Atyādintesūti kiṃ?
anya-e0801n0:2504_2: Atthi, santo, atthissāti kiṃ? Assatissa mā hotu.
anya-e0801n0:2506: Aādo, āādo, ssādo ca atthissa bhū hoti. Babhūva, abhavā, abhavissā, bhavissati.
anya-e0801n0:2507: 130. Ntamānantiyiyuṃsvādilopo. Ntādisūtthissādilopo hoti. Santo, samāno, santi, santu, siyā, siyuṃ, etesvīti kiṃ? Atthi.
anya-e0801n0:2509_0: Pādīhi kiriyāvisesajotakehi saddehi parassa ṭhāssa kvaci ṭhaho vā hoti. Saṇṭhahanto
anya-e0801n0:2509_1: santiṭṭhanto. Saṇṭhahati, santiṭṭhati. Pa parā apa saṃ anu ava o ni du vi adhi api
anya-e0801n0:2509_2: atisu u abhi pati pari upa ā pādī. Kvacīti kiṃ? Saṇṭhiti.
anya-e0801n0:2511: Pādito parassa dāssa iyaṅa hoti kvaci. Anādiyitvā, samādiyati, kvacitveva? Ādāya.
anya-e0801n0:2513: Pādito parassa karassa kvaci kha hoti. Saṅkhāro, saṅkharīyati, karassāti avatvā karotissāti vacanaṃ timhi ca vikaraṇuppattiñāpetuṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2515: Purā iccasmā nipātā parassa karassa kha hoti. Purakkhatvā, purekkhāro-ettaṃ tadaminādipāṭhā.
anya-e0801n0:2517: Nismā parassa kamassa kvaci kha hoti, nikkhamati, kvacitveva? Nikkamo.
anya-e0801n0:2519: Ivaṇṇuvaṇṇattānaṃ kriyatthānamiyaṅuvaṅa hoti sare kvaci. Vediyati, bruvanti, sareti kiṃ? Nivedeti, brūti, kvacitveva? Jayati, bhavati.
anya-e0801n0:2521: Ñādito-ññassa ākārantassa kriyatthassa ī hoti kye. Dīyati, aññādissāti kiṃ? Ñāyati, tāyatiṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2523: Tanassa ā hoti vā kye. Tāyate, taññate.
anya-e0801n0:2525: Sarantassa kriyatthassa dīgho hoti kye, cīyate, sūyate.
anya-e0801n0:2527: Sakārantato kriyatthā parassā-nantarassa takārassa ṭha hoti. Tuṭṭho, tuṭṭhavā, tuṭṭhabbaṃ, tuṭṭhi, anantarassāti kiṃ? Tussitvā.
anya-e0801n0:2529: Kasasmā parassānantarassa tassa ṭha hoti kasassa vā ima ca. Kiṭṭhaṃ, kaṭṭhaṃ, anantarassātveva? Kasitabbaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2533: Pucchādīhi kriyatthehi parassānantarassa takārassa ṭha hoti. Puṭṭho, bhaṭṭho, yiṭṭho, anantarassātveva? Pucchitvā.
anya-e0801n0:2535: Etehi parassānantarassa tassa tha hoti, satthaṃ, vatthaṃ, pasatthaṃ, satthaṃ. Kathamanusiṭṭho (vuṭṭho) ti? ‘Tathanarānaṃ ṭaṭṭhaṇalā’ 1-52 ti ṭṭho, anantarassātveva? Sāsituṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2537: Dhakārahakārabhakārantehi kriyatthehi parassānantarassa tassa dha hoti. Vuddho, duddhaṃ, laddhaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2539: Dahā parassānantarassa tassa ḍha hoti. Daḍḍho.
anya-e0801n0:2541: Bahā parassānantarassa tassa ḍho hoti, bahassuma ca ḍhasanniyogena. Buḍḍho.
anya-e0801n0:2543: Rahādīhi parassānantarassa tassa ha hoti ḷo cāntassa. Āruḷho, gūḷho, vūḷho, bāḷho, (ogāḷho), anantarassātveva? Ārohituṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2545: Muhā parassānantarassa tassa ha hoti vā ḷo cāntassa hasanniyogena. Mūḷho, muddho.
anya-e0801n0:2547_0: Bhidādito paresaṃ ktaktavantūnaṃ tassa no hoti. Bhinno bhinnavā, chinno chinnavā,
anya-e0801n0:2547_1: channo channavā, chinno khinnavā, uppanno uppannavā, sinno, sinnavā, sanno sannavā,
anya-e0801n0:2547_2: pīno pīnavā, sūno sūnavā, dīno dīnavā, ḍīno ḍīnavā, līno līnavā, lūno lūnavā, ktaktavantūnanti
anya-e0801n0:2549: Dāto paresaṃ ktaktavantūnaṃ tassa inno hoti. Dinno, dinnavā.
anya-e0801n0:2551: Kirādīhi paresaṃ ktaktavantūnaṃ tassānantarassa ṇa hoti, kiṇṇo kiṇṇavā, puṇṇo puṇṇavā, khīṇo khīṇavā.
anya-e0801n0:2553: Tarādīhi paresaṃ ktaktavantūnaṃ tassa riṇṇo hoti. Tiṇṇo tiṇṇavā, jiṇṇo jiṇṇavā, ciṇṇo ciṇṇavā.
anya-e0801n0:2555: Bhanjādīhi paresaṃ ktaktavantūnaṃ tassānantarassa ga hoti. Bhaggo bhaggavā, laggo laggavā, nimuggo nimuggavā, saṃviggo saṃviggavā.
anya-e0801n0:2557: Susā paresaṃ ktaktavantūnaṃ tassa kho hoti. Sukkho sukkhavā.
anya-e0801n0:2559: Pacā paresaṃ ktaktavantūnaṃ tassa ko hoti. Pakko pakkavā.
anya-e0801n0:2561: Mucā paresaṃ ktaktavantūnaṃ tassa ko vā hoti. Mukko mutto, mukkavā muttavā. ‘Sakko’ti ṇvādīsu siddhaṃ, ktaktavantūsu satto, sattāvātveva hoti.
anya-e0801n0:2563: Vaḍḍhā parassa ktissa tassa lopo hoti. Vaḍḍhi.
anya-e0801n0:2565: Kriyatthā parassa kvissa lopo hoti, abhibhū.
anya-e0801n0:2567: Ṇiṇāpīnaṃ lopo hoti tesu ṇiṇāpīsu. Kārentaṃ payojayati kāreti kārāpayati.
anya-e0801n0:2569: Vikaraṇānaṃ kvaci lopo hoti. Udapādi, hanti.
anya-e0801n0:2571: Kriyatthā parassa mānassa makārassa lopo hoti kvaci. Karāṇo, kvacīti kiṃ? Kurumāno.
anya-e0801n0:2573: Ñilāname hoti kvaci. Gahetvā, adenti, kvacitveva? Vapitvā.
anya-e0801n0:2575: Tvāssa vā pyo hoti samāse. Pakāro “pye sissā” ti 5-88 visesanattho. Abhibhūya, abhibhavitvā, samāseti kiṃ? Patvā, kvacāsamāsepi bahulādhikārā ‘lataṃ dantehi chindiya’.
anya-e0801n0:2577: Ktvāssa vā tuṃyānā honti samāse kvacci. Abhihaṭṭhuṃ abhiharitvā, anumodiyāna anumoditvā, asamāsepi bahulādhi kārā, daṭṭhuṃ disvā, esamappavisayatāñāpanattho yogavibhāgo.
anya-e0801n0:2579: Hanasmā parassa ktvāssa racco vā hoti samāse. Āhacca, āhanitvā.
anya-e0801n0:2581: Sāsādhīhi parā karā parassa ktvassa cacariccā honti yathākkamaṃ. Sakkacca sakkaritvā, asakkacca asakkaritvā, adhikicca adhikaritvā.
anya-e0801n0:2583: Iiccasmā parassa ktvāssa cco vā hoti. Adhicca adhīyitvā, samecca sametvā.
anya-e0801n0:2585_0: Disato ktvāssa vānavā honti vā disassa ca sa kāro taṃsanniyogena. Sassa savidhānaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2585_1: pararūpabādhanatthaṃ. Disvāna, disvā passitvā, kathaṃ ‘nādaṭṭhā parato dosa’nti?
anya-e0801n0:2585_2: Ñāpakā tvāssa valopo, evaṃ ‘laddhā dhana’nti ādīsu.
anya-e0801n0:2587: Kriyatthā parassa byañjanādippaccayassa ñi vā hoti. Bhuñjituṃ bhottuṃ, byañjanassāti kiṃ? Pācako.
anya-e0801n0:2589: Rantato kriyatthā parassa paccayanakārassa ṇo hoti. Araṇaṃ, saraṇaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2591: Rantato paresaṃ ntamānatyādīnaṃ nassa ṇo na hoti, karonto, kurumāno, karonti.
anya-e0801n0:2593_0: Etesaṃ vā cchaṅa hoti ntamānatyādīsu. Gacchanto gacchamāno gacchati, yacchanno yacchamāno
anya-e0801n0:2593_1: yacchati, icchanto icchamāno icchati acchanto acchamāno acchati, dicchanto dicchamāno
anya-e0801n0:2593_2: dicchati, vāti kiṃ? Gamissati, vavatthitavibhāsā-yaṃ, tenāññesu ca kvaci-icchitabbaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2593_3: icchā icchituṃ, acchitabbaṃ acchatuṃ, aññesañca yogavibhāgā-pavecchati.
anya-e0801n0:2595: Etesamīyaṅa vā hoti ntamānatyādīsu. Jīyanto jīranto, jīyamāno jīramāno, jīyati jīrati, mīyanto maranto, mīyamāno maramāno, mīyati marati.
anya-e0801n0:2597: Ṭhāpānaṃ tiṭṭhapivā honti ntamānatyādīsu. Tiṭṭhanto, tiṭṭhamāno, tiṭṭhati, pivanto, pivamāno, pivati, vātvevi? Ṭhāti, pāti.
anya-e0801n0:2599: Gamādīnaṃ ghammādayo vā honti ntamānatyādīsu. Ghammanto, gacchanto, vajjanto vadanto, dajjanto dadanto.
anya-e0801n0:2601_0: Karassa saokārassa kubbādayo vā honti ntamānatyādīsu. Kubbanto kayiranto karonto,
anya-e0801n0:2601_1: kubbamāno kurumāno kayiramāno, karāṇo, kubbati kayirati karoti, kubbate kurute, kayirate,
anya-e0801n0:2601_2: vavatthitavibhāsattā vādhikārassa bhiyyo mānaparacchakkesu kuru, kvacideva pubbachakke
anya-e0801n0:2601_3: ‘agghaṃ kurutu, no bhavaṃ, sossāti vuttattā kattariyevime.
anya-e0801n0:2603: Gahassa vā gheppo hoti ntamānatyādīsu. Gheppanto, gheppamāno, gheppati, vātveva? Gaṇhati.
anya-e0801n0:2605: Gahassa niggahītassa ṇo hoti. Gaṇhitabbaṃ, gaṇhituṃ, gaṇhanto.
anya-e0801n0:2609: 1. Vattamāne ti anti si tha mi ma te ante se vhe e mhe.
anya-e0801n0:2610_0: Vattamāne āraddhāparisamatte atthe vattamānato kriyatthā tyādayo honti. Gacchati,
anya-e0801n0:2610_1: gacchanti, gacchasi gacchatha, gacchāmi gacchāma, gacchate gacchante, gacchase gacchavhe,
anya-e0801n0:2610_2: gacche gacchāmhe. Kathaṃ ‘pure adhammo dippati, purā marāmī’ti? Vattamānassevavattumiṭṭhattā
anya-e0801n0:2610_3: taṃsamīpassa taggahaṇena gahaṇā, purepurāsaddehi vā anāgatattāvagame tadā tassa vattamānattā,
anya-e0801n0:2610_4: kālabyattayo vā eso, bhavanteva hi kālantarepi tyādayo bāhulakā ‘santesu parigūhāmi,
anya-e0801n0:2610_5: mā ca kiñca ito adaṃ’ ‘kāyassa bhedā abhisamparāyaṃ, sahabyataṃ gacchati vāsavassa,
anya-e0801n0:2611: 2. Bhavissati ssati ssanti ssasi ssatha ssāmi ssāma ssate ssante ssase ssavhe ssaṃ ssāmhe.
anya-e0801n0:2612_0: Bhavissati anāraddhe atthe vattamānato kriyatthā ssatyādayo honti. Gamissati gamissanti,
anya-e0801n0:2612_1: gamissasi gamissatha, gamissāmi gamissāma, gamissate gamissante, gamissase gamissavhe,
anya-e0801n0:2614_0: Nāmasadde nipāte sati garahāyaṃ vimhaye ca gamyamāne ssatyādayo honti. Ime hi nāma
anya-e0801n0:2614_1: kalyāṇadhammā paṭijānissanti, na hi nāma bhikkhave tassa moghapurisassa pāṇesu anuddayā
anya-e0801n0:2614_2: bhavissati, kathaṃ hi nāma so bhikkhave moghapuriso sabbamattikāmayaṃ kuṭikaṃ karissati?
anya-e0801n0:2614_3: Tattha nāma tvaṃ moghapurisa mayā virāgāya dhamme desite sarāgāya cetessasi? Atthi
anya-e0801n0:2614_4: nāma tāta sudinna ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjissasi, atthiyevihāpi nindāvagamo.
anya-e0801n0:2614_5: Vimuye-acchariyaṃ vata bho abbhutaṃ vata bho santena vata bho pabbajitā vihārena
anya-e0801n0:2614_6: viharanti, yatra hi nāma saññī samāno jāgaro pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni nissāya nissāya
anya-e0801n0:2614_7: abhikkantāni neva dakkhati na pana saddaṃ sossati, acchariyaṃ andho nāma pabbatamārohissati,
anya-e0801n0:2615: 4. Bhūte īuṃ ottha iṃ mhā ā ū se vhaṃ a mhe.
anya-e0801n0:2616_0: Bhūte parisamatte atthe vattamānato kriyatthā ī ādayo honti. Agamī agamuṃ, agamo
anya-e0801n0:2616_1: agamittha, agamiṃ agamimhā, agamā agamū, agamise agamivhaṃ, agama agamimhe. Bhūtasāmaññavacanicchāyamanajjatanepi
anya-e0801n0:2617: 5. Anajjatane ā ū o ttha a mhā ttha tthuṃ se vhaṃ iṃ mhase.
anya-e0801n0:2618: Avijjamānajjatane bhūte-tthe vattamānato kriyatthā āādayo honti.
anya-e0801n0:2619: Āñāyyā ca uṭṭhānā, āñāyyā ca saṃvesanā;
anya-e0801n0:2621: Agamā agamū, agamo, agamattha, agama agamamhā, agamattha agamatthuṃ, agamase agamavhaṃ, agamiṃ agamamhase. Aññapadattho kiṃ? Ajja hiyyo vā agamāsi.
anya-e0801n0:2622: 6. Parokkhe a u e ttha a mha ttha re ttho vho i mhe.
anya-e0801n0:2623_0: Apaccakkhe bhūtānajjatane-tthe vuttamānato kriyātthā a ādayo honti. Jagāma jagamu,
anya-e0801n0:2623_1: jagame jagapittha, jagama jagamimha, jagamittha jagamire, jagamittho jagamivho, jagami
anya-e0801n0:2623_3: samānā phalenā-numīyamānā parokkhāva vatthuto, tenuttamavisayepi payogasamavo.
anya-e0801n0:2624: 7. Eyyādo vātipattiyaṃ ssā ssaṃ su sse ssatha ssaṃ ssāmhā ssatha ssiṃsu sasse ssavhe ssiṃ ssāmhase.
anya-e0801n0:2625_0: Eyyādo visaye kriyātipattiyaṃ ssādayo honti vibhāsā. Vidhurappaccayopanipātato kāraṇavekallato
anya-e0801n0:2625_1: vā kriyāyātipatanamanipphatti kriyātipatti, ete ca ssādayo sāmatthiyātītānāgatesveva
anya-e0801n0:2625_2: honti na vattamāne tatra… kriyātipatyasambhavā, sace paṭhamavaye pabbajjaṃ alabhissā
anya-e0801n0:2625_3: arahā abhavissā, dakkhiṇena ce agamissā na sakaṭaṃ pariyā bhavissā, dakkhiṇena ce
anya-e0801n0:2625_4: agamissaṃsu, agamisse agamissatha, agamissaṃ agamissāmhā, agamissatha agamissiṃsu,
anya-e0801n0:2625_5: agamissase agamissavhe, agamissiṃ agamissāmhase, na sakaṭaṃ pariyābhavissā, vātikiṃ?
anya-e0801n0:2625_6: Dakkhiṇe na ce gamissati na sakaṭaṃ pariyā bhavissati.
anya-e0801n0:2626: 8. Hetuphalesveyya eyyuṃ eyyāsi eyyātha eyyāmi eyyāma etha eraṃ etho eyyavho eyyaṃ eyyāmhe.
anya-e0801n0:2627_0: Hetubhūtāyaṃ elabhūtāyañca kriyāyaṃ vattamānato kriyatthā eyyādayo vā honti, sace
anya-e0801n0:2627_1: saṅkhārā niccā bhaveyyuṃ na nirujjheyyuṃ, dakkhiṇena ce gaccheyya na sakaṭaṃ pariyābhaveyya,
anya-e0801n0:2627_2: dakkhiṇena ce gaccheyyuṃ, gaccheyyāsi gaccheyyātha, gaccheyyāmi gaccheyyāma, gacchetha
anya-e0801n0:2627_3: gaccheraṃ, gacchetho gaccheyyavho, gaccheyyaṃ gaccheyyāmhe, na sakaṭaṃ pariyyābhaveyya,
anya-e0801n0:2627_4: bhavanaṃ gamanaṃ ca hetu, anirujjhanaṃ apariyābhavanaṃ ca phalaṃ, iha kasmā na hoti
anya-e0801n0:2627_5: ‘hantīhi palāyati, vassatīti dhāvati, hanissatīti palāyissatī’ti? Iti saddeneva hetuhetumantatāya
anya-e0801n0:2627_6: jotitattā, vāti kiṃ? Dakkhiṇena ce gamissati na sakaṭaṃ pariyābhavissati.
anya-e0801n0:2629_0: Pañho=sampucchanaṃ sampadhāraṇaṃ nirūpaṇaṃ kāriyānicchayanaṃ patthanā=yācanaṃ iṭṭhāsiṃ
anya-e0801n0:2629_1: bhanañca, vidhi=vidhānaṃ niyojanaṃ kriyāsu byāpāraṇā, sā ca duvidhāva sādarānādaravasena…
anya-e0801n0:2629_2: visayabhedena bhinnāyapi tadubhayānativattanato, etesu pañhādīsu kriyatthato eyyodayo
anya-e0801n0:2629_3: honti, pañhe - kimāyasmā vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇeyya? Udāhu dhammaṃ, gaccheyyaṃ vāhaṃ uposathaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2629_4: na vā gaccheyyaṃ, patthanāyaṃ-labheyyā-haṃ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ labheyyaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2629_5: upasampadaṃ, passeyyaṃ taṃ vassasataṃ arogaṃ, vidhimhi-bhavaṃ pattaṃ paceyya, bhavaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2629_6: puññaṃ kareyya, iha bhavaṃ bhuñjeyya, iha bhavaṃ nisīdeyya, māṇavakaṃ bhavaṃ ajjhāpeyya,
anya-e0801n0:2629_7: anuññāpattakālesupi siddhāva… tatthāpi vidhippatītito, anuññāyaṃ-evaṃ kareyyāsi,
anya-e0801n0:2629_8: pattakāle-kaṭaṃ kareyyāsi, patto te kālo kaṭakaraṇe, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ saṅgho
anya-e0801n0:2629_9: uposathaṃ kareyya, etassa bhagavā kālo etassa sugata kālo yaṃ bhagavā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2630: 10. Tu antu hi tha mi ma taṃ antaṃ ssu vho e āmase.
anya-e0801n0:2631_0: Pañhādīsvete honti kriyatthato. Gacchatu gacchantu, gacchāhi gacchatha, gacchāmi
anya-e0801n0:2631_1: gacchāma, gacchataṃ gacchantaṃ, gacchassu gacchavho, gacche, gacchāmase, pañhe-kinnu
anya-e0801n0:2631_2: khalu bho byākaraṇamadhīyassu, patthanāyaṃ-dadāhi me, jīvatu bhavaṃ, vidhimhi-kaṭaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2631_3: karotu bhavaṃ, puññaṃ karotu bhavaṃ, iha bhavaṃ bhuñjatu, iha bhavaṃ nisīdatu, uddisatu
anya-e0801n0:2631_4: bhante bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ, pesane-gaccha bhaṇe gāmaṃ, anumatiyaṃ - evaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2631_5: karohi, pattakāle-kālo-yaṃ te mahāvīra uppajja mātukucchiyaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2633: Sattiyaṃ ara hatthe ca kriyatthā eyyādayo honti. Bhavaṃ khalu rajjaṃ kareyya, bhavaṃ satto araho.
anya-e0801n0:2635_0: Sambhāvane gamyamāne dhātunā vuccamāne ca eyyādayo honti vibhāsā. Api pabbataṃ sirasā
anya-e0801n0:2635_1: bhindeyya, kriyātipattiyantu ssādī-asaniyāpi hato nāpatissā, sambhāvemi saddahāmi
anya-e0801n0:2635_2: avakappemi bhuñjeyya bhavaṃ bhuñjissati bhavaṃ abhuñji bhavaṃ, kriyātipattiyantu
anya-e0801n0:2637_0: Mā yoge sati īādayo āādayo ca vā honti. Mā su punapi evarūpamakāsi, mā bhavaṃ agamā
anya-e0801n0:2637_1: vanaṃ, vātveva? Mā te kāmaguṇe bhamassu cittaṃ, mā tvaṃ karissasi, mā tvaṃ kareyyāsi,
anya-e0801n0:2637_3: evaṃ kato kaṭo sve bhavissati, bhāvi kiccamāsīti.
anya-e0801n0:2638_0: Lunāhi lunāhitvevāyaṃ lunāti, lunassu lunassutvevāyaṃ lunā-tīti tvādīnamevetaṃ majjhimapurisekavacanānamābhikkhaññe
anya-e0801n0:2638_1: dvibbavacanaṃ, idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti ‘eva mesa turito aññepi niyojentoviya kiriyaṃ karotī’ti,
anya-e0801n0:2638_2: evaṃ lunātha lunāthatvevāyaṃ lunāti, lunavho lunavhotvevāyaṃ lunāti, tathā kālantaresupi
anya-e0801n0:2638_3: lunāhi lunāhitvevāyaṃ aluni, alunā, lulāva, lunissatīti, evaṃ ssumhi ca yojanīyaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2638_4: tathā samuccayepi maṭhamaṭa, vihāramaṭetvevāyamaṭati, maṭhamaṭassu, vihāramaṭassutvevāyamaṭati,
anya-e0801n0:2638_5: byāpārabhede tusāmaññavacanasseva byāpakattā anuppayogo bhavati, odanaṃ bhuñja, yāguṃ
anya-e0801n0:2640_0: Ekānekesu tumhāmhasaddavacanīyesu tadaññasaddavacanīyesu ca kārakesu pubbacchakkānaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2640_1: paracchakkānaṃ majjhimuttamapaṭhamā dve dve honti yathākkamaṃ kriyatthā, uttamasaddo-yaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2640_2: sabhāvato tatiyaduke ruḷho, tvaṃ gacchasi, tumhe gacchatha, tvaṃ gacchase, tumhe
anya-e0801n0:2640_3: gacchavhe, ahaṃ gacchāmi, mayaṃ gacchāma, ahaṃ gacche, mayaṃ gacchāmhe, so gacchati,
anya-e0801n0:2640_4: te gacchanti, so gacchate, te gacchante, sāmatthiyā laddhattā appayujjamānesupi tumhāmhasesesu
anya-e0801n0:2640_5: bhavanti. Gacchasi, gacchatha, gacchase, gacchavhe, gacchāmi, gacchāma, gacche, gacchāmhe,
anya-e0801n0:2642: Āādo īādo ssā ādo ca kriyatthassa vā aña hoti. Ñakāro-nubandho, agamā, gamā, agamī, gamī, agamissā, gamissā.
anya-e0801n0:2644: Brūssa āho hoti aādīsu. Āha, āhu.
anya-e0801n0:2646: Aādīsu bhūssa vuka hoti. Kakāro-nubandho, ukāro uccāraṇattho, babhūva.
anya-e0801n0:2648: Aādīsu dvitte pubbassa bhūssa a hoti, babhūva.
anya-e0801n0:2650: Āhādesā parassa ussa aṃsuvā hoti. Ahaṃsu, āhu.
anya-e0801n0:2652: Āhā paresaṃ tiantīnaṃ ṭaṭū honti. Ṭakārā sabbādesatthā, āha, āhu, atoyeva ca ñāpakā tiantīsu ca brūssā-ho.
anya-e0801n0:2654: Īādīsu vacassa oma hoti. Makāro-nubandho, avoca, īādoti kiṃ? Avacā.
anya-e0801n0:2656: Advite vattamānassa dāssa daṃ vā hoti mimesu. Dammi demi, damma dema, advitteti kiṃ? Dadādhi dadāma.
anya-e0801n0:2658: Karassa saokārassa kuṃ vā hoti mimesu. Kummi kumma, karomi karoma.
anya-e0801n0:2660: Karassa saokārassa kā hoti vā īādīsu. Akāsi akari, akaṃsu akariṃsu, akā akarā.
anya-e0801n0:2662: Karassa sossa hāssa ca āhaṅa vā hoti ssena saha. Kāhati karissati, akāhā akarissā, hāhati hāyissati, ahāhā ahāyissā.
anya-e0801n0:2664_0: Labhādīnaṃ cchaṅa vā hoti ssenasaha. Alacchā alabhissā, lacchati labhissāti, avacchā
anya-e0801n0:2664_1: avasissā, vacchati vasissati, acchecchā acchindissā, checchati chindissati, abhecchā
anya-e0801n0:2664_2: abhindissā, bhecchati bhindissati, arucchā arodissā, rucchati rodissatī, aññasmimpi
anya-e0801n0:2664_3: chidassa vā cchaṅa yogavibhāgā, acchecchuṃ acchantiṃsu, aññesañca gacchaṃ gacchissaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2666_0: Bhujādīnaṃ kkhaṅa vā hoti ssena saha. Abhokkhā abhuñjissā, bhokkhati bhuñjissati,
anya-e0801n0:2666_1: amokkhā amuñcissā, mokkhatimuñcissati, avakkhā avacissā, vakkhati vaccissati, pāvekkhā
anya-e0801n0:2666_2: pāvisissā, pavekkhati pavisissati, visassā-ññasmimpi vā kkhaṅa yogavibhāgā pāvekkhi, pāvisi.
anya-e0801n0:2668: Āādo īādo a harassa ā hoti vā. Ahā aharā, ahāsi ahari.
anya-e0801n0:2670: Āādo īādo a gamissa ā hoti vā. Agā agamā, agā agamī.
anya-e0801n0:2672: Ḍaṃsassa gamissa ca chaṅa vā hoti āīādīsu. Aḍañchā aḍaṃsā, aḍañchi aḍaṃsī, agañchā agacchā, agañchi agacchī.
anya-e0801n0:2674: Hūssa heādayo honti ssatyādo. Hessati, hehissati, hohissati.
anya-e0801n0:2676: Kṇāknāsu kriyatthassa rasso hoti. Kiṇāti, dhunāti.
anya-e0801n0:2677: 33. Ā ī ñu mhā ssā ssamhānaṃ vā.
anya-e0801n0:2678: Esaṃ vā rasso hoti. Gama gamā, gami gamī, gamu gamū, gamimha gamimhā, gamissa gamissā, gamissamha gamissamhā.
anya-e0801n0:2680: Kusā ruhā ca parassa īssa chi vā hoti. Akkocchi akkosi, abhirucchi abhiruhi.
anya-e0801n0:2682_0: Kriyatthā paresaṃ aādīnaṃ īādīnaṃ ssaādīnañca-byañjanassa iña hoti vibhāsā. Babhuvittha,
anya-e0801n0:2682_1: abhavitthā, anubhavissā, anubhavissati anubhossati harisati hassati, etesanti kiṃ?
anya-e0801n0:2684: Brūto parassa tissa īña vā hoti. Bravīti, brūti.
anya-e0801n0:2686: Kriyatthā parassa kyassa īña vā hoti. Pacīyati, paccati.
anya-e0801n0:2687: 38. Eyyātha sse a ā īthānaṃ o, a, aṃ, ttha, ttho, vhoka.
anya-e0801n0:2688_0: Eyyāthādīnaṃ oādayo vā honti yathākkamaṃ. Tumhe bhaveyyātho bhaveyyātha, tvaṃ abhavissa
anya-e0801n0:2688_1: abhavisse, ahaṃ abhavaṃ abhava, so abhavittha abhavā, so abhavittho, abhavī, tumhe
anya-e0801n0:2688_2: bhavathavho bhavatha, āsahacaritova akāro gayhate, tho pana-nte niddesā tvādisambandhīyeva,
anya-e0801n0:2688_3: tasseva vā nissitattā, nissayakaraṇampi hi suttakārāciṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2690: Umīccassa iṃsu aṃsu vā honti. Agamiṃsu, agamaṃsu, agamuṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2692: Eādesato oādesato ca parassa umiccassa suṃ vā hoti. Nesuṃ, nayiṃsu, assosuṃ, assuṃ, ādesattākhyāpanatthaṃttaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2694: Hūto parassa umiccassa resuṃ vā hoti. Ahesuṃ, ahavuṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2696: Ossa aādayo vā honti. Tvaṃ abhava, abhavi, abhavittha, abhavittho abhavo.
anya-e0801n0:2698: Ossa si vā hoti. Ahosi tvaṃ ahuvo.
anya-e0801n0:2700: Dīghato parassa īssa si vā hoti. Akāsi akā, adāsi adā.
anya-e0801n0:2702: Mhātthānamhaña vā hoti. Agamhamhā agamimhā, agamuttha agamittha.
anya-e0801n0:2704: Imiccassa siña vā toti mhātthānañca bahulaṃ. Akāsiṃ akariṃ, akāsimhā akarimhā akāsittha akarittha.
anya-e0801n0:2706: Eyyumiccassa ñaṃ vā hoti. Gacchuṃ gaccheyyuṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2708: Ato parassa hissa lopo vā hoti. Gaccha gacchāhi, atoti kiṃ? Karohi.
anya-e0801n0:2710: Kyassa vā lopo hoti sse. Anvabhavissā anvabhūyissā, anubhavissati anuchūyissati.
anya-e0801n0:2711: 50. Atthiteyyādicchannaṃ sa su sa satha saṃ sāma.
anya-e0801n0:2712: Asa=bhuviccasmā paresaṃ eyyādicchannaṃ sādayo honti yathākkamaṃ. Assa, assu, assa, assatha, assaṃ, assāma.
anya-e0801n0:2714: Atthiteyyādicchannaṃ ādibhūtānaṃ dvinnaṃ iyā iyuṃ honti yathākkamaṃ. Siyā, siyuṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2716: Atthito parassa takārassa tho hoti. Atthi, atthu.
anya-e0801n0:2718: Atthissa aṭa hoti sihisu, ṭo sabbādesattho. Asi ahi.
anya-e0801n0:2720: Atthismā paresaṃ mimānaṃ mhimhā vā honti, taṃsanniyogenaatthissa aṭa ca. Amhi asmi, amha asma.
anya-e0801n0:2722: Esu mimesu atthissa sakāro hoti. Asmi asma, pararūpabādhanatthaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2724: Atthissa dīgho hoti īādimhi. Āsi, āsuṃ, āsi, āsittha, āsiṃ, āsiṃ mhā.
anya-e0801n0:2726: Akārassa dīgho hoti himimesu. Pacāhi, pacāmi, pacāma, muyhāmi.
anya-e0801n0:2730: Sakasmā kṇassakho vā hoti sse. Sakkhissā sakkuṇissā, sakkhissati, sakkuṇissati.
anya-e0801n0:2732: Tesu īādissesu suto paresaṃ kṇokṇānaṃ roṭa vā hoti. Assosi asuṇi, assossā asuṇissā, sossati suṇissati.
anya-e0801n0:2733: 61. Ñāssa sanāssa nāyo timhi. Sanāssa ñāssa nāyo vā hoti timhi. Nāyati, jānāti.
anya-e0801n0:2735: Ñādese sanāssa ñāssa jaṃ (vā) hoti. Jaññā (jāneyya).
anya-e0801n0:2737: Ñāto eyyāssa iyāñā honti vā. Jāniyā, jaññā jāneyya.
anya-e0801n0:2739: Īādo ssatyādo ca ñāto knālopo vā hoti. Aññāsi ajāni, ñassati jānissati.
anya-e0801n0:2741: Ñāto parassa ssassa hi vā hoti kamme. Paññāyihiti paññāyissati.
anya-e0801n0:2743: Etismā parassa ssassa hi hoti vā. Ehiti essati.
anya-e0801n0:2745: Hanā ssassa chakhā vā honti. Hañchāmi hanissāmi, paṭihaṅkhāmi paṭihanissāmi.
anya-e0801n0:2747: Hāto parassa ssassa ha hoti vā. Hāhati jahissati.
anya-e0801n0:2749: Dakkhādīhi ādesehi parassa ssassa lopo vā hoti. Dakkhati dakkhissati, sakkhati sakkhissati, hehiti hehissatihohiti hohissati.
anya-e0801n0:2751: Kayirā parassa eyyumādīnaṃ eyyassa lopo hoti. Kayiruṃ, kayirāsi, kayirātha, kahirāmi, kayirāma.
anya-e0801n0:2753: Kayirā parassa eyyassa ṭā hoti. So kayirā.
anya-e0801n0:2755: Kayirā parassa ethassa ā hoti. Kayirātha.
anya-e0801n0:2756: 73. Labhā iṃ īnaṃ thaṃ thā vā.
anya-e0801n0:2757: Labhasmā iṃīiccesaṃ thaṃthā honti vā. Alatthaṃ alabhiṃ, alattha alabhi.
anya-e0801n0:2759: Gurupubbasmā rassā paresaṃ ntentīnaṃ re vā hoti. Gacchare gacchanti, gacchare gacchante, gamissare gamissanti, gamissare gamissante, gurupubbāti kiṃ? Paca, rassati kiṃ? Honti.
anya-e0801n0:2761: Eyyādīnaṃ ṭe vā hoti. So kare kareyya, tvaṃ kare kareyyāsi, ahaṃ kare kareyyaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2763: Ovikaraṇassa u hoti paracchakke visaye. Tanute.
anya-e0801n0:2765: Ovikaraṇassa u hoti vā kvaci pubbacchakke. Vanuti vanoti.
anya-e0801n0:2767: Eyyāmassemu vā hoti u ca. Bhavemha, bhaveyyāmu bhaveyyāma.
anya-e0801n0:2772: 1. Cara dara kara raha jana sana tala sāda sādha kasāsa caṭāya vāhi ṇu.
anya-e0801n0:2773_0: Cara-gatibhakkhaṇesu, dara-daraṇe, kara-karaṇe, raha-cāge, jana-janane, sana-sambhattiyaṃ,
anya-e0801n0:2773_2: caṭa-bhedane, aya-iti gamanattho daṇḍako dhātu, vā-gatigandhanesu, etehi kriyatthehi
anya-e0801n0:2773_3: bahulaṃ ṇu hoti. “Assā ṇānubandhe”ti (5.84) upantassa assa ā, carati hadaye manuññabhāvenāti
anya-e0801n0:2773_4: cāru=sobhanaṃ. Darīyatīti dāra=kaṭṭhaṃ. Karotīti kāru=sippī, magha vā, visukammo
anya-e0801n0:2773_5: ca. Rahati candādīnaṃ sobhāvisesaṃ nāsetīti rāhu=asurindo. Jāyati gamanāgamanaṃ anenātijānu=jaṅghorūnaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2773_6: sandhi. Saneti attani bhattiṃ uppādetīti sānu=girippadeso. Talanti patiṭṭhahanti
anya-e0801n0:2773_7: ettha dantāti tālu=vadanekadeso. Sā dīyati assādīyatīti sādu=madhuraṃ. Sādheti attaparahitanti
anya-e0801n0:2773_8: sādhu=sajjano. Kasīyatīti kāsu=āvāṭo, asati sīghabhāvena pavattatīti āsu=sīghaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2773_9: Caṭati bhindati amanuññabhāvanti cāṭu=manuñño. Ayanti pavattanti sattā etenāti āyu=jīvitaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2773_10: “Assā ṇāpimhi yuka” iti (5.91) yuka- vāti gacchatīti vāyu-vāto.
anya-e0801n0:2774: 2. Bhara mara cara tara ara gara hana tana mana bhama kita dhana baṃha kambamba cakkha bhikkha saṃkindanda yaja paṭāṇāsa vasa pasa paṃsa bandhā u.
anya-e0801n0:2775_0: Bhara-bharaṇe, mara-pāṇacāge, cara-gatibhakkhaṇesu, tara taraṇe, ara-gamane, gara
anya-e0801n0:2775_1: ghara-secane, girāti vā nipātanā akāro, hana-hiṃ sāyaṃ, tana-vittāre, mana-ñāṇe,
anya-e0801n0:2775_2: bhama-anavaṭṭhāne, kita-nivāse, dhana-sadde, baṃha braha brūha-vuddhiyaṃ, kamba-saṃvaraṇe,
anya-e0801n0:2775_3: amba-sadde, cakkha ikkha dassane, bhikkha-yācane, saṃkasaṅkāyaṃ, inda-paramissariye,
anya-e0801n0:2775_4: anda-bandhane, yaja-devapūjāyaṃ, aṭa paṭa-gamanathā, aṇa-saddattho, asa-khepane,
anya-e0801n0:2775_5: vasa-nivāse, pasabādhane, paṃsa-nāsane, bandha-bandhane, etehi kriyatthehi u hoti.
anya-e0801n0:2775_6: Bharatīti bhara=bhattā. Marati rūpakāyena sahevāti maru=devo, nijjaladeso ca. Carīyati
anya-e0801n0:2775_7: bhakkhīyatīti caru=habyapā ko. Taranti anenāti taru=rukkho. Arati sūnabhāvena uddhaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2775_8: gacchatīti aru=vaṇo. Garati siñcati, girati vamati vā sissesu sinehanti garu=ācariyo.
anya-e0801n0:2775_9: Hanati odanādīsu vaṇṇavisesaṃ nāsetīti hanu=vadanekadeso. Tanoti saṃsāra dukkhanti
anya-e0801n0:2775_10: tanu-sarīraṃ. Maññati sattānaṃ hitāhitanti manu=pajāpati. Bhamati calatīti bhamu=nayano
anya-e0801n0:2775_11: patiṭṭhānaṃ. Ketati uddhaṃ gacchati, upari nivasatīti vā ketu=dhajo. Dhanati saddaṃ
anya-e0801n0:2775_12: karotīti dhanu=cāpo. Baṃha iti niddesā umhi niccaṃ niggahītalopo, baṃhati vuddhiṃ
anya-e0801n0:2775_13: gacchatīti bahu=anappakaṃ. Kambati saṃvaraṃ karotīthi kambu=valayo, saṅkho ca. Ambati
anya-e0801n0:2775_14: nādaṃkarotīti ambu=vāri. Cakkhati rūpanti cakkhu=nayanaṃ. Bhikkhatīti bhikkhu=samaṇo.
anya-e0801n0:2775_15: Saṃkiratīti saṃku=sūlaṃ. Indati nakkhattānaṃ paramissariyaṃ pavattetīti indu=cando.
anya-e0801n0:2775_16: Andanti bandhanti sattā etāyāti andu=saṅkhalikā. Yajanti anenāti yaju=vedo. Paṭati
anya-e0801n0:2775_17: byattabhāvaṃ gacchatīti paṭu=vicakkhaṇo. Aṇati sukhumabhāvena pavattatīti aṇu=sukhumo,
anya-e0801n0:2775_18: vīhibhedo ca. Asanti pavattanti sattā etehīti asavo=pāṇā. Sukhaṃ vasantyanenāti vasu=dhanaṃ.
anya-e0801n0:2775_19: Pasīyati bādhīyati sāmikehīti pasu. Catuppado. Paṃsati sobhāvisesaṃ nāsetīti paṃsu=reṇu.
anya-e0801n0:2777: Bandha-bandhane timasmā ū hoti, bandhassa vadhādeso ca. Pañcahi kāmaguṇehi attani satthe bandhatīti vadhū-suṇisā, itthīca.
anya-e0801n0:2779_0: Jambūādayo saddāūpaccayantā nipaccante, nipātanaṃ appattassa pāpanaṃ pattassa paṭisedho
anya-e0801n0:2779_1: ca. Janismā ū, bukāgamo, “manānaṃ niggahīta”nti (5.96) nassa niggahītaṃ, “vagge vagganto”ti
anya-e0801n0:2779_2: (1.41) niggahītassa mo, jāyati, janīyatī vā jambū=rukkho. Bhamissa amalopo, bhamati
anya-e0801n0:2779_3: kampatīti bhū=bhamu. Karotismā ū, tassa kandhuña ca, “pararūpamayakāre byañjane”ti
anya-e0801n0:2779_4: (5.95) dhātvantassa byañjanassa pararūpattaṃ, rudhiruppādaṃ karotīti kakkandhū=badarī.
anya-e0801n0:2779_5: Lamba-avasaṃsane, āpubbo, saṃyogādilopadīgharassā, ālambati avasaṃsatīti alābū=tumbi.
anya-e0801n0:2779_6: Sara-gati hiṃsācintāsu, ūmhi abhuka abuka ca, sarati gacchatīti sarabhū=ekā mahānadī.
anya-e0801n0:2779_7: Sarati pāṇe hiṃsatīti sarabū=khuddajantukaviseso. Camaadane, camati bhakkhati nivāpanti
anya-e0801n0:2779_8: camū=senā. Tana-vitthāre, tanoti saṃsāradukkhanti tanu=sarīraṃ, evamaññepi payogato daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0801n0:2780: 5. Tapusa vi dha kura putha mudā ku.
anya-e0801n0:2781_0: Tapa-santāpe, usa-dāhe, vidha-vedhane, kura-sadde, putha patha-vitthāre, muda-tose,
anya-e0801n0:2781_1: etehi ku, hoti. Kakāronubandho “na te kānubandhanāgamesū”ti (5.85) eonamabhāvattho.
anya-e0801n0:2781_2: Tapa iti niddesatova assa ittaṃ, tāpīyatīti tipu=lohaviseso. Usati dāhaṃ karotīti
anya-e0801n0:2781_3: usu=saro. Vedhati raṃsīhi timiranti vidhu=cando. Kurati kiccākiccaṃ vadatīti kuru=rājā,
anya-e0801n0:2781_4: kuravo=janapado. Puthati mahanthabhāvena patthiratīti puthu=vitthiṇṇo, modanaṃ, mudīyatīti vā mudu=athaddho.
anya-e0801n0:2783_0: Sindhu ādayo kupaccayantā nipaccante. Sanda-passavane, assa ittaṃ, dhocāntā deso
anya-e0801n0:2783_1: nipātanā, sandati passavatīti sindhu=nadi, vahisupantassa dīghādibatte, bādhissa
anya-e0801n0:2783_2: vāntahatte ca, vahantyanenāti bāhu, bādhati upaddave vāretī ti vā bāhu=bhujo. Raṃgha-gamane,
anya-e0801n0:2783_3: niggahītalopo, raṅghati pavattahi rājadhammeti raghu=rājā. Vida-lābhe, nakārāgamo,
anya-e0801n0:2783_4: vassa bo, vindatyanena nandananti bindu=kaṇikā. Mana-ñāṇe, nassa dho, maññati ñāyati
anya-e0801n0:2783_5: madhuranti madhu=madhukarīhi katamadhu, rapa lapa japa jappa-vacane, assaittaṃ, rapati
anya-e0801n0:2783_6: jappati mantantī ripu=paccāmitto. Sasa-gati hiṃ sāpāṇanesu, assa uttaṃ, sasati jīvatīti
